text2: “ ¡ Ts ̈ a lastema ts ̈ ëngaftangbiama , bacna ents ̈ anga nts ̈ amo ndegombre s ̈ mojuabnacá ndinÿinÿnayënga fariseunga y ley abuátambayënga ! Ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ montsama ents ̈ angbiama puerte totcá chaotsemna Bëngbe Bëtsabe amë ́ ndayoye jamashënguama , mo bës ̈ ás ̈ a cuaftsebiatamiancá . Pero ni cach ts ̈ ëngaftanga choye ques ̈ mátamashjuana , ni ínÿenga choye jamashënguama bos ̈ ë ́ ngbioye chama ques ̈ mátalesenciana .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .
text2: ¡ Ts ̈ a lastema ts ̈ ëngaftangbiama , nts ̈ amo ndegombre s ̈ mojuabnacá ndinÿinÿnayënga fariseunga y ley abuátambayënga ! Ts ̈ ëngaftanga chë viudángbioye chë tmobomna soyënga jtsabacayana , y ents ̈ angbe delante ts ̈ abá chacmotsë ́ nÿama y chënga s ̈ mojtsaíngñayama ndoñe chamondëtsetats ̈ ëmbuamna , Bëngbe Bëtsáftaca ts ̈ a jtsencuéntayana . Chë causa , Bëngbe Bëtsá ts ̈ ëngaftanga más jabuache ínÿengbiama cmochanjácastigaye .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte , and when he is made , ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves .
text2: “ ¡ Ts ̈ a lastema ts ̈ ëngaftangbiama , bacna ents ̈ anga nts ̈ amo ndegombre s ̈ mojuabnacá ndinÿinÿnayënga fariseunga y ley abuátambayënga ! Ts ̈ ëngaftanga ba luarënguenache jtsajnana canÿa ts ̈ ëngaftangbe ustoná onguayiñe , y s ̈ mojínÿena ora , ts ̈ ëngaftanga jamana cha chaotsemna ts ̈ ëngaftangbiama uta soye más merecido buajoná infiernoye chaotsama .

text: Woe unto you , ye blind guides , which say , Whosoever shall swear by the temple , it is nothing ; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple , he is a debtor !
text2: “ ¡ Ts ̈ a lastema ts ̈ ëngaftangbiama ; ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ mondmëna mo jtanënga ents ̈ anga unachayëngcá ! Ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ mondbétsichamo : ‘ Nda ínÿabioye tbojas ̈ buachená ndayánaca jamama y tojayana chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnama chca jamama ca , cha ndoñe ntsemnana chë tbojas ̈ buachená soye jamama ca . Pero chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnents ̈ a castellanama cha tojajurasna , aíñe jtsemnana chë tbojas ̈ buachená soye jamama ca . ’

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gold , or the temple that sanctifieth the gold ?
text2: ¡ Obëjémënga y nduabínÿnënga ! ¿ Ndayá más uámana soye yomna , chë castellano o Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebna ? Chë castellano Bëngbe Bëtsabiama josérviama jtsemnana , nÿe Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnoca chë castellano tojtsemnayeca .

text: And , Whosoever shall swear by the altar , it is nothing ; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it , he is guilty .
text2: Ts ̈ ëngaftanga mënts ̈ ánaca s ̈ mondbétsichamo : ‘ Nda ínÿabioye tbojas ̈ buachená ndayánaca jamama y tojayana chë altarama chca jamama ca , cha ndoñe ntsemnana chë tbojas ̈ buachená soye jamama ca . Pero chë Bëngbe Bëtsabiama altaroca tojtsejájona soyëngama tojajurasna , aíñe jtsemnana chë tbojas ̈ buachená soye jamama ca . ’

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gift , or the altar that sanctifieth the gift ?
text2: ¡ Nduabínÿnënga ! ¿ Ndayá más uámana soye yomna , chë Bëngbe Bëtsabiama tmojacjá soyënga o chë altar ? Chë tmojacjá soyënga Bëngbe Bëtsabiama josérviama jtsemnana , nÿe chë altaroca chë soyënga tmojacjáyeca .

text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar , sweareth by it , and by all things thereon .
text2: Nda chë altarama tojajurá , ndoñe nÿe chë altarama ntsejúrayana . Lempe chë altar juatsboca tojtsemnámnaca cha jtsejúrayana .

text: And whoso shall swear by the temple , sweareth by it , and by him that dwelleth therein .
text2: Nda Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnama tojajurá , ndoñe nÿe Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnama ntsejúrayana . Bëngbe Bëtsabiama cha jtsejúrayana , cha chë chents ̈ e oyená .

text: And he that shall swear by heaven , sweareth by the throne of God , and by him that sitteth thereon .
text2: Y nda celocama tojajurá , chents ̈ e reycá Bëngbe Bëtsabe tbemaniñama cha jtsejúrayana y cachora Bëngbe Bëtsabiámnaca , chents ̈ e yotbemanabiama .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin , and have omitted the weightier matters of the law , judgment , mercy , and faith : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: “ ¡ Ts ̈ a lastema ts ̈ ëngaftangbiama , bacna ents ̈ anga nts ̈ amo ndegombre s ̈ mojuabnacá ndinÿinÿnayënga fariseunga y ley abuátambayënga ! Ts ̈ ëngaftanga Bëngbe Bëtsabiama jtsequëcjnayana chë jajañents ̈ a sananga bnë ́ tsanents ̈ ana canÿe soye ; chë binche matatémënga menta , anis y chë cominents ̈ a sanángnaca . Pero ts ̈ ëngaftanga nÿe bats ̈ á jtsamana chë leyents ̈ a más uámana soyënga , mo chë nÿetsca ents ̈ anga cachca derechënga chamotsebomnama , ínÿenga jtsalastemánana y chë ts ̈ abe soyënguiñe jtsiyenana , chca , ents ̈ anga ts ̈ ëngaftangbeñe chamotsos ̈ buáchema . Chë soyënga cocayé cmontsamna jtsamama , chë inÿe ts ̈ abe soyënga amana ntjajbanacá .

text: Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .
text2: ¡ Jtanënga ents ̈ anga unachayënga ! Ts ̈ ëngaftanga chë base soyënga jamama puerte jtsenócochinÿenana , pero jtsebnë ́ tjombana uámana soyënga jamama , Bëngbe Bëtsá tojanmandá soyënga . Y chca , ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ montsemna mo canÿe ents ̈ á ndayá tojtsabuchetjcá bayëfja jtsejuánama , ndoñe ntjasama , jasama ndoñe yondëlesenciana ca chë leyiñe iuayana causa . Pero s ̈ mondmëna mo ents ̈ angcá ndëmuanÿenga camellbe mënts ̈ ena jasana , y chë leyiñe endayana chcana jasama ndoñe yondëlesenciana ca .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter , but within they are full of extortion and excess .
text2: “ ¡ Ts ̈ a lastema ts ̈ ëngaftangbiama , bacna ents ̈ anga nts ̈ amo ndegombre s ̈ mojuabnacá ndinÿinÿnayënga fariseunga y ley abuátambayënga ! Ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ mondmëna mo ents ̈ angcá ndëmuanÿenga platillëjënga y tazës ̈ ënga shjoicajana jtsóbojabiana , pero tsoyna nÿe cachcá jonÿayana . Ts ̈ ëngaftanga ts ̈ a jtsents ̈ énana ents ̈ angbiama mo ts ̈ abengcá jtsinÿnama , pero ts ̈ ëngaftangbe ainanents ̈ e jútjena entsemna nÿe jtsatbëbanama y nÿe bëtscá soyënga jésebomnama juabnë ́ ngaca .

text: Thou blind Pharisee , cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter , that the outside of them may be clean also .
text2: ¡ Nduabinÿna fariseo ! Cochjshetsajbaná ainaniñe bacna soyënga bomnana . Chamna nÿe ts ̈ abe juabnënga chents ̈ e cochtsebomna , y lempe nts ̈ amo chacojtsamcá y ents ̈ anga chamojtsonÿacá ts ̈ abá echántsemna .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres , which indeed appear beautiful outward , but are within full of dead men ' s bones , and of all uncleanness .
text2: “ ¡ Ts ̈ a lastema ts ̈ ëngaftangbiama , bacna ents ̈ anga nts ̈ amo ndegombre s ̈ mojuabnacá ndinÿinÿnayënga fariseunga y ley abuátambayënga ! Ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ mondmëna mo obanëngbe cuevëshënga botamana uafjantsenëshëngcá ; shjoicajana puerte botamanëshënga , pero tsoyna jútjena obanëngbe betashë ́ ngaca y janjuana soyë ́ ngaca .

text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men , but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity .
text2: Ts ̈ ëngaftanga chca s ̈ mondmëna : ents ̈ angbe delante ts ̈ ëngaftanga jtsinÿnana mo nÿetsca soyënguiñe ts ̈ abá amëngcá , pero ndoñe chca ques ̈ mátsmëna . Ts ̈ ëngaftangbe ainanents ̈ na chë bacna ents ̈ anga nts ̈ amo ndegombre tmojuabnacá ndinÿinÿnayëngcá y chë bacna soye amëngcá s ̈ montsejuabná .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! because ye build the tombs of the prophets , and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous ,
text2: “ ¡ Ts ̈ a lastema ts ̈ ëngaftangbiama , bacna ents ̈ anga nts ̈ amo ndegombre s ̈ mojuabnacá ndinÿinÿnayënga fariseunga y ley abuátambayënga ! Ts ̈ ëngaftanga jtsamana chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayënga tempsquënga bëtsëtsa ents ̈ anga chamotsemnama , chëngbe cuevëshënga jtsatspórmayëse . Ts ̈ ëngaftanga cachcá jtsamana chë nÿetsca soyënguiñe ts ̈ abá amë ́ ngaftaca , chë chëngbiama jtenójuaboyama pormániñe jtsatsbótamnayëse ;

text: And say , If we had been in the days of our fathers , we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets .
text2: y chents ̈ ana s ̈ mondbétsichamo : ‘ Bënga chë bëngbe bëtsëjémëngbe tempo maftsjaniyenëse , chë ́ ngbioye ndoñe matmënjanë ́ jabuache chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayënga jobáyama ca . ’ Pero mo chëngcá canÿe buayenana sóyeca tmojabë ́ ngbioyna ndoñe ntsayaunanana .

text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves , that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets .
text2: Pero nts ̈ amo s ̈ mojtsamcá jtsamëse , ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ montsinÿanÿná ndegombre chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayë ́ ngbioye tmojanëbayëngbe ents ̈ anguents ̈ ana s ̈ momnama . Y mora cach ts ̈ ëngaftangbe bëts taitangcá ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ montsama .

text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers .
text2: ¡ Mopochocanga jamama chë bacna soyënga , chë ts ̈ ëngaftangbe bëts taitanga tmojanbojats ̈ é jamama soyënga !

text: Ye serpents , ye generation of vipers , how can ye escape the damnation of hell ?
text2: “ ¡ Mëts ̈ cuayënga , mëts ̈ cuaye ents ̈ anga ! ¿ Ndayá s ̈ mochjama chë infiernoca uabouana castigüents ̈ ana jótsbocama ?

text: Wherefore , behold , I send unto you prophets , and wise men , and scribes : and some of them ye shall kill and crucify ; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues , and persecute them from city to city :
text2: Chíyeca ats ̈ e ts ̈ ëngaftangbioye chanjichamuá Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayënga , ts ̈ abe soye tats ̈ ëmbënga y abuátambayënga . Pero ts ̈ ëngaftangna , ínÿengbioye s ̈ mochantsëbaye y s ̈ mochanjácrucificaye ; ínÿengbioyna chë enefjuana yebnënguenache s ̈ mochanjátsets ̈ enaye y nÿetsca bëts pueblënguenache chënga s ̈ mochandúcamena .

text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth , from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias , whom ye slew between the temple and the altar .
text2: Chíyeca , ts ̈ ëngaftangbiama nÿets castigo echántsemna chë nÿetsca soyënguiñe ts ̈ abá amënga tmojëftsóbanama ; Abel , chë jóbanama chabotsemnama tondaye tonjanmá , tmojanóba orscana y Zacarías tmojanóbantscoñe . Zacarías , Berequíasbe uaquiñana , Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnents ̈ e tmojanóba , altar y chë ents ̈ anga Bëngbe Bëtsábioye imojánadorana luariñe .

text: Verily I say unto you , All these things shall come upon this generation .
text2: Ndegombre cbë ́ yana , lempe chë soyëngama castigo morsca ents ̈ angbiama echántsemna ca ” — Jesús tojánayana .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , thou that killest the prophets , and stonest them which are sent unto thee , how often would I have gathered thy children together , even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: Mënts ̈ ánaca Jesús tojánayana : “ ¡ Jerusalenents ̈ a ents ̈ anga , Jerusalenents ̈ a ents ̈ anga ! Ts ̈ ëngaftanga chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayënga jtsëbáyana y chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe ichmónënga ndëts ̈ béngaca jtsatëchë ́ nganjana jtsëbáyama . Bueta soye ats ̈ e sënjábos ̈ ena ts ̈ ëngaftanga áts ̈ bioye júbuajana , mo canÿe tuamba chabe bolletotémënga chabe juatëngmiásha tajsoye cuaftajayecá , pero ts ̈ ëngaftanga ndoñe ches ̈ mátsbos ̈ ena .

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate .
text2: Y s ̈ mochjinÿe , ats ̈ e mora cachcá cbochanjesë ́ nÿaye , y chca , ats ̈ na enánanga cbochanjésabashejuana , mo canÿe yebna cachcá tcojesonÿá y énañe tcojeseboshjoncá .

text: For I say unto you , Ye shall not see me henceforth , till ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Y ats ̈ e cbë ́ yana , ndegombre ts ̈ ëngaftanga morscana ats ̈ e ndoñe más ques ̈ mochátinÿe ; y ats ̈ e s ̈ mochántinÿe mënts ̈ á chas ̈ mojtsichamo ora : ‘ ¡ Corente bendición bomná , Bëngbe Utabnabe obenánaca tojabá ca ! ’ ”

text: And Jesus went out , and departed from the temple : and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple .
text2: Jesús Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnents ̈ ana tojë ́ ftsanbocna y ya yojtsaye . Chorna chë uatsjéndayënga chábioye tmojanobeconá y tmojanonts ̈ é nÿetsca chents ̈ a bëts yebnënga cha jinÿinÿiyana .

text: And Jesus said unto them , See ye not all these things ? verily I say unto you , There shall not be left here one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Chora Jesús tojanë ́ yana : “ Ts ̈ ëngaftanga lempe s ̈ montsonÿá . Ndegombre s ̈ cuayana , quem Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnents ̈ e ndoñe queochaisoquéda ni mo canÿe ndëts ̈ bé inÿe ndëts ̈ bé juatsboye . Lempe mochantsepochóca ca . ”

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives , the disciples came unto him privately , saying , Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign of thy coming , and of the end of the world ?
text2: Chents ̈ ana chënga Olivos tjashoye tmojána . Jesús choca yojtsetbemana ; as , chë uatsjéndayënga tmojanobobeconá nÿe chëngbiama jatjayama , mënts ̈ á : — S ̈ më ́ yana . ¿ Mocna ora chë soyënga Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnoca yochjochnëngo ca ? ¿ Ndayá yochjochnëngo bënga jinÿanÿiyama aca jésabama ora ya yojtsemnama y quem luare jopochócama tempo yojtsobecuama ca ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Take heed that no man deceive you .
text2: As Jesús tojanjuá : — Cuedado s ̈ mochtsebomna ndocná chacmondáingñema .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Banga mochanjabo y mochantsabíchamo chënga ats ̈ e imomna ca . Mochántsichamo : “ Ats ̈ e chë Cristo sëndmëna ca ” y chca , ba ents ̈ ángbioye mochanjáingñaye .

text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars : see that ye be not troubled : for all these things must come to pass , but the end is not yet .
text2: Ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ mochanjouena canÿe luarents ̈ a ents ̈ anga inÿe luaroca ents ̈ ángaftaca imojtsentsjanama y nderado mochjentsjámnaca . Ndoñe matauatjëngana , er chca jochnënguama endmëna ; pero masque chcase , quem luare jopochócama cabá ndoñe queochátsmëna .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be famines , and pestilences , and earthquakes , in divers places .
text2: Canÿe luarents ̈ a ents ̈ anga inÿe luaroca ents ̈ ángaftaca mochántsentsjanaye , y canÿe amëndayábents ̈ a ents ̈ anga inÿe amëndayábioca ents ̈ angaftácnaca ; y ba luarënguiñe shëntsana echanjóshjango y chents ̈ a fshantsënga echanjuangmë ́ mana .

text: All these are the beginning of sorrows .
text2: Masque chca jasúfriase , más chcoye cabá más mochanjatssúfria .

text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted , and shall kill you : and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name ' s sake .
text2: “ Chora , ents ̈ anga ínÿengbe cucuats ̈ iñe cmochanjábashejuana chacmatsets ̈ enama y cmochantsëbaye ; y ats ̈ be ústonënga bétsemnayeca nÿetsca luarënguents ̈ a ents ̈ anga cmochantsë ́ buayënja .

text: And then shall many be offended , and shall betray one another , and shall hate one another .
text2: Chë tempo , banga mora áts ̈ beñe os ̈ buáchiyënga , os ̈ buáchiyana mochantsajbaná y mochantsenáboyënja y jóbanama ínÿengbe cucuats ̈ iñe mochántsenboshjuana .

text: And many false prophets shall rise , and shall deceive many .
text2: Banga Bëngbe Bëtsabe ndoñe ndegombre juabna oyebuambnayënga mochanjábocana y ba ents ̈ anga mochanjáingñaye .

text: And because iniquity shall abound , the love of many shall wax cold .
text2: Nÿets ̈ á bacna juabnënga ents ̈ angbe ainaniñe echanjésemna , y chë causa banga ndoñe quemochátenbobonshana .

text: But he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Pero nda nÿets tempo áts ̈ beñe os ̈ buachiyá totsomñe , atsbocaná echántsemna .

text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations ; and then shall the end come .
text2: Y quem ts ̈ abe noticiënga Bëngbe Bëtsabe amë ́ ndayama nÿets quem luariñe ents ̈ ángbioye mochántsabuayiynaye , chca , chë ndegombre soyënga Bëngbe Bëtsabiama chënga chamotsetats ̈ ëmbuama . Chents ̈ ana cocayé quem luare jopochócama tempo echántsemna .

text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , stand in the holy place , ( whoso readeth , let him understand : )
text2: “ Chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayá Daniel chë puerte uabouana soye tojë ́ ftsanabema chë pochócaye soyama . Ts ̈ ëngaftanga chë puerte uabouana soye chë uámana ca uabaina luarents ̈ e chas ̈ mojinÿe ora ( nda tojtsalía , chabosertá ) , s ̈ mochántsetats ̈ ëmbo chë puerte ngménana tempo tojóshjanguama ;

text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains :
text2: ents ̈ anga Judeoca chamojtsemnënga , batsjabengoye chamotsacheta .

text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Y nda cachabe yebnents ̈ a tsbanánoca chaojtsemna , chaotsachá chocana ntjtastjangcá ndayá tsoicana jëftsábocnama .

text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes .
text2: Y nda jajoca chaojtsemna , yebnoye ndoñe chaondë ́ ta ni mo chabe quëfsaíya jesácñama .

text: And woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: ¡ Ts ̈ a lastema chë tempo ngomámanënga chamojtsemnëngbiama o ochóchaye s ̈ es ̈ onga chamojtsabamnëngbiama !

text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter , neither on the sabbath day :
text2: Bëngbe Bëtsá s ̈ mochtseimpadana chë ts ̈ ëngaftanga jachetama , uaftena tempo ora o canÿe ochnayté ndoñe chaondë ́ tsemnama .

text: For then shall be great tribulation , such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time , no , nor ever shall be .
text2: Chca , chora puerte ngménana echántsemna . Ts ̈ a jabuache ngmenancá , quem luare jabojáts ̈ ama orscana y më ́ ntscoñama y más chcoye , cachcá ngménana ndoñe ntjamnana .

text: And except those days should be shortened , there should no flesh be saved : but for the elect ' s sake those days shall be shortened .
text2: Chë puerte ngménana tempo yapa bën ndoñe chaondë ́ tsemnama Bëngbe Bëtsá ndoñe tonjalesenciase , ndocná quentatsbocá ; pero chabe ubuáyanënga cha corente endábabuanÿeshanayeca , echanjama yapa bën tempo ndoñe chaondë ́ tsemnama .

text: Then if any man shall say unto you , Lo , here is Christ , or there ; believe it not .
text2: “ Chora nderado nda cmochanjáuyana : ‘ Minÿënga , muents ̈ e chë Cristo entsemna ’ , o ‘ Choca cha entsemna ca ’ , chë soyëngama ndoñe s ̈ mattsayaunana .

text: For there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders ; insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .
text2: Chora mochanjábocana ndoñe ndegombre uámana ubuáyanënga , chënga Cristo imomna ca jtsichámëse , y Bëngbe Bëtsabe ndoñe ndegombre juabna oyebuambnayë ́ ngnaca ; y chënga mochanjama bëts soyënga chëngbe obenana jinÿanÿiyama , ents ̈ anga jáingñama , y tmojobenase , chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe bocacánëngnaca .

text: Behold , I have told you before .
text2: Ats ̈ e ya chama tcbonjabuayená chë tempo cabá ndóshjango ora .

text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you , Behold , he is in the desert ; go not forth : behold , he is in the secret chambers ; believe it not .
text2: Chíyeca , nderado chënga chacmojáuyana : ‘ Minÿënga , chents ̈ e chë Cristo entsemna , ents ̈ anga ndoyenoca ca ’ , choye ndoñe s ̈ matjá ; o chacmojáuyana : ‘ Cha canÿe tsoca entsemna ca ’ , chama ndoñe s ̈ mattsayaunana .

text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east , and shineth even unto the west ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Er nts ̈ amo chë tojatcuinÿe ora , shinÿe bocanoicana y shinÿe uenatjëmbambanë ́ ntscoñe jabuashinÿinÿenancá y ba luarënguenache ents ̈ anga jobenayana jinÿama , cachcá , Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá quem luaroye chaojésabo te , ents ̈ anga nÿets luarents ̈ e mochanjobenaye cha jinÿama .

text: For wheresoever the carcase is , there will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Canÿe obanabe cuerpo tojtsemnama chë gallinacënga tmojátats ̈ ëmbona y cachora chë béconana jojotana . Cachcá , chë castigo echántsemna nÿa chama chë tempo chaojtsemna ora ca ” — Jesús tojánayana .

text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light , and the stars shall fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken :
text2: Mënts ̈ ánaca Jesús tojánayana : “ Chë puerte ngménana tempo chaojochnëngüents ̈ ana , shinÿe ndoñe queochátsbuashinÿinÿana , juashcona ndoñe queochátsbinÿnaye , celocana estrellënga echanjatquë ́ cjana y quem luarents ̈ a tsbanánoca espíritënga obenana bomnënga echanjángmëmana .

text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven : and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn , and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory .
text2: Chora canÿe soye celoca echanjónÿna ents ̈ anga jinÿanÿiyama Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá ya iuaisaboma , y nÿets luarenache ents ̈ anga mochanjenóbos ̈ achna , y Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemábioye mochanjinÿe celoca jants ̈ etëshiñe echántsaboye , puerte obenánaca y corente buashinÿinÿaniñe .

text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet , and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from one end of heaven to the other .
text2: Y canÿe trompetë ́ fjua jabuache chaojuénana ora , cha chabe angelotémënga echanjichamuá Bëngbe Bëtsabe ubuáyanënga júbuajama , nÿets luarëngocana , celoca cánÿoica juachoicana y chë ínÿoica juachóntscoñe .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When his branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is nigh :
text2: “ Nts ̈ amo higo betíyeca endbétsopasanama s ̈ mochjuatsjinÿe : Tojtsaisabuacuana y tojtsaisë ́ jotsana ora , chë ts ̈ abe tempo ya tojtsaisobecuama jtsotats ̈ ëmbuana .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall see all these things , know that it is near , even at the doors .
text2: Cachcá , lempe chë ndayama ts ̈ ëngaftanga tcbonjauyancá chas ̈ mojinÿe ora , s ̈ mochántsetats ̈ ëmbo Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá ya jésabama yojtsemnama .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass , till all these things be fulfilled .
text2: Ndegombre cbë ́ yana , lempe chca echanjochnëngo , morsca ents ̈ anga cabá ndóbana ora .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Celoca y quem luare echanjopochóca , pero ats ̈ be palabra ndocna te queochaisopochóca .

text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels of heaven , but my Father only .
text2: “ Pero ndayté y ntseco ora Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá yochjésabama , ndocná quenátstats ̈ ëmbo , ni chë celoca angelotémënga , ni Bëngbe Bëtsabe Uaquiñá . Nÿe chë Taitá chama yotáts ̈ ëmbo .

text: But as the days of Noe were , so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: “ Nts ̈ amo Noé yojëftsiyena ora tojanopasacá , cachcá echanjopása chë Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá chaojésabo ora .

text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking , marrying and giving in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark ,
text2: Noebe tempo , chë uabouana uaftena cabá nduáshjango ora , ents ̈ anga imnasaye , imnofs ̈ ës ̈ naye y imnóbouamnaye ; natjë ́ mbana imojtsiyeñe , y chca imojtsomñe Noé chë barquë ́ shoye tojánamashënguëntscuana .

text: And knew not until the flood came , and took them all away ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Chënga tondaye imonjántats ̈ ëmbo , nÿe chë uabouana uaftena tojánashjango y nÿetscanga tojtsanë ́ yamba ora cocayé . Cachcá echántsemna Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá chaojésabo ora ; ya chaojochnëngo ora , ents ̈ anga chama mochanjátats ̈ ëmbona .

text: Then shall two be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Chora uta boyabásata jajoca bochántsemna ; canÿa mochanjesbets ̈ e y chë ínÿana ndoñe .

text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Uta shembásata bochántsejanÿcoye ; canÿa mochanjesbets ̈ e y chë ínÿana ndoñe .

text: Watch therefore : for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come .
text2: “ Chíyeca cuedado s ̈ mochtsebomna y yejuana s ̈ mochtsantjes ̈ na , er ndoñe ques ̈ mátstats ̈ ëmbo ndayté ts ̈ ëngaftangbe Utabná yochjésabama .

text: But know this , that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come , he would have watched , and would not have suffered his house to be broken up .
text2: Pero quem soye ts ̈ abá chacmësertá : Chë yebnents ̈ a nduiño , ntseco ora ibeta atbëbaná yochjabama tojtsetats ̈ ëmbëse , cha nantsefs ̈ na y ndocnábioye buanjaleséncia jushañe chaotsendbemama tsoye jtsamashënguama y jtsatbëbama .

text: Therefore be ye also ready : for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh .
text2: Chíyeca , ts ̈ ëngaftángnaca s ̈ mochtseprontana , er Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá echanjésabo , ents ̈ anga chama tondaye chamontsejuabná ora ca ” — Jesús tojánayana .

text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant , whom his lord hath made ruler over his household , to give them meat in due season ?
text2: “ ¿ Nda yomna chë oservená nts ̈ amo chë nduiño tojtsebos ̈ cá amá y nÿets juábnaca amá ? Cha jtsemnana nda chë nduiño bochjë ́ ftseboshjona chë yebnents ̈ ënga chaotsanÿenama y jasama tojtsemna ora chaújuats ̈ ema .

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Chë nduiño tojtashjango ora , chë oservenábioye tbojínÿena nts ̈ amo ibomncá jtsamëse , chë oservená puerte oyejuayá echántsemna .

text: Verily I say unto you , That he shall make him ruler over all his goods .
text2: Ndegombre cbë ́ yana , chë nduiño chábioye bochanjaimpáda lempe chabe soyënga chabotsinÿeñama .

text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ;
text2: Pero chë oservená bacna ents ̈ á tomnësna , jajuaboyana chë nduiño ndoñe betsco yochantabo ca ,

text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants , and to eat and drink with the drunken ;
text2: y as , cha jónts ̈ ana chë inÿe oservénënga jtsajants ̈ etayana , becá jtsesana y jtsetmuana inÿe tëmië ́ ngaftaca .

text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him , and in an hour that he is not aware of ,
text2: Y chabe nduiño jtashjanguama ndoñe tontsejuabná te y ndoñe tontsetáts ̈ ëmbo ora , cha echántashjango .

text: And shall cut him asunder , and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Chora chë nduiño jabuache bochantsecastíga , y nts ̈ amo chë bacna ents ̈ anga ndayá ndegombre tmojuabnacá ndinÿinÿnayënga jasúfriama entsamncá , cha echanjasúfria . Chora cha puerte echanjenóbos ̈ achna y chë tsets ̈ anama juatsas ̈ ënga echantsenoftë ́ s ̈ jojnaye ca ” — Jesús tojánayana .

text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins , which took their lamps , and went forth to meet the bridegroom .
text2: Mënts ̈ ánaca Jesús tojánayana : “ Chë te chaojóshjango ora , Bëngbe Bëtsabe amë ́ ndayana echántsemna mo nts ̈ amo canÿe casamento fiestents ̈ e tojanopasacá . Mënts ̈ á yojopása : Bnë ́ tsana tobias ̈ ënga chëngbe querosine uajuinÿanëshangá imojëftsájaca y imojábocana chë casamentero boyabása jajébenguama .

text: And five of them were wise , and five were foolish .
text2: Chë bnë ́ tsana tobias ̈ ënguents ̈ ana , shachnënga sempre enójuabnayënga imnamna , y chë inÿe shachnëngna , ndenójuabnayënga .

text: They that were foolish took their lamps , and took no oil with them :
text2: Chë ndenójuabnayëngna chëngbe uajuinÿanëshangá imojëftsájaca , pero querosine ndoñe imonjuabuyamba chë uajuinÿanëshangañe cachiñe jtaftsuámama .

text: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps .
text2: Pero chë sempre enójuabnayëngna chëngbe uajuinÿanëshangá imojëftsájaca y querosínënaca botellës ̈ ënguiñe imojuabuyamba .

text: While the bridegroom tarried , they all slumbered and slept .
text2: Chë casamentero boyabásana ndoñe betsco yonjabo , chíyeca nÿetsca tobias ̈ ënga ocnayana yojubuache y imojtsomaná .

text: And at midnight there was a cry made , Behold , the bridegroom cometh ; go ye out to meet him .
text2: Mo tsë ́ ntseto orna , chënga imojouena mënts ̈ á uayebuáchana : ‘ ¡ Chë casamentero boyabása ya endabó ! ¡ Jajébenguama mobocana ca ! ’

text: Then all those virgins arose , and trimmed their lamps .
text2: Asna , nÿetsca tobias ̈ ënga imojotsbaná y imojónts ̈ a chë uajuinÿanëshangá juabopróntana .

text: And the foolish said unto the wise , Give us of your oil ; for our lamps are gone out .
text2: Chorna , chë shachna ndenójuabnaye tobias ̈ ënga chë inÿe shachnënga sempre enójuabnayëngbioye imojáuyana : ‘ Diosmanda ts ̈ ëngaftangbe querosinents ̈ ana baseytema s ̈ mëbuats ̈ atá , bëngbe uajuinÿanëshangá tojonts ̈ é jtsafsanana ca . ’

text: But the wise answered , saying , Not so ; lest there be not enough for us and you : but go ye rather to them that sell , and buy for yourselves .
text2: Pero chë sempre enójuabnayëngna imojayana : ‘ Ndoñe . Tcbojubuats ̈ atase , ts ̈ ëngaftangbiama y bëngbiámnaca querosine echántsashbe . Más ts ̈ abá entsemna , chë querosine mondbétsenoye chas ̈ ma y ts ̈ ëngaftangbiama chas ̈ mauábuamiñe ca . ’

text: And while they went to buy , the bridegroom came ; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage : and the door was shut .
text2: “ Chorna , chë shachna ndenójuabnaye tobias ̈ ënga imojá chë querosine jauabuámiyama ; pero chëntscuana chë casamentero boyabása yojáshjango y chë sempre enójuabnayënga cháftaca chë casamento fiestoye imojámashjna , y chents ̈ a bës ̈ ás ̈ a imojtatame .

text: Afterward came also the other virgins , saying , Lord , Lord , open to us .
text2: Chents ̈ ana chë inÿe tobias ̈ ënga imojáshjajna y mënts ̈ á imojtsichamo : ‘ ¡ Taita , Taita , s ̈ mebëtafjo ca ! ’

text: But he answered and said , Verily I say unto you , I know you not .
text2: Pero chë casamentero boyabása yojójua : ‘ Ndegombre cbë ́ yana , ts ̈ ëngaftanga ndoñe quecbatëbuatma ca . ’

text: Watch therefore , for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh .
text2: “ Cachcá echántsemna Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá chaojésabo ora ; chíyeca s ̈ mochtseprontana , ts ̈ ëngaftanga ndoñe ques ̈ mátstats ̈ ëmbo ndayté , ni mocna ora chca yochjopásama ca ” — Jesús tojánayana .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country , who called his own servants , and delivered unto them his goods .
text2: “ Bëngbe Bëtsabe amë ́ ndayana endmëna mo nts ̈ amo canÿe boyabásaftaca tojanopasacá . Cha ibojtsemna inÿe luaroye jtsoñama ; as chabe oservénënga yojáchembo y yojaimpádaye chabe crocénana chamotsinÿenama .

text: And unto one he gave five talents , to another two , and to another one ; to every man according to his several ability ; and straightway took his journey .
text2: Cánÿabioye ibojánts ̈ abuachiye shachna uaranga crocénana , ínÿabioyna uta uaranga y ínÿabioyna canÿe uaranga . Chca yojamna nts ̈ amo cada ona ibojobiashjachcá . Y as chë boyabása yojtsoñe .

text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same , and made them other five talents .
text2: Cachora chë shachna uaranga yojoyëngacñá yojá trato jabemama , y chca , inÿe shachna uaranga crocénana yojábotiye .

text: And likewise he that had received two , he also gained other two .
text2: Chë uta uaranga yojoyëngacñá cachcá yojama y inÿe uta uaranga yojábotiye .

text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth , and hid his lord ' s money .
text2: Pero chë canÿe uaranga yojoyëngacñana , yojá , fshantsiñe yojajutjo y chabe mandayabe crocénana chents ̈ e yojtseitëme .

text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh , and reckoneth with them .
text2: “ Chents ̈ ana baytese chë oservénëngbe amëndayá yojtashjango y yojónts ̈ a chë crocenánama chënga jatjayana .

text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents , saying , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me five talents : behold , I have gained beside them five talents more .
text2: Natsana yojáshjango chë shachna uaranga yojoyëngacñá y chabe mandayábioye inÿe shachna uaranga crocénana ibojánts ̈ abuachiye y mënts ̈ á ibojauyana : ‘ Taita , aca shachna uaranga s ̈ conjanoyé y muents ̈ e entsemna inÿe shachna uaranga sënjaboté ca . ’

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , thou good and faithful servant : thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: As chë mandayá ibojauyana : ‘ Ts ̈ a ts ̈ abá , ts ̈ abe oservená y nts ̈ amo tsbos ̈ cá amá . Aca quem base soyiñe lempe nts ̈ amo tcbojamandacá tcojámayeca , ats ̈ e cbochanjaimpáda más bëtscá chas ̈ cotsinÿeñama . Mamáshëngo y áts ̈ eftaca cochjóyejuaye ca . ’

text: He also that had received two talents came and said , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me two talents : behold , I have gained two other talents beside them .
text2: Chents ̈ ana chë uta uaranga yojoyëngacñá yojáshjango y chë mandayábioye ibojauyana : ‘ Taita , aca uta uaranga s ̈ conjanoyé y muents ̈ e entsemna inÿe uta uaranga sënjaboté ca . ’

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , good and faithful servant ; thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: As chë mandayá ibojauyana : ‘ Ts ̈ a ts ̈ abá , ts ̈ abe oservená y nts ̈ amo tsbos ̈ cá amá . Aca quem base soyiñe lempe nts ̈ amo tcbojamandacá tcojámayeca , ats ̈ e cbochanjaimpáda más bëtscá chas ̈ cotsinÿeñama . Mamáshëngo y áts ̈ eftaca cochjóyejuaye ca . ’

text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said , Lord , I knew thee that thou art an hard man , reaping where thou hast not sown , and gathering where thou hast not strawed :
text2: “ Pero chë canÿe uaranga yojoyëngacñe oservená yojáshjango orna , chabe mandayábioye ibojauyana : ‘ Taita , ats ̈ e sëndë ́ tats ̈ ëmbo aca canÿe ts ̈ átjaye ents ̈ á comnama ; acna chë ndoñe tconjajé chents ̈ e saná jocñana y chë ndoñe tconjujquëshe luarents ̈ e jobuátbanana .

text: And I was afraid , and went and hid thy talent in the earth : lo , there thou hast that is thine .
text2: Chama ats ̈ e uatjana s ̈ juábuache , chíyeca ats ̈ e sënjá y fshantsiñe chë crocénana sënjetseitëme . Pero muents ̈ e acbe crocénana entsatsmëna ca . ’

text: His lord answered and said unto him , Thou wicked and slothful servant , thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not , and gather where I have not strawed :
text2: As chë mandayá ibojojuá : ‘ ¡ Bacna oservená y oyënjayá ! Chë ndayents ̈ e ndoñe tijajé chents ̈ e saná jocñana y chë ndoñe tijujquëshe luarents ̈ e jobuátbanana ats ̈ e tsuamanama icojátats ̈ ëmbëse ,

text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers , and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury .
text2: aca cmonjamna ats ̈ be crocénana bancoca jetsobuájuana y ats ̈ e matijtabo ora , ats ̈ be crocénana matijtóyëngacñe y chë chents ̈ ana tojoboté crocénanënaca ca . ’

text: Take therefore the talent from him , and give it unto him which hath ten talents .
text2: Y as yojamë ́ nda : ‘ Chë uaranga motseboca y chë bnë ́ tsana uaranga entsebomnábioye chana motsats ̈ etá ca .

text: For unto every one that hath shall be given , and he shall have abundance : but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath .
text2: Er nda tojtsebomnábioye , más jats ̈ etayana , y chca cha corente bëtscá jtsebomnana ; pero tondaye tondbomnábioyna , chë bats ̈ atema tobomna sóynaca jtsebocana ca . ’

text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: “ Y chora cha yojayana : ‘ Quem ndoservena trabajayá shjoca ibetoye matábocna ; choca puerte echanjenóbos ̈ achna y chë tsets ̈ anama juatsas ̈ ënga echantsenoftë ́ s ̈ jojnaye ca ’ ” — Jesús tojanë ́ yana .

text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory , and all the holy angels with him , then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory :
text2: Mënts ̈ ánaca Jesús tojánayana : “ Chë Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá chabe obenánaca , buashinÿinÿaniñe y nÿetsca chabe angelotémëngaftaca chaojésabo ora , chë reybiama puerte buashinÿinÿana tbemaniñe echanjótbema .

text: And before him shall be gathered all nations : and he shall separate them one from another , as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats :
text2: Chora nÿets luarëngoca ents ̈ anga chabe natsanoica mochanjénefjna , y cha , ents ̈ anguents ̈ ana ínÿenga echanjábacacaye , mo chë oveshënga abuajë ́ nÿa oveshënga chivë ́ ngbents ̈ ana endbetsabacacnaycá .

text: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand , but the goats on the left .
text2: Chë abuajë ́ nÿana , oveshënga chabe cats ̈ bioica echanjáchembo y chivëngna chabe uañicuayoica . Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá cachcá echanjama : chë ubuáyanënga chabe cats ̈ bioica echanjúbuaja y chë bacna ents ̈ angna chabe uañicuayoica echanjátsaye .

text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand , Come , ye blessed of my Father , inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world :
text2: “ Chorna chë Rey , Bëngbe Utabná , chabe cats ̈ bioica chamojtsemna ents ̈ anga echanjáuyana : ‘ Ts ̈ ëngaftanga , Ats ̈ be Taitá ts ̈ ábeñe cmë ́ tabna , mabënga ca ; ats ̈ be amë ́ ndaye luare mo ts ̈ ëngaftangbiama otocana soycá mosháchiñënga ; ts ̈ ëngaftangbiama endëprontana , Bëngbe Bëtsá quem luare tonjanma orscana .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me drink : I was a stranger , and ye took me in :
text2: Er ats ̈ e s ̈ onjanishëntsana y ts ̈ ëngaftanga saná s ̈ monjancaredadó ; s ̈ onjanajuendá y ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ monjanafs ̈ é ; inÿe luarocana ashjangonacá sënjánana y posada s ̈ monjanánts ̈ ame .

text: Naked , and ye clothed me : I was sick , and ye visited me : I was in prison , and ye came unto me .
text2: Enas ̈ á sënjánana y ents ̈ ayá s ̈ monjanëts ̈ etá jtichëtjuama ; s ̈ ocá sënjanjájona y s ̈ monjanatsëtsaye ; cárceloca sënjanëtámena y jabëuatsëtsayama s ̈ monjánabo ca . ’

text: Then shall the righteous answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , and fed thee ? or thirsty , and gave thee drink ?
text2: “ As chë Bëngbe Bëtsá chabe bominÿiñe ts ̈ ábenga tojábiamënga mochanjatjaye : ‘ Bëngbe Utabná , ¿ ntseco shë ́ ntseca tcbënjáninÿe y tcbënjanajuats ̈ é ? ¿ Ntseco uajuendayá tcbënjáninÿe y tcbënjanafs ̈ é ?

text: When saw we thee a stranger , and took thee in ? or naked , and clothed thee ?
text2: ¿ O ntseco inÿe luarocana ashjangonacá tcbënjáninÿe y posada tcbënjanánts ̈ ame , o enas ̈ á y ents ̈ ayá jtichëtjuama tcbënjanëts ̈ etá ?

text: Or when saw we thee sick , or in prison , and came unto thee ?
text2: ¿ O ntseco s ̈ ocá o cárceloca utamená tcbënjáninÿe y jauatsëtsayama tifjána ca ? ’

text: And the King shall answer and say unto them , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren , ye have done it unto me .
text2: “ As chë Utabná echanjójua : ‘ Ndegombre cbë ́ yana , lempe nts ̈ amo chë ats ̈ be cats ̈ átanguents ̈ ana chë más bats ̈ á uámanëngaftaca s ̈ mojamcá , cach áts ̈ eftaca s ̈ monjanma ca . ’

text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand , Depart from me , ye cursed , into everlasting fire , prepared for the devil and his angels :
text2: “ Chents ̈ ana chë Utabná chabe uañicuayoica chamojtsemna ents ̈ anga echanjáuyana : ‘ Ats ̈ bents ̈ ana mojuánanga ats ̈ be Bëtsabe uaboténënga . Infiernoye motsajna , chë ndocna te queochátsfsana íñeshoye ; choca endëprontana Satanás y chabe ustonëngbiama .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me no meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me no drink :
text2: Er ats ̈ e shë ́ ntseca sënjánana y ts ̈ ëngaftanga saná ndoñe ches ̈ matancaredadó ; s ̈ onjanajuendá y ndoñe ches ̈ matanafs ̈ é ;

text: I was a stranger , and ye took me not in : naked , and ye clothed me not : sick , and in prison , and ye visited me not .
text2: inÿe luarocana ashjangonacá sënjánana y ndoñe posada ches ̈ matanánts ̈ ame . Enas ̈ á sënjánana y ndoñe ents ̈ ayá ches ̈ matanëts ̈ etá ; s ̈ ocá sënjanjájona y cárceloca sënjanëtámena y ndoñe ches ̈ matanatsëtsá ca . ’

text: Then shall they also answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , or athirst , or a stranger , or naked , or sick , or in prison , and did not minister unto thee ?
text2: “ As chënga mochanjatjaye : ‘ Bëngbe Utabná , ¿ ntseco tcbënjáninÿe shë ́ ntseca o uajuendayá , o inÿe luarocana ashjangonacá , o enas ̈ á , o s ̈ ocá o cárceloca utamená y ndoñe tcbënjanajabuache ca ? ’

text: Then shall he answer them , saying , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these , ye did it not to me .
text2: “ Y chë Utabná echanjójua : ‘ Ndegombre cbë ́ yana , ts ̈ ëngaftanga nts ̈ amo chë ats ̈ be cats ̈ átanguents ̈ ana chë más bats ̈ á uámanëngaftaca , ndoñe s ̈ monjanmcá , áts ̈ eftaca cach ndoñe ches ̈ mátanma ca . ’

text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment : but the righteous into life eternal .
text2: “ Chëngna infiernoye nÿetsca tescama mochantsë ́ setjango , y chë Bëngbe Bëtsá chabe bominÿiñe ts ̈ ábenga tojábiamëngna chë nÿetsca tescama yomna ts ̈ abe vida mochántsebomna ca ” — Jesús tojánayana .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had finished all these sayings , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Lempe chca tojánayanents ̈ ana , Jesús chabe uatsjéndayënga tojanë ́ yana :

text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover , and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified .
text2: “ Ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ mondë ́ tats ̈ ëmbo , uta te y chë Bashco fiesta echántsemna y Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá ínÿengbe cucuats ̈ iñe mochanjáboshjona chamocrucificama ca . ” Chë fiesta inamna jtenójuaboyama Bëngbe Bëtsá chë judiëngbe bëts taitanga Egiptocana tojánatsebacama .

text: Then assembled together the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders of the people , unto the palace of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas ,
text2: Chëntscuana , chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga y chë judië ́ ngbeñe bëtsëjemëngcá mándayënga tmojánenefjna , Caifás , chë bachnangbe más uámana amëndayabe bëts yebnents ̈ e .

text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty , and kill him .
text2: Tmojanenojuabó y tmojanenoyeuná jtseíngñase Jesús jishachama , y jtsóbama .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar among the people .
text2: Pero imojtsichamo : “ Quem fiestëntscuana ndoñe , ents ̈ anga yapa muanjónts ̈ a enbouenanana ca . ”

text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany , in the house of Simon the leper ,
text2: Jesús Betania pueblents ̈ e yojtsemna , Simón chë bacna nguayanánaca s ̈ ocá ca uabobuatmabe yebnents ̈ e .

text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment , and poured it on his head , as he sat at meat .
text2: Chëntscuana canÿe shembása Jesúsbioye tojanabeconá . Chë shembásana tojanamba canÿe alabastro jarrëtema , jútjena canÿe puerte uámana botamana uanguëts ̈ e béjayeca . Jesús mesë ́ shents ̈ e yojtsemnëntscuana , chë shembása chabe bests ̈ as ̈ iñe chë botamana uanguëts ̈ e béjaye tbojanbues ̈ cja .

text: But when his disciples saw it , they had indignation , saying , To what purpose is this waste ?
text2: Chë uatsjéndayënga chca tmojáninÿe orna , tmojanotjayaná y tmojanonts ̈ é ichámuana : — ¿ Ndáyeca nÿe bonamente chë soye chca yojtsemna ca ?

text: For this ointment might have been sold for much , and given to the poor .
text2: Chamna , matmënjobenanga chë béjaye becá crocenánama juiyana y chánaca ndbomnëjémënga matmënjújabuache ca .

text: When Jesus understood it , he said unto them , Why trouble ye the woman ? for she hath wrought a good work upon me .
text2: Jesús chë soye tojanuena ; as tojanë ́ yana : — ¿ Ndáyeca ndoñe cachcá quem shembása s ̈ mochanjonÿaye ca ? Nts ̈ amo tonjamcá ts ̈ abá entsemna .

text: For ye have the poor always with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Er chë ndbomnëjémëngna nÿets tempo ts ̈ ëngaftangbeñe mochanjë ́ ftsemna , pero ats ̈ e ts ̈ ëngaftangaftaca ndoñe nÿets tempo quicháisemna .

text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body , she did it for my burial .
text2: Nts ̈ amo chë shembása tojamcá , chë botamana uanguëts ̈ e béjaye ats ̈ be cuerpiñe jabués ̈ cjëse , cha s ̈ ontseprónta ats ̈ e juatbontsa tescama .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world , there shall also this , that this woman hath done , be told for a memorial of her .
text2: Ndegombre cbë ́ yana , quem luariñe ndayénts ̈ naca Bëngbe Bëtsabe soyëngama chamojtsabuayiyná chents ̈ e , nts ̈ amo quem shembása tojamámnaca becá mochanjëftsóyebuambaye , chca , ents ̈ anga chabiama chamotsenójuabnama ca — Jesús tojanë ́ yana .

text: Then one of the twelve , called Judas Iscariot , went unto the chief priests ,
text2: Canÿa chë bnë ́ tsana uta uatsjendayënguents ̈ á , Judas Iscariote ca uabainá , tojána bachnangbe amëndayë ́ ngaftaca jencuéntama .

text: And said unto them , What will ye give me , and I will deliver him unto you ? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver .
text2: Y tojanatjá : “ ¿ Ntsachets ̈ á s ̈ matjtabuénaye y Jesús ts ̈ ëngaftangbe cucuats ̈ iñe cbochjayents ̈ bashejuana ca ? ” As chëngna , unga bnë ́ tsana ralbenga tmojtanabuená .

text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him .
text2: Y cach orscana Judas yojtsenguaye nts ̈ ámose y ntseco ora , Jesús chëngbe cucuats ̈ iñe jayents ̈ báshejuanama .

text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus , saying unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover ?
text2: Chë Bashco fiesta bojats ̈ enté , chë levadúraca ndëpormana tandës ̈ e jasama fiestëntscuana , chë uatsjéndayënga Jesúsbioye tmojanobeconá y tmojantjá : — ¿ Ndë ́ moca aca cojtsebos ̈ e bënga fchaiprontama Bashco saná chacosama ca ?

text: And he said , Go into the city to such a man , and say unto him , The Master saith , My time is at hand ; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples .
text2: Y Jesús tojanë ́ yana : — Chë bëts puebloye motsajna canÿe bacobe yebnoye y cha s ̈ mochjauyana : “ Buatëmbayá tonjayana : ‘ Ats ̈ be ora ya echanjobuache , y ats ̈ e acbe yebnoye sëntsá , Bashco fiesta jamama ats ̈ be uatsjéndayëngaftaca ca . ’ ”

text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them ; and they made ready the passover .
text2: As chë uatsjéndayënga tmojanma nts ̈ amo Jesús tojanamëndacá y chë Bashco fiesta saná tmojanprontá .

text: Now when the even was come , he sat down with the twelve .
text2: Y tojanibétata orna , Jesús chë bnë ́ tsana uta uatsjéndayëngaftaca mesë ́ shents ̈ e yojtsemna .

text: And as they did eat , he said , Verily I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Y imojtsesantscuana , Jesús tojanë ́ yana : — Ndegombre cbë ́ yana , canÿa ts ̈ ëngaftanguents ̈ á uayayëngbe cucuats ̈ iñe s ̈ ochanjáboshjona ca .

text: And they were exceeding sorrowful , and began every one of them to say unto him , Lord , is it I ?
text2: Chora chë uatsjéndayënga puerte ngménaca imojtsemna y tmojanonts ̈ é canÿánÿa Jesús jatjayama : — Bëngbe Utabná , ¿ nderado ats ̈ e cha chtsemna ca ?

text: And he answered and said , He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish , the same shall betray me .
text2: As Jesús tojanë ́ jua : — Canÿa nda chabe tandës ̈ e entsefchecuacná cach ats ̈ e sëntsefchecuacná s ̈ cnenents ̈ e , cha uayayëngbe cucuats ̈ iñe s ̈ ochanjáboshjona .

text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him : but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! it had been good for that man if he had not been born .
text2: Ndegombre , Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemáftaca echanjopása nts ̈ amo Bëngbe Bëtsabe uabemana palabrënguiñe chabiama iuayancá ; pero , ¡ ts ̈ a lastema chë bochjáboshjonabiama ! Más ts ̈ abá chabiama manjamna ndoñe ntjónÿnana ca .

text: Then Judas , which betrayed him , answered and said , Master , is it I ? He said unto him , Thou hast said .
text2: As Judas , chë boshjuaná , Jesúsbioye tbojantjá : — Buatëmbayá , ¿ nderado ats ̈ e chtsemna ca ? Y Jesús tbojanjuá : — Ndegombre tcjayana ca .

text: And as they were eating , Jesus took bread , and blessed it , and brake it , and gave it to the disciples , and said , Take , eat ; this is my body .
text2: Imojtsesantscuana , Jesús tandës ̈ e tojanca , Bëngbe Bëtsábioye chama tbojtanchuá , tojanjatá y chë uatsjéndayënga tojanats ̈ atá . Y mënts ̈ á tojánayana : “ Mocñënga , mosënga . Ats ̈ be cuerpo entsemna ca . ”

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and gave it to them , saying , Drink ye all of it ;
text2: Chents ̈ ana , canÿe coptema vínoyeca tojanaca , Bëngbe Bëtsábioye tbojtanchuá y chë uatsjéndayënga tojanëfs ̈ as ̈ é . Y mënts ̈ á tojánayana : “ Nÿetscanga quem coptéments ̈ ana mofs ̈ enga .

text: For this is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many for the remission of sins .
text2: Quem vínoye ats ̈ be buiñe entsemna . Ats ̈ be buiñe echanjuábuashana ents ̈ anga chamotsetats ̈ ëmbuama nts ̈ amo Bëngbe Bëtsá ents ̈ anga tojanas ̈ ebuachenacá aíñe yochjochnënguama . Chë buiñe bëtscá ents ̈ angbiama echanjuábuashana , chëngbe bacna soyëngama perdonánënga chamotsemnama .

text: But I say unto you , I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine , until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father ' s kingdom .
text2: Y ndegombre cbë ́ yana , morscana ats ̈ e ya ndoñe más chë uvasents ̈ ana obocniye quichaisofs ̈ iye . Chë tsëm vínoye ts ̈ ëngaftangaftaca chanjofs ̈ iye , ats ̈ be Taitabe amë ́ ndayoca chamojtsemna ora ca ” — Jesús tojánayana .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Bëngbe Bëtsá jëtschuayama tmojancantá chents ̈ ana , Olivos tjashoye tmojë ́ ftsanbocana .

text: Then saith Jesus unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad .
text2: Choca Jesús tojanë ́ yana : — Ts ̈ ëngaftanga nÿetscanga quem ibeta áts ̈ beñe os ̈ buáchiyana s ̈ mochantsobuets ̈ e y s ̈ mochántsacheta , er Bëngbe Bëtsabe uabemana palabrënguiñe , cha mënts ̈ á tojánayana : “ Chë oveshëngbe abuajë ́ nÿa chanjóba y chë oveshënga mochantsáshana ca . ” Chca ts ̈ ëngaftangaftaca echanjopása , uayayënga chas ̈ mojishache ora .

text: But after I am risen again , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Pero obanënguents ̈ ana chaitayenents ̈ ana , ts ̈ ëngaftangbe natsana Galileoye chanjá ca — cha tojanë ́ yana .

text: Peter answered and said unto him , Though all men shall be offended because of thee , yet will I never be offended .
text2: Chora Pedro tbojanjuá : — Masque nÿetscanga ácbeñe os ̈ buáchiyana chamotsobuets ̈ e y chamotsacheta , nts ̈ amo ácaftaca yochjopása causa , ats ̈ e ndocna te ca .

text: Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this night , before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: As Jesús tbojaniyana : — Ndegombre cbëyana , cam ibeta , ngallo cabá ndëcánta ora , aca unga soye cochanjayana ndoñe s ̈ conduabuatma ca .

text: Peter said unto him , Though I should die with thee , yet will I not deny thee . Likewise also said all the disciples .
text2: Pero Pedro tbojaniyana : — Masque chas ̈ otsemna ácaftaca jóbanama , ats ̈ e ndoñe quichátayana ndoñe cbonduabuatma ca . Y nÿetsca uatsjéndayëngnaca cachcá imojtsichamo .

text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane , and saith unto the disciples , Sit ye here , while I go and pray yonder .
text2: Chents ̈ ana , Jesús chabe uatsjéndayëngaftaca canÿe luare Getsemaní ca uabáinoye tojána . Choca tojanë ́ yana : “ Muents ̈ e motbiama , chëntscuana ats ̈ e choye chanjá Bëngbe Bëtsáftaca jencuéntama ca . ”

text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee , and began to be sorrowful and very heavy .
text2: Y Pedro y chë Zebedeobe uta uaquiñata tojë ́ ftsanëbiats ̈ e . Choca yojónts ̈ a puerte ngménaca y corente cochtsets ̈ enaná jtsemnama .

text: Then saith he unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful , even unto death : tarry ye here , and watch with me .
text2: Jesús tojanë ́ yana : “ Ats ̈ be ainana puerte ngménaca entsemna , mo jobanamcá . Muents ̈ e moquedanga y áts ̈ eftaca s ̈ mochtsefs ̈ na ca . ”

text: And he went a little further , and fell on his face , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if it be possible , let this cup pass from me : nevertheless not as I will , but as thou wilt .
text2: Chora Jesús más natsanoye tojána , tojanoshaments ̈ é y fshantsóntscoca yojotsejbéna , y mënts ̈ á Bëngbe Bëtsáftaca tbojanencuentá : “ Ats ̈ be Taitá , jopódianëse moma ats ̈ e japadésama ndoñe chas ̈ ondë ́ tsemnama . Pero nts ̈ amo ats ̈ e stsebos ̈ cá ndoñe chaondë ́ tsemna , sinó nts ̈ amo aca cojtsebos ̈ cá ca . ”

text: And he cometh unto the disciples , and findeth them asleep , and saith unto Peter , What , could ye not watch with me one hour ?
text2: Chents ̈ ana , Jesús chabe unga uatsjéndayëngbioye tojtanabo y chëngna imnétsomañe . Chca tojánanÿena ora , Pédrëbioye tbojaniyana : “ ¿ Ni mo canÿe horatema ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ monjobená áts ̈ eftaca jtsefs ̈ nana ca ?

text: Watch and pray , that ye enter not into temptation : the spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak .
text2: S ̈ mochtsefs ̈ na y Bëngbe Bëtsáftaca s ̈ mochtsencuéntaye , chca , bacna soye jamama ndoñe chacmondócochënguama . Ts ̈ ëngaftanga ndegombre s ̈ montsebos ̈ e espíritoca Bëngbe Bëtsá joyeunayama , pero cuerpiñe añemo ndoñe ques ̈ mátsbomna ca ” — Jesús tojanë ́ yana .

text: He went away again the second time , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if this cup may not pass away from me , except I drink it , thy will be done .
text2: Uta soyama tojtesaná y mënts ̈ á Bëngbe Bëtsáftaca tbojanencuentá : “ Ats ̈ be Taitá , ats ̈ e japadésama ndoñe chas ̈ ondë ́ tsemnama jamama ndoñe jopódianësna , nÿe nts ̈ amo aca cojtsebos ̈ cá chaotsemna ca . ”

text: And he came and found them asleep again : for their eyes were heavy .
text2: Y tojtanabo ora , chë uatsjéndayënga cachiñe imnétsomañe ; yapa ocnaye causa nÿe imojtsefshétana .

text: And he left them , and went away again , and prayed the third time , saying the same words .
text2: As Jesús cachcá yojëftsë ́ nÿaye , y ungama cachiñe tojtesaná Bëngbe Bëtsáftaca jencuéntama , y cach palabrënga tojánayana .

text: Then cometh he to his disciples , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : behold , the hour is at hand , and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Chora chë uatsjéndayëngbioye tojtanabo y tojanë ́ yana : “ ¿ Cabá s ̈ motsomañe y s ̈ motsochnañe ca ? Ya ora tocjobuache , Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá bacna soye amëngbe cucuats ̈ iñe mochanjáboshjona .

text: Rise , let us be going : behold , he is at hand that doth betray me .
text2: Motsbananga , cuajna . Minÿënga , chë boshjuaná ya entsebeconá ca . ”

text: And while he yet spake , lo , Judas , one of the twelve , came , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and elders of the people .
text2: Jesús cabá yojtsóyebuambnantscuana , Judas , canÿe chë bnë ́ tsana uta uatsjendayënguents ̈ á , tojánashjango , y cháftaca imojtsemna ba ents ̈ anga espadë ́ jangaca y ngarotbéngaca prontánënga . Chënga imojamna chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga y chë judië ́ ngbeñe bëtsëjemëngcá amë ́ ndayëngbe ichmónënga .

text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he : hold him fast .
text2: Judas , chë boshjuaná , tojanjuabó nts ̈ amo jamana ents ̈ anga jinÿanÿiyama ndëmua Jesús bétsemnana . Chíyeca yojáuyana : “ Nda chaijauámocho , cha echántsemna . S ̈ mochjishache ca . ”

text: And forthwith he came to Jesus , and said , Hail , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Cachora Judas Jesúsbioye tojanobeconá y tbojanchuá : — Buajtana , Buatëmbayá ca . Y tbojtanámocho .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Friend , wherefore art thou come ? Then came they , and laid hands on Jesus , and took him .
text2: Jesús tbojaniyana : — Enutá , moma chë ndayá jabomama tcojabo ca . Chorna , chë ents ̈ anga tmojanobeconá , Jesús tmojánishache y tmojanánatse .

text: And , behold , one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand , and drew his sword , and struck a servant of the high priest ' s , and smote off his ear .
text2: Chca orna , canÿe enutá Jesúseftaca yojtsemná , chabe espadëja tojanenosë ́ ngbotënts ̈ ena , y chë bachnangbe más uámana amëndayabe oservenábioye canÿe matscuas ̈ e tbojtsanë ́ stjango .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Put up again thy sword into his place : for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword .
text2: As Jesús tbojaniyana : “ Espadëja matosëngbuajonÿá . Nda espadë ́ jaca tbojóba chana , cach espadë ́ jaca echanjóbana .

text: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father , and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels ?
text2: ¿ Aca ndoñe condë ́ tats ̈ ëmbo , ats ̈ e ats ̈ be Taitábioye stjaimpádase , cha cachora ats ̈ biama nanjichamuá bnë ́ tsana utama más ejércitënga angelotémëngaca ?

text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled , that thus it must be ?
text2: Pero chcasna , ¿ ndayá Bëngbe Bëtsabe uabemana palabrënguiñe endayancá nts ̈ amo nanjochnëngo ? Chiñe endayana nts ̈ amo entsopasancá jochnënguama canmëna ca . ”

text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes , Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me ? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple , and ye laid no hold on me .
text2: Cachora Jesús ents ̈ anga tojanatjá : “ ¿ Ndáyeca s ̈ mojabo espadë ́ jangaca y ngarotbéngaca ats ̈ e jishachama , mo ats ̈ e canÿe bacá uamana ents ̈ á cuaftsemncá ca ? Ats ̈ e cada te Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnoca ts ̈ ëngaftangaftaca sënjántbemana abuátambaye , y choca ndoñe ches ̈ mátanishache .

text: But all this was done , that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled . Then all the disciples forsook him , and fled .
text2: Pero lempe quem soyënga chca entsopasana , cachcá chaotsemnama nts ̈ amo Bëngbe Bëtsabe uabemana palabrënguiñe chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayënga tmojanayancá ca ” — Jesús tojánayana . Cachora nÿetsca uatsjéndayënga tmojtsanëuatjaná y tmojtsanacheta , y Jesús chë uayayë ́ ngaftaca cachcá tmojesanonÿá .

text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest , where the scribes and the elders were assembled .
text2: Chë Jesús tmojánishachënga , tmojanánatse , Caifás chë bachnangbe más uámana amëndayabe yebnoye . Chents ̈ e chë ley abuátambayënga y chë judië ́ ngbeñe bëtsëjemëngcá amë ́ ndayënga tmojánenefjna .

text: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest ' s palace , and went in , and sat with the servants , to see the end .
text2: Pedro bënocana Jesús tbojanasto , chë bachnangbe más uámana amëndayabe chashjóntscoñe ; choye tojánamashëngo y chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnoca josticië ́ ngaftaca yojótbema , chca , jtsetats ̈ ëmbuama nts ̈ amo yochjopásama .

text: Now the chief priests , and elders , and all the council , sought false witness against Jesus , to put him to death ;
text2: Chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga , chë bëtsëjemëngcá amë ́ ndayënga y ínÿenga judiëngbe amë ́ ndayënga imojtsenguaye ndánaca masque uayátsenaye soye Jesusbe contra cháuayanama , as chënga jobenayama cha chaóbana ca jayanama ,

text: But found none : yea , though many false witnesses came , yet found they none . At the last came two false witnesses ,
text2: pero ndoñe tmonjáninÿena , masque banga tmojánashjajna Jesusbe contra uayátsenaye soyënga jayanama . Cabana , útata tbojánashjango ,

text: And said , This fellow said , I am able to destroy the temple of God , and to build it in three days .
text2: y chata tbojánayana : “ Quem boyabása tonjayana canobena Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebna jtsenásatajchcana y nÿe unga tese jtëtsjebuana ca . ”

text: And the high priest arose , and said unto him , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: As chë bachnangbe más uámana amëndayá tojantsá y Jesúsbioye tbojantjá : — ¿ Ndocá cochanjayana ? ¿ Ndayase yojtsemna chë acbe contra montsichamo soye ca ?

text: But Jesus held his peace . And the high priest answered and said unto him , I adjure thee by the living God , that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ , the Son of God .
text2: Pero Jesús nÿe iytëca yojtsemna . Chíyeca chë bachnangbe más uámana amëndayá tbojaniyana : — Bëngbe Bëtsá Ainabe mándoca cbomandá chas ̈ cuyana aca ndegombre chë Cristo , chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe Uaquiñá comna o ndoñe ca .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thou hast said : nevertheless I say unto you , Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Chora Jesús tbojanjuá : — Aca ndegombre yomncá tcjayana . Y quem sóynaca cbë ́ yana : Ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ mochanjinÿe , ats ̈ e , Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá , chë nÿets obenana bomnabe cats ̈ bioica jtsetbemanana y celoca jants ̈ etëshiñe jtsaboyana ca .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , saying , He hath spoken blasphemy ; what further need have we of witnesses ? behold , now ye have heard his blasphemy .
text2: Chora chë bachnangbe más uámana amëndayá chabe uichëtjonëjuangá yojtsenánts ̈ ajatanëca , puerte ibojtsetna causa , y tojánayana : — ¡ Nts ̈ amo quem boyabása tonjoyebuambacá , Bëngbe Bëtsabiama entsemna mo cha cuafjoyenguangcá , chë chabe Uaquiñá yomna ca cha tonjayana ora ! ¿ Ndayama más ents ̈ anga s ̈ ochjátëjaboto Jesusbe contra chamuayanama ?

text: What think ye ? They answered and said , He is guilty of death .
text2: ¿ Nts ̈ amo s ̈ matjayana ca ? — cha tojanatjá . As chë ents ̈ anga tmojanjuá : — Ndegombre cha bëts bacna soye entsebomna ; jóbanama bontsemna ca .

text: Then did they spit in his face , and buffeted him ; and others smote him with the palms of their hands ,
text2: Chora tmojanonts ̈ é Jesús juebëbuashëtjnayana , jabuache jants ̈ etayana y ínÿengna imojtsejuébjants ̈ etaye ,

text: Saying , Prophesy unto us , thou Christ , Who is he that smote thee ?
text2: y imojtsatsëtsnaye : “ Cristo , aca ndegombre Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayá tcomnëse , ¡ momalisiá nda tcmënjajants ̈ etá ca ! ”

text: Now Peter sat without in the palace : and a damsel came unto him , saying , Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee .
text2: Chëntscuana Pédrëna shjoca yojtsemna , chashjoca yojtsetbemana . Chora , canÿe shembása chents ̈ a oservená tbojanobobeconá y tbojaniyana : — Acnaca , Jesús chë Galileocáftaca conjánana ca .

text: But he denied before them all , saying , I know not what thou sayest .
text2: Pero Pédrëna , nÿetscangbe delante tojánayana chábioye ndoñe bonjanabuátma ca , mënts ̈ á jayanëse : — Nts ̈ amo contsichamcá , ndoñe ques ̈ nátësertana ca .

text: And when he was gone out into the porch , another maid saw him , and said unto them that were there , This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Chora Pedro bës ̈ oye yojábocna . Chents ̈ na , inÿe shembása oservená chábioye tbojáninÿe y chë inÿe ents ̈ anga tojanë ́ yana : — Cha , Jesús chë Nazaretocáftaca enjánana ca .

text: And again he denied with an oath , I do not know the man .
text2: Pedro cachiñe tojánayana ndoñe bonjanabuátma ca , y mënts ̈ á yojtsejúraye : — ¡ Chë boyabása ndoñe quetsatabuatma ca !

text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by , and said to Peter , Surely thou also art one of them ; for thy speech bewrayeth thee .
text2: Chents ̈ ana , chë chents ̈ e imojtsemnënga Pédrëbioye tmojanobeconá y tmojaniyana : — Ndegombre , ácnaca chë uatsjendayënguents ̈ á condmëna . Chë contsoyebuambnacá contsoyátëmbana ca .

text: Then began he to curse and to swear , saying , I know not the man . And immediately the cock crew .
text2: Chora Pedro tojanonts ̈ é ichámuana , Bëngbe Bëtsá chas ̈ otsecastigá ndoñe ndegombre soye stsichámëse ca ; yojtsejúraye y yojtsichamo : — ¡ Chë boyabása ndoñe quetsatabuatma ca ! Y cachora canÿe ngallo yojacánta .

text: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus , which said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice . And he went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Y Pedro yojenójuaboye nts ̈ amo Jesús tbojaniyanama . Cha mënts ̈ á tbojaniyana : “ Cabá ngallo ndëcánta ora , aca unga soye cochanjayana ndoñe s ̈ conduabuatma ca . ” Y chents ̈ ana tojésanbocna y corente ngménaca yojtsenóbos ̈ achna .

text: When the morning was come , all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death :
text2: Tojanbinÿna ora , nÿetsca chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga y judië ́ ngbeñe bëtsëjemëngcá amë ́ ndayënga tmojánenefjna jenóyeunayama nts ̈ amo jamëse Jesús chaóbanama .

text: And when they had bound him , they led him away , and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor .
text2: As , Jesús tmojanëcuébatsëca y tmojanánatse , y chca , Pilato , chë Judeoca Romano mandadbe cucuats ̈ iñe tmojánboshjona .

text: Then Judas , which had betrayed him , when he saw that he was condemned , repented himself , and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders ,
text2: Judas , chë boshjuaná , Jesús jóbanama ibojtsemnama tojanuena ora , puerte yojtsenócochinÿena nts ̈ amo tojánchjanguama , y chë unga bnë ́ tsana ralbenga chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga y bëtsëjemë ́ ngbioye tojtanamba ,

text: Saying , I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood . And they said , What is that to us ? see thou to that .
text2: y mënts ̈ á tojanë ́ yana : — Puerte bacna soye tijama . Ats ̈ e canÿe bacna soye ndbomná ts ̈ ëngaftangbe cucuats ̈ iñe tijáboshjona chaóbanama ca . Pero chënga tmojanjuá : — ¿ Chë soye ndayá bëngbiama ? Cach aca cochátotats ̈ ëmbñe ca .

text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple , and departed , and went and hanged himself .
text2: As Judas chë ralbenga Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnents ̈ e yojesëts ̈ ana , y yojá y yojétsentses ̈ aye .

text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces , and said , It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury , because it is the price of blood .
text2: Chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayëngna chë ralbenga tmojtanatbaná y tmojánayana : — Quem crocenánama buiñe echanjuábuashana ; nts ̈ amo leyiñe endayancá , bënga ndoñe quemuátobena chë Bëngbe Bëtsabiama soyënga quëcjnayëtémiñe chana jasegórana ca .

text: And they took counsel , and bought with them the potter ' s field , to bury strangers in .
text2: Chcasna , chënga tmojanenoyeuná , chë crocenánacna chë Alfarerbe Luare ca uabaina fshantse jabuámiyana , y chca , canÿe luare jtsebomnama ndayents ̈ e chë inÿe luarëngocana ents ̈ anga áshjajnënga jutabuantsama .

text: Wherefore that field was called , The field of blood , unto this day .
text2: Chíyeca , chë fshantse më ́ ntscoñama Buiñe Luare ca iuabaina .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying , And they took the thirty pieces of silver , the price of him that was valued , whom they of the children of Israel did value ;
text2: Chca , tojanochnëngo nts ̈ amo Jeremías , chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayá , tempscá tojanayancá , ndayá yochjanchnënguama . Chana mënts ̈ á tojánayana : “ Y chë unga bnë ́ tsana ralbenga tmonjanca , ntsachets ̈ á chë Israeloca ents ̈ anga cha tmojanamananacá ,

text: And gave them for the potter ' s field , as the Lord appointed me .
text2: y chánaca chë Alfarerbe Luare tmonjanbuamé , nts ̈ amo Bëngbe Bëtsá s ̈ onjanmandacá ca . ”

text: And Jesus stood before the governor : and the governor asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And Jesus said unto him , Thou sayest .
text2: Chents ̈ ana Jesús , chë mandado Pilátbioye tmojanánatse y cha mënts ̈ á tbojantjá : — ¿ Aca chë judiëngbe rey cojtsemna ca ? Y Jesús tbojanjuá : — Aíñe , aca ndegombre yomncá tcjayana ca .

text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders , he answered nothing .
text2: Chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga y chë bëtsëjémënga Jesús mal imojtsequédantscuana , cha ndocá ntjojuana .

text: Then said Pilate unto him , Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee ?
text2: Chíyeca Pilato tbojantjá : — ¿ Ndoñe contsuenana lempe nts ̈ amo acbe contra montsichamcá ca ?

text: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly .
text2: Pero Jesús ni canÿe palabra ndoñe ntjojuana . Chë causa , chë mandado ndoñe yontsetáts ̈ ëmbo nts ̈ amo jajuaboyana .

text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner , whom they would .
text2: Bashco fiesta ora , chë mandado yojanamana canÿe utamená jëtsboshjonana , nda ents ̈ anga tmojuabuayaná .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: Chë tempo canÿe uachuana utamená inamna , Jesús Barrabás ca uabainá .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: Nÿetsca ents ̈ anga chents ̈ e imojtsemna ora , Pilato tojanatjá : “ ¿ Ts ̈ ëngaftanga nda s ̈ mojtsebos ̈ e ats ̈ e chjëtsboshjonama , Jesús Barrabás o Jesús , chë Cristo ca monduabobuatmá ca ? ”

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: Er chë mandado yojtsetáts ̈ ëmbo , ents ̈ angna envidia causa Jesús chabe cucuats ̈ iñe tmojánboshjonama .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: Pilato chë tribunal ca uabáinents ̈ e yojtsetbemanëntscuana , chabe shema canÿa tbojanichmó mënts ̈ á cha jauyanama : “ Chë nÿetsca soyënguiñe ts ̈ abá ama ents ̈ ábioye ndocá matsborlánana ; chabe causa ibeta otjénayoca puerte sënjasufrí ca . ”

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: Pero chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga y chë bëtsëjémënga ents ̈ anga tmojanayënjaná , Barrabás jëtsboshjonama y Jesús chaóbana ca chamuayanama .

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: Chora chë mandado cachiñe tojanatjá : — ¿ Chë útatents ̈ ana nda s ̈ mojtsebos ̈ e ats ̈ e chjëtsboshjonama ca ? Y chënga tmojánayana : — ¡ Barrabás ca !

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: Pilato tojanatjá : — ¿ As , ndayá Jesús , chë Cristo ca uabobuatmáftaca ats ̈ e chjama ca ? Y nÿetscanga tmojanjuá : — ¡ Motsecrucificá ca !

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: Chora Pilato tojtëtanatjá : — ¿ Ndáyeca ? ¿ Nts ̈ amo cha tojobuachjanguá ca ? Pero chënga cachiñe tmojanáyebuachena : — ¡ Motsecrucificá ca !

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: Ndocá jamama yontsobenama y ents ̈ anga más jabuache enbouenanama tmojanonts ̈ ema Pilato tojáninÿe ora , cha tojanmandá búyeshe juabuíyëboñana y nÿetscangbe delante yojtsenacuents ̈ abiá . Mënts ̈ á tojánayana : — Ats ̈ e ndocá chiyátayana , ni chiyatsma quem boyabása chaóbanama . Ts ̈ ëngaftanga lempe s ̈ monjama ca .

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: Chora nÿetsca ents ̈ anga tmojanjuá : — ¡ Quemuá yochjóbanama , bënga y bëngbe básengbiama castigo chaotsemna ca !

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: As Pilato , Barrabás tbojtanboshjona ; tojanmandá soldadënga Jesús jabuache chamotsetsets ̈ enama y chents ̈ ana ents ̈ angbe cucuats ̈ iñe tbojánboshjona chamocrucificama .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: Chents ̈ ana , chë mandadbe soldadënga Jesús tmojanánatse chë mandadbe bëts yebnents ̈ a chashjoye y choca nÿetsca soldadënga chabe shë ́ conana tmojanójoto .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: Chorna , ents ̈ ayá tmojtsanabotsca y shbuenda uafjatsenga ents ̈ ayá mo reycá tmojanichëtjo .

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Canÿe coronë ́ sha tmojanapormá uchmas ̈ ë ́ fjangaca y tmojanabests ̈ ajó , y cats ̈ bioica cucuats ̈ iñe canÿe niñëfja . Chorna , chabe shecuats ̈ ents ̈ e imojtsofshëntsaménts ̈ enaye y imojtsáboyejuana . Mënts ̈ á imojtsichamo : “ ¡ Bayté judiëngbe Rey cochtsemna ca ! ”

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: Chë ́ ngnaca imojtsanbuashëtjnaye y cach niñë ́ fjaca bests ̈ as ̈ ents ̈ e imojtsë ́ tsjanjnaye .

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: Y chca imnaftsáboyejuanents ̈ ana , chë shbuenda uafjatsenga ents ̈ ayá tmojtsanabotsca y cachabe ents ̈ ayá tmojtanichëtjo , y chora , jacrucifícama tmojanánatse .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: Chë ents ̈ anga chents ̈ ana tmojánbocana ora , tmojánenbets ̈ e canÿe bacóftaca , Simón ca uabainá , Cirene pueblocá . As , cha tmojanmandá Jesusbe cruz chauetsocutsama .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: Canÿe luare Gólgota ca uabáinoca tmojánashjajna ora ( hebreo biyañe chca endayana “ Obanabe Bests ̈ ashe Luare ca ” ) ,

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: Jesúsbioye vínoye hiéloyeca enájuabniye tmojanabuiyé chaofs ̈ ema ; pero yojaftántia y ndoñe yonjábos ̈ ena chiye jofs ̈ iyama .

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: Ya tmojancrucificá orna , chë soldadënga Jesusbe ents ̈ ayamna , tsbanánoye tmojanë ́ ts ̈ ena , chca , jtsetats ̈ ëmbuama ndabiama yochjanáquedama .

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: Y chora chënga chents ̈ e tmojanotbiama Jesús jtsebojanÿama .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Y chabe bests ̈ as ̈ e juatsboicna canÿe uabemana soye tmojananjo . Chiñe yojétsayana ndáyeca cha tmojancrucificama , mënts ̈ á : MUA JESÚS ENDMËNA , CHË JUDIËNGBE REY ca .

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: Utata bacna soye ochjajnayátnaca chënga chents ̈ e tmojanacrucificá , canÿa Jesusbe cats ̈ bioica y chë ínÿana chabe uañicuayoica .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: Y chëjana imojtsachnëjuana ents ̈ angna , Jesús imojtsóyenguaye , imojtsobests ̈ fshanenaye

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: y imojtsatsaye : “ ¡ Aca chë icobena Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebna jtsenásatajchcana y nÿe unga tese jëtsjebuana , cach aca mentsbocá ! ¡ Ndegombre Bëngbe Bëtsabe Uaquiñá tcomnëse , chë cruzocana matastjango ca ! ”

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga , ley abuátambayënga y chë judië ́ ngbeñe bëtsëjemëngcá mándayënga cachcá imojtsóyenguaye . Mënts ̈ á imojtsichamo :

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: “ Cha ínÿenga tojëftsatsebacá , pero cachá jéntsbocama ndoñe quenátobena . Cha Israeloca ents ̈ angbe Rey tojtsemnëse , chë cruzocana chauatastjango , y chca , bënga chábeñe fchtsos ̈ buáchiye .

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: Cha tojayana Bëngbe Bëtsábeñe puerte yojtsos ̈ buaché ca . ¡ Mora Bëngbe Bëtsá chabuatsbocá , cha ndegombre muábioye tbobobonshánëse ! , er cha tonjánayana Bëngbe Bëtsabe Uaquiñá canmëna ca ” — chënga imojtsichamo .

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: Y chë bacna soye ochjajnayata , Jesúseftaca ibojtsecrucificanátnaca cachcá ibojtsóyenguaye .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: Nÿetsto orscana las tresë ́ ntscoñe , nÿets quem luare yojtseibétata .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Chca orna , Jesús chabe biyañe tojanáyebuachena : “ Elí , Elí , ¿ lema sabactani ca ? ” ( Chca endayana “ Ats ̈ be Bëtsá , ats ̈ be Bëtsá , ¿ ndáyeca cachcá s ̈ cojonÿá ca ? ” )

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Chca tmojanuena ora , báseftanga chents ̈ e imojtsemna ents ̈ anguents ̈ ana imojtsichamo : “ Cha Elías , chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayá , bontsechembuana ca . ”

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: As chora , chents ̈ a canÿa tojëftsanótjajo canÿe esponjëshe janguanguama , untja vínoyeca chëshe tojanfchecuacuá , canÿe niñëfjiñe tojananguësëtjo y Jesúsbioye tojanbeconá chaofs ̈ ema .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: Pero ínÿengna tmojánayana : “ Cachcá mochjonÿaye , er Elías tayochjabo jabátsbocama ca . ”

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: Pero Jesús cachiñe jabuache tojanoyó y tojanóbana .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Y cachora , Bëngbe Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnoca yojújonÿana ents ̈ ë ́ jua tsëntsaca yojtsenájataye , tsbanánocana fshantsoye . Chëjua bënë ́ jua inauamna y chë tsatsëntsaca inaújonÿana . Fshantse yojuangmë ́ mana , ndëts ̈ benga yojtsashtëts ̈ ana ,

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: y chë cuevëshënga obanë ́ ngaca yojtsëtëfjo y banga Bëngbe Bëtsabe ents ̈ anga tmojtanayena .

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: Y chënga , Jesús tojtanayenents ̈ ana , chë cuevëshënguents ̈ ana tmojánbocana , y Jerusalén , chë uámana bëts pueblo ca uabáinoye tmojánamashjna y ba ents ̈ ángbioye tmojánebëbuacana .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
