text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: Chents ̈ ana , Judas Iscariote , canÿe chë bnë ́ tsana uta uatsjendayënguents ̈ á , tojána chë bachnangbe amëndayë ́ ngaftaca jencuéntama , Jesús chëngbe cucuats ̈ iñe jaboshjonama .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: Chca tmojanuena ora , chënga imojóyejuaye y tmojans ̈ buachená crocénana jtabuénayana . Y cach orscana Judas yojtsenguaye nts ̈ amo jamana y ndëmua ora , Jesús chëngbe cucuats ̈ iñe jaboshjonana .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: Chë Bashco fiesta bojats ̈ enté , chë levadúraca ndëpormana tandës ̈ e sayté , chë uatsjéndayënga Jesús tmojantjá : — ¿ Ndë ́ moca cojtsebos ̈ e bënga fchaiprontama , Bashco saná chacosama ca ? Chca te chë judiënga imojanamana , Bëngbe Bëtsá jëtschuayamna canÿe oveshá jóbana chora jasama , chë Egiptocana chëngbe bëts taitanga Bëngbe Bëtsá tojánatsebacama jtenójuaboyama .

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: As Jesús uta chabe uatsjéndayata tojanichamó y mënts ̈ á tojanë ́ yana : — Chë bëts puebloye motsata . Chas ̈ ojáshjango ora , canÿe bacó cmochanjóbiats ̈ e , matbajiñe búyeshe echantsabuyambaye ; cha s ̈ ochjuasto y s ̈ ochtserreparana ndëmuanÿe yebnents ̈ e yochjámashënguama ;

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: y chë yebna nduiño s ̈ ochjauyana : “ Buatëmbayá tonjayana : ¿ Ndayents ̈ e chë tsañe yojtsemna , Bashco saná ats ̈ e ats ̈ be uatsjéndayëngaftaca jasama ca ? ”

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: As cha cmochanjínÿanÿiye canÿe bëts tsañe , tsbanana pisoca , lempe prontániñe ; chents ̈ e s ̈ ochjaprónta bënga mochjasama ca .

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: As chë uatsjéndayata tbojána y tbojáninÿena lempe nts ̈ amo Jesús tojanëyancá ; y chents ̈ e chë Bashco saná tbojanprontata .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: Tojanibétata ora , Jesús chë yebnoca tojánashjango , chabe bnë ́ tsana uta uatsjéndayëngaftaca .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: Y mesë ́ shents ̈ e imojtsesaye ora , Jesús tojanë ́ yana : — Ndegombre cbë ́ yana , canÿa ts ̈ ëngaftanguents ̈ á , áts ̈ eftaca entsesá cha , uayayëngbe cucuats ̈ iñe s ̈ ochanjáboshjona ca .

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: Chorna chë uatsjéndayënga ngménaca imojtsemna , y tmojanonts ̈ é canÿánÿa cha jatjayana : — ¿ Ats ̈ e chtsemna ca ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: Y Jesús tojanë ́ jua : — Canÿa chë bnë ́ tsana utatents ̈ á entsemna . Chabe tandës ̈ e cach ats ̈ e sëntsefchecuacná s ̈ cnenents ̈ e cha entsefchecuacná .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Ndegombre , Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemáftaca echanjopása nts ̈ amo chabiama Bëngbe Bëtsabe uabemana palabrënguiñe endayancá . Pero , ¡ ts ̈ a lastema chë bochjáboshjonabiama ! Chabiama más ts ̈ abá manjamna ndoñe ntjónÿnana ca — Jesús tojánayana .

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: Imojtsesantscuana , tandës ̈ e tojanca , Bëngbe Bëtsábioye chama tbojtanchuá , tojanjataye y chabe uatsjéndayënga tojanëjatá , y mënts ̈ á tojánayana : “ Mocñënga , mosënga , ats ̈ be cuerpo entsemna ca . ”

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Chents ̈ ana , canÿe coptema vínoyeca tojanaca , Bëngbe Bëtsábioye tbojtanchuá , chabe uatsjéndayënga tojanëfs ̈ as ̈ é , y nÿetscanga tmojanofs ̈ é .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: Mënts ̈ á tojánayana : “ Quem vínoye ats ̈ be buiñe entsemna . Ats ̈ be buiñe echanjuábuashana ents ̈ anga chamotsetats ̈ ëmbuama nts ̈ amo Bëngbe Bëtsá ents ̈ anga tojas ̈ ebuachenacá ndegombre yochjochnënguama . Chë buiñe bëtscá ents ̈ angbe ts ̈ abiama echanjuábuashana .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Y ndegombre cbë ́ yana , morscana ya ndoñe más chë uvasës ̈ ents ̈ ana obocniye quichaisofs ̈ iye . Chë tsëm vínoye ts ̈ ëngaftangaftaca chanjofs ̈ iye , Bëngbe Bëtsabe amë ́ ndayoca chamojtsemna ora ca ” — tojánayana .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Bëngbe Bëtsábioye jëtschuayama tmojancantá chents ̈ ana , Olivos tjashoye tmojë ́ ftsanbocana .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: Jesús tojanë ́ yana : — Nÿetsca ts ̈ ëngaftanga quem ibeta áts ̈ beñe os ̈ buáchiyana s ̈ mochantsobuets ̈ e y s ̈ mochántsacheta , er Bëngbe Bëtsabe uabemana palabrënguiñe , cha mënts ̈ á tojánayana : “ Chë oveshënga abuajë ́ nÿa chanjóba y chë oveshënga mochantsáshana ca . ” Chca ts ̈ ëngaftangaftaca echanjopása , uayayënga chas ̈ mojishache ora .

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Pero obanënguents ̈ ana chaitayenents ̈ ana , ts ̈ ëngaftangbe natsana Galileoye chanjá ca — cha tojanë ́ yana .

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: Chora Pedro tbojaniyana : — Masque nÿetscanga ácbeñe os ̈ buáchiyana chamotsobuets ̈ e y chamotsacheta , ats ̈ e nÿa ndocna te ca .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Chora Jesús tbojaniyana : — Ndegombre cbëyana , cam ibeta , ngallo cabá uta soye ndëcánta ora , aca unga soye cochanjayana ndoñe s ̈ conduabuatma ca .

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: Pero Pedro más yojtsichamo : — Masque chas ̈ otsemna ácaftaca jóbanama , ats ̈ e ndoñe quichátayana ndoñe cbonduabuatma ca . Y nÿetscanga cachcá imojtsichamo .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: Chents ̈ ana , canÿe luare Getsemaní ca uabáinoye tmojána . Chocna Jesús tojanë ́ yana : “ Muents ̈ e motbiama , chëntscuana ats ̈ e choye chanjá , Bëngbe Bëtsáftaca jencuéntama ca . ”

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Y tojë ́ ftsanëbiats ̈ e Pedro , Santiago y Juan . Choca cha yojónts ̈ a puerte ngménaca jtsemnama y corente cochtsets ̈ enaná .

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: Chë ́ ngbioye tojanë ́ yana : “ Ats ̈ be ainana puerte ngménaca entsemna , mo jobanamcá . Muents ̈ e moquedanga y s ̈ mochtsefs ̈ na ca . ”

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: Chents ̈ ana , Jesús más natsanoye tojána , tojanoshëntsaments ̈ é y fshantsóntscoca tojanotsejbéna y Bëngbe Bëtsábioye tbojanimpadá , jopódianëse , chë ts ̈ a japadésa ora ndoñe chaondóshjanguama .

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: Mënts ̈ á yojtsichamo : “ Ats ̈ be Taitá , aca lempe jamama condobena ; tojopodese , cochjama ats ̈ e japadésama ndoñe chas ̈ ondë ́ tsemnama . Pero nts ̈ amo ats ̈ e stsebos ̈ cá ndoñe chaondë ́ tsemna , sinó nts ̈ amo aca cojtsebos ̈ cá ca . ”

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Chents ̈ ana , chabe unga uatsjéndayëngbioye tojtanabo , y chëngna imnétsomañe . Chca tojánanÿena ora , Pédrëbioye tbojaniyana : “ Simón , ¿ cotsomañe ? ¿ Ni mo nÿe canÿe hora jtsefs ̈ nama ndoñe tconjobená ?

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: S ̈ mochtsefs ̈ na y Bëngbe Bëtsáftaca s ̈ mochtsencuéntaye , bacna soye jamama ndoñe chacmondócochënguama . Ts ̈ ëngaftanga ndegombre s ̈ montsebos ̈ e espíritoca Bëngbe Bëtsá joyeunayana , pero cuerpiñe ndoñe añemo ques ̈ mátsbomna ca . ”

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Jesús cachiñe tojesaná y Bëngbe Bëtsáftaca tbojanencuentá , cach palabrënga jayanëse .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Yojtabo orna , chë uatsjéndayënga cachiñe imnétsomañe ; chënga imojtsefshétana ocnaye causa , y ndoñe imontsobena nts ̈ amo jojuana .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Chents ̈ ana , tojtesaná y tojtanabo ora tojanë ́ yana : “ ¿ Cabá s ̈ motsomañe y s ̈ motsochnañe ? Nÿe nÿets ̈ á ; hora tocjobuache , Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá bacna soye amëngbe cucuats ̈ iñe mochanjáboshjona .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: Motsbananga , cuajna . Minÿënga , ats ̈ e boshjuaná ya entsebeconá ca . ”

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Jesús cabá yojtsóyebuambnantscuana , Judas , canÿe chë bnë ́ tsana uta uatsjendayënguents ̈ á , tojánashjango y cháftaca ba ents ̈ anga espadë ́ jangaca y ngarotbéngaca prontánënga . Chënga imojamna chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga , ley abuátambayënga y judië ́ ngbeñe bëtsëjemëngcá mándayëngbe ichmónënga .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Judas , chë boshjuaná , tojanjuabó nts ̈ amo jamana ents ̈ anga jinÿanÿiyama ndëmua Jesús bétsemnana . Chíyeca , yojáuyana : “ Nda chaijauámocho , cha echántsemna ; s ̈ mochjishache y cuedádoca s ̈ mochjuánatse ca . ”

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Chcasna , Judas Jesúsbioye tojanobeconá y tbojaniyana : “ ¡ Buatëmbayá ca ! ” Y tbojanámocho .

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: Chora chë ents ̈ anga tmojánishache y tmojanánatse .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: Pero canÿa chents ̈ e Jesúseftaca yojtsemná , chabe espadëja yojenosëngbotë ́ nts ̈ ena , y chë bachnangbe más uámana amëndayabe oservená canÿe matscuas ̈ e tbojtsanë ́ stjango .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: Y Jesús chë ents ̈ anga tojanatjá : “ ¿ Ndáyeca s ̈ mojabo espadë ́ jangaca y ngarotbéngaca ats ̈ e jishachama , mo ats ̈ e canÿe bacá uamana ents ̈ á cuaftsemncá ca ?

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: Ats ̈ e cada te ts ̈ ëngaftangbeñe sëndétsemna Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnoca abuátambaye , y ndocna te choca ches ̈ mátanishache . Pero ts ̈ ëngaftanga chca áts ̈ eftaca s ̈ montsama , cachcá nts ̈ amo Bëngbe Bëtsabe uabemana palabrënguiñe endayancá chaotsemnama ca ” — tojánayana .

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Chorna , nÿetsca uatsjéndayënga tmojtsanëuatjaná y tmojtsanacheta , y Jesús cachcá chë uayayë ́ ngaftaca tmojesanonÿá .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: Canÿe bobontse Jesúsbioye ibojtsë ́ stona , nÿe canÿe uafjantse ents ̈ ë ́ jua uichëtjoná . Cha chë ents ̈ anga tmojánishache ,

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: pero chëngbe cucuats ̈ iñe chë ents ̈ ë ́ jua jesáboshjonëse , chë bobontsna enas ̈ á yojtsachá .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: Chents ̈ ana , Jesús tmojanánatse chë bachnangbe más uámana amëndayábioye ; y chocna , nÿetsca chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga , bëtsëjemëngcá amë ́ ndayënga y ley abuátambayënga tmojánenefjna .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: Pedro bënocana Jesús tbojanasto , chë bachnangbe más uámana amëndayabe yebnents ̈ a chashjóntscoñe ; y chents ̈ e tojanoquedá . Chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnoca josticië ́ ngaftaca yojtsetbemana ; iñe juachaca yojtses ̈ bonena .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga y chë judiëngbe uámana mándayënga imojtsenguaye canÿa , nda ndayánaca Jesusbe contra cháuayana , as jobenayama cha chaóbana ca jayanama ; pero ndoñe montsaninÿana .

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: Er masque banga Jesusbe contra uayátsenaye soyënga imojtsichamo , nÿetscanga ndoñe cachca soye montsanichamo .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Báseftanga imojotsaye y mënts ̈ á Jesusbe contra , ndoñe ndegombre betsemncá tmojánayana :

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: “ Bënga cha fsënjoyeuná mënts ̈ á : ‘ Ats ̈ e quem Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebna , ents ̈ angbe pormana yebna , chantsepochóca ; y unga tese inÿe Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebna , ents ̈ ángbeyeca ndëpormana yebna chanjëtsjebo ca . ’ ”

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Pero masque chca imojtsichamo , nÿetscanga ndoñe cachca soye montsanichamo .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Chorna , chë bachnangbe más uámana amëndayá yojotsbaná , nÿetscangbe tsëntsaca yojotsaye , y Jesúsbioye tbojantjá : — ¿ Ndocá cochanjayana ? ¿ Ndayase yojtsemna chë acbe contra montsichamo soye ca ?

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: Pero cha nÿe iytëca yojtsemna y ndocá ibontsëjuana . Chë bachnangbe más uámana amëndayá cachiñe tbojtëtantjá , mënts ̈ á : — ¿ Aca chë Cristo icomna , Bëngbe Bëtsá chë nda fsëndadoranabe Uaquiñá ca ?

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Y Jesús tbojanjuá : — Arseñor , ats ̈ e cha sëndmëna ; y ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ mochanjinÿe , ats ̈ e , Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá , chë nÿets obenana bomnabe cats ̈ bioica chantsetbemana , y celoca jants ̈ etëshiñe chántsaboye ca .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Chora , chë bachnangbe más uámana amëndayá chabe uichëtjonëjuangá yojtsenánts ̈ ajatanëca , puerte ibojtsetna causa , y tojánayana : — ¿ Ndayama más ents ̈ anga s ̈ ochjátëjaboto Jesusbe contra chamuayanama ca ?

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: Ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ monjouena nts ̈ amo chë ents ̈ á entsichamcá , y chca Bëngbe Bëtsabiama entsemna mo cha cuafjoyenguangcá , chë chabe Uaquiñá yomna ca cha tonjayana ora . ¿ Nts ̈ amo ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ matjayana ca ? — cha tojanë ́ yana . Y nÿetscanga tmojánayana , cha ndegombre bacna soye yojtsebomna y jóbanama ibojtsemna ca .

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: Chorna báseftanga tmojanonts ̈ é Jesús buashëtjnayana ; jubiá imojútsbotse , imojtsejants ̈ etaye y imojtsetjanaye : “ ¡ Momalisiá nda tcmënjajants ̈ etá ca ! ” Y chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnoca josticiëngna imojtsajuebjants ̈ etaye .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: Pédrëna , tsmanoca yojtsemna chashjoca . Chora , canÿe shembása , chë bachnangbe más uámana amëndayabe oservená yojáshjango ;

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: y Pédrëbioye tbojáninÿe ora , cha iñe juachaca yojtsans ̈ bonena , yejuana ibojonÿinÿiye y tbojaniyana : — Acnaca , Jesús Nazaretocáftaca conjánana ca .

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: Pero Pedro tojánayana chábioye ndoñe bonjanabuátma ca ; y mënts ̈ á tojánayana : — Ndayama cojtsichámuama ndoñe quetsátstats ̈ ëmbo , ni ques ̈ nátësertana ca . Y shjoye , amashjuanóntscoñe yojábocna ; y chora canÿe ngallo yojacánta .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: Chë oservená cachiñe Pédrëbioye tbojáninÿe y tojanonts ̈ é chë ínÿenga jauyanana : — Muánaca Jesusbe uatsjendayënguents ̈ á entsemna ca .

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: Pero chana cachiñe tojánayana Jesúsbioye ndoñe bonjanabuátma ca . Chents ̈ ana , chë chents ̈ e imojtsemnënga Pedro tmojátaniyana : — Ndegombre aca chënguents ̈ á contsemna ; ácnaca Galileocá contsemna ca .

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Pero Pedro tojanonts ̈ é ichámuana : — ¡ Bëngbe Bëtsá chas ̈ otsecastigá ndoñe ndegombre soye stsichámëse ca ! — y yojónts ̈ a júrayana — ¡ Ats ̈ e chë ents ̈ á ndoñe quetsatabuatma , ndabiama ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ montsatsëtsná ca !

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Y cachora chë ngallo uta soyama yojacánta , y Pedro yojenójuaboye nts ̈ amo Jesús tbojaniyanama : “ Ngallo cabá uta soye ndëcánta ora , aca unga soye cochanjayana ndoñe s ̈ conduabuatma ca . ” Y tojanonts ̈ é enóbos ̈ achiyana .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Tojanbinÿna ora , chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga , chë judië ́ ngbeñe bëtsëjemëngcá amë ́ ndayënga y ley abuátambayënga cánÿents ̈ e tmojánenefjna , nÿetsca chë luarents ̈ a más uámana mandayë ́ ngaftaca , jenóyeunayama nts ̈ amo jamëse Jesús jóbama . Jesús tmojanëcuébatsëca y tmojanánatse , y Pilato , chë Judeoca mandadbe cucuats ̈ iñe tmojánboshjona .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: Pilato Jesúsbioye tbojantjá : — ¿ Aca chë judiëngbe rey cojtsemna ca ? Y Jesús tbojanjuá : — Aíñe , aca ndegombre yomncá tcjayana ca .

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga bëtscá soyënga Jesusbe contra imojtsichamo ;

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: chíyeca Pilato cachiñe Jesúsbioye tbojantjá : — ¿ Ndocá s ̈ cochanjojuá ca ? Minÿe ; bëtscá soyënga acbe contra montsichamo ca .

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: Pero Jesús ndoñe más tbonjanjuá ; chë causa , Pilato ndoñe yontsetáts ̈ ëmbo nts ̈ amo jajuaboyana .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: Cada Bashco fiesta ora , Pilato yojanamana canÿe utamená jëtsboshjonana , ndánaca ents ̈ anga tmojuabuayaná .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Chë tempo yojamna canÿa Barrabás ca uabainá ; cárceloye inautámena chabe enutë ́ ngaftaca . Chëngna ents ̈ anga tmojtsanëbaye , mandadëngbe ents ̈ ángaftaca imojentsjaná ora .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: Chora , ents ̈ anga tmojánashjajna y tmojanonts ̈ é Pilátbioye jauyanana , nts ̈ amo Bashco fiesta ora jamama yojanamancá chaomama .

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Y Pilato tojanë ́ jua : — ¿ Ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ mojtsebos ̈ e ts ̈ ëngaftangbe rey ats ̈ e chjëtsboshjona ca ?

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: Chca tojánayana , er Pilato yojtsetáts ̈ ëmbo , chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayëngna envidia causa Jesús chabe cucuats ̈ iñe tmojánboshjonama .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: Pero chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayëngna ents ̈ anga tmojanañemó chamuenbouénanama , Pilato jauyanama chëngbiama Barrabás chabuatsboshjona ca .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: Y Pilato tojanatjá : — ¿ Y nts ̈ amo chjama chë “ judiëngbe Rey ca ” s ̈ monduabobuatmáftaca ca ?

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: Y chënga tmojanáyebuachena : — ¡ Motsecrucificá ca !

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: Y Pilato ents ̈ anga tojanë ́ yana : — ¿ Ndáyeca ? ¿ Nts ̈ amo cha tojobuachjanguá ca ? Pero chëngna más añémoca tmojtë ́ tanayebuachena : — ¡ Motsecrucificá ca !

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: As Pilato , ents ̈ ángaftaca ts ̈ abá joquédama yojtsebós ̈ eyecna , Barrabás tbojtanboshjona . Yojámëndaye soldadënga jabuache Jesús chamotsets ̈ enama ; y chents ̈ ana soldadëngbe cucuats ̈ iñe tbojánboshjona , chamocrucificama .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: Chents ̈ ana , chë soldadënga Jesús tmojanánatse chë mandadbe bëts yebnents ̈ a chashjoye , y nÿetsca soldadënga tmojánachembo chamobéconama .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Shbuenda uafjatsenga uinÿna ents ̈ ayá mo reycá tmojanichëtjo ; canÿe coronë ́ sha tmojanapormá uchmas ̈ ë ́ fjangaca y tmojanabests ̈ ajó .

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Y chents ̈ ana tmojanonts ̈ é jachuayana : “ ¡ Bayté judiëngbe Rey cochtsemna ca ! ”

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: Canÿe niñë ́ fjaca Jesús bests ̈ as ̈ iñe imojtsë ́ tsjanjnaye , imojtsebuashëtjnaye , y chabe delante imojtsofshëntsaménts ̈ enaye .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: Y chca imnaftsáboyejuanents ̈ ana , chë shbuenda uafjatsenga ents ̈ ayá tmojtsanabotsca y cachabe ents ̈ ayá tmojtanichëtjo , y pueblo chaboye tmojanánatse jacrucifícama .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Chora , canÿe ents ̈ á chëjana yojtsatashjajuana , Simón ca uabainá , Cirene pueblocá , Alejandro y Rufbe taitá ; jajocana yojtsatachnëjuana ; y chë soldadëngna imojuatária Jesusbe cruz jëftsocutsayama .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Jesús tmojanánatse Gólgota ca uabaina luaroye ( hebreo biyañe endayana “ Obanabe Bests ̈ ashe Luare ca ” ) ;

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: y tmojanabuiyé vínoye mírraca enájuabniye , pero Jesús ndoñe yonjuáyëngacñe .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: Y chents ̈ ana tmojancrucificá ; y chabe ents ̈ ayangamna , tsbanánoye tmojanë ́ ts ̈ ena jinÿama ndayá cada ona yochjëftsanácñama .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Cachëse , base mos ̈ enana ora Jesús tmojancrucificá .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Y chabe bests ̈ as ̈ e juatsboicna canÿe uabemana soye tmojananjo . Chiñe yojétsayana ndáyeca cha tmojancrucificama , mënts ̈ á : MUA CHË JUDIËNGBE REY ENDMËNA ca .

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: Y cháftaca útata bacna soye ochjajnayátnaca tmojanacrucificá , canÿa chabe cats ̈ bioica , y ínÿana chabe uañicuayoica .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: Chca cháftaca tmojanma , chaochnënguama nts ̈ amo Bëngbe Bëtsabe uabemana palabrënguiñe chabiama iuayancá , mënts ̈ á : “ Y chábioye tmonjáninÿe mo chë puerte bacna soye amënguents ̈ á canÿa cuaftsemncá ca . ”

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Y chëjana imojtsachnëjuana ents ̈ anga , Jesús imojtsóyenguaye , imojtsobests ̈ fshanenaye y imojtsatsaye : “ ¡ Aca chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebna cochtsánenasatajchca y nÿe unga tese cochtanjebo ,

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: cach aca mentsbocá y cruzocana matastjango ca ! ”

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Cachcá chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga y chë ley abuátambayënga imojtsáboyejuana , y chënga imojtsenatsëtsnaye : “ Cha ínÿenga tojëftsatsebacá , pero cachá jéntsbocama ndoñe quenátobena .

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: ¡ Chë Cristo , chë Israeloca Rey ! ¡ Cruzocana chauatastjango , bënga jinÿama y chábeñe chaftsos ̈ buachema ca ! ” Y cháftaca ibojtsecrucificanátnaca ibojtsóyenguaye .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: Nÿetsto orscana y las tresë ́ ntscoñe , nÿets quem luare yojtseibétata .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Chca orna , Jesús chabe biyañe tojanáyebuachena : “ Eloi , Eloi , ¿ lema sabactani ca ? ” ( Chca endayana “ Ats ̈ be Bëtsá , ats ̈ be Bëtsá , ¿ ndáyeca cachcá s ̈ cojonÿá ca ? ” )

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Chca tmojanuena ora , báseftanga chents ̈ e imojtsemnënga imojtsichamo : “ Mouenënga , chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayá Elías bontsechembuana ca . ”

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: As chora , canÿa tojanótjajo , untja vínoyeca canÿe esponjëshe tojanfchecuacuá , canÿe niñëfjiñe tojananguësëtjo y Jesúsbioye tojanbeconá chaofs ̈ ema ; y tojánayana : “ Cachcá mochjonÿaye , er Elías tayochjabo jabátëstjanguama ca . ”

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Pero Jesusna , jabuache tojanoyó y tojanóbana .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Y chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnoca yojújonÿana ents ̈ ë ́ jua tsëntsaca yojtsenájataye , tsbanánocana fshantsoye . Chëjua bënë ́ jua inauamna y chë tsatsëntsaca inaújonÿana .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Chë romano soldadëngbe amëndayá , Jesusbe ndirichiñe yojtsemna ; y nts ̈ amo cha tojanobancá tbojáninÿe ora , tojánayana : “ ¡ Ndegombre quem boyabása Bëngbe Bëtsabe Uaquiñá yomna ca ! ”

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: Básefta shembásengnaca chents ̈ e imojtsemna , bënocana imojtserreparana ; chënguents ̈ e imojtsemna María Magdalena ; María , Santiago chë más basa y Josebe mamá ; y Salomé .

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: Chë shembásengna Jesús tmojanasto y tmojanájabuache cha Galileoca yojamna ora ; y inÿe ba shembásengnaca chents ̈ e imojtsemna , chë cháftaca Jerusalenoye tmojánanga .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: Chë yëfsana ochnayté yojtsémnayeca , cach te yojánamna saná japróntana chë yëfsana jasama . Ya yojtseibétatana ora ,

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: Pilato yojtsemnoye tojána canÿe boyabása , José ca uabainá , Arimatea pueblocá ; cha inamna canÿe chë luarents ̈ a uámana mandayënguents ̈ á . Cha Bëngbe Bëtsábeñe yojtsos ̈ buáchiye y yojanobátmana chabe amë ́ ndayana chaóshjanguama . Ndauatjcá Pilátbioye Jesusbe cuerpo tbojanotjañe .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: Pilato yojenjnaná Jesús ts ̈ a betsco yojóbanama ; as tojanmandá chë soldadëngbe amëndayá chamuachembo , jatjayama Jesús ya bën obaná tayojétsemnama .

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: Chë soldadëngbe amë ́ ndayana Pilátbioye ibojauyana Jesús ya obaná yojtsemna ca ; y as chora , Josébioye tbojanlesenciá Jesusbe cuerpo chabotsámbañama .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: Chora , José canÿe uafjantse lino ents ̈ ë ́ jua tojanabuamé , Jesusbe cuerpo cruzocana tbojanë ́ stjango , chë lino ents ̈ ë ́ juaca tbojanandmaná , y canÿe cuevëshiñe ndëts ̈ beñe pormánëshiñe tbojanjajó ; chents ̈ ana canÿe ndëts ̈ bé tojansjoná , y chë cuevëshoye amashjuanents ̈ e tojánachto .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: María Magdalena y María , chë José y Santiagbe mamá , tbojáninÿe ndayents ̈ e Jesusbe cuerpo tbojanjájoma .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Ochnayté tojanopasá ora , María Magdalena , María Santiagbe mamá , y Salomé , botamana uanguëts ̈ e béjaye tmojanabuamé , chíyeca jama Jesusbe cuerpo janëtjuama ;

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: y tmenguse , chë semana bojats ̈ éntena , cabá cachëse , shinÿe yojábocna ora , chë cuevëshoye tmojána .

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: Imojtsaye ora imojtsayénatsëtsnaye : “ ¿ Chë cuevëshoye amashjuanents ̈ a ndëts ̈ bé nda bochtsabuajuána ca ? ”

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Pero imojontjes ̈ iye ora , tmojáninÿe chë cuevëshoye amashjuanents ̈ a bëts ndëts ̈ bé , chents ̈ ana juanániñe .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: As chënga choye tmojánamashjna y choye tmojáninÿe canÿe bobontse bën uafjantse ents ̈ ë ́ jua uichëtjoná , chë cuevëshents ̈ a cats ̈ bioica inétsotbemañe ; y chë shembásenga imojouatjaná .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: Pero chë bobontse tojanë ́ yana : “ Ndoñe matauatjëngana ; ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ mondënguá Jesús Nazaretocá , chë tmonjancrucificá cha . Cha ya tontayena ; muents ̈ e ndoñe quenátsmëna . Minÿënga cha enjë ́ ftsejajonents ̈ e .

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: Motsajna , y Pedro y chë inÿe uatsjéndayënga s ̈ mochjáuyana : ‘ Jesús ts ̈ ëngaftangbe natsana Galileoye echanjá . Choca cha s ̈ mochanjinÿe , nts ̈ amo cachá tcmojanëyancá ca . ’ ”

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: As chë shembásenga betsco chë cuevëshents ̈ ana tmojésanbocana , er puerte auatjanánënga imojtsemna y ngmëmnayënga imojtsemna ; y chë causa , chë soyama ndocná tmonjaniyana .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: Jesús tojtanayenents ̈ ana , chë semana bojats ̈ enté , Jesús natsana María Magdalénbioye tbojánebëbocna . Tempo Jesús chábents ̈ ana canÿsëfta bacna bayëjënga tojtanë ́ buacana .

text: And she went and told them that had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
text2: Cha Jesúsbioye ainá tbojáninÿents ̈ ana , tojána Jesúseftaca imojánajnënga chama jaúnayama ; chëngna ngménaca y s ̈ achénaca imojtsemna .

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: Pero chënga tmojanjuabó nderado mo ndoñe ndegombre yontsemna ca , chë Jesús ainá yojtsemna ca , y María Magdalena chábioye tbojáninÿe ca tmojanuena ora .

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Chents ̈ ana , uta ustonátbioye , básefta yebnënga yojamna luaroye ibojétsaye ora , Jesús tojánebëbuacna , mo inÿa cuaftsemncá .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Chora chata tbojésanshëcona chë ínÿenga chama jacúntama ; pero chëngna cach ndoñe ndegombre ca tmojanjuabó .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Cabana , Jesús chë bnë ́ tsana canÿe uatsjéndayënga tojánebëbuacna , chënga imojtsesaye ora ; y tojanëcácana chë cha ainá yojtsemnama ndoñe ndegombre yontsemna ca tmojánjuaboma y nÿets ainánaca chábeñe ndoñe montsanos ̈ buachema , er cha ainá tmojáninÿënga chama tmojanacuntá ora , chca ndoñe ndegombre yontsemna ca chë uatsjéndayënga tmojánayana .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: Chents ̈ ana Jesús tojanë ́ yana : “ Nÿets luarëngoye motsajna , y nÿetsca ents ̈ anga chë ts ̈ abe noticiëngama s ̈ mochtsabuayiynaye .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: Nda chiñe chaojtsos ̈ buaché y ts ̈ ëngaftanga chas ̈ mojuabaye , cha atsbocaná echántsemna ; pero nda ndoñe tontsos ̈ buaché , cha nÿets tempo castiganá echántsemna .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: Chë áts ̈ beñe os ̈ buáchiyënga ndegombre soyënga imojtsabuayiynama , ents ̈ anga mënts ̈ á mochántsetats ̈ ëmbo : ats ̈ e jóts ̈ ëmbonëse , áts ̈ beñe betsos ̈ buachéyeca , ents ̈ ángbents ̈ ana bacna bayëjëngbe juabna mochantábocna ; tempo chënga ndmabiyañe mochantsóyebuambnaye .

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: Masque nderado cucuats ̈ iñe mëts ̈ cuayënga tmojishache o veneno tmojofs ̈ enga , ndocá quemochatspása ; y s ̈ oquë ́ ngbeñe cucuats ̈ ënga chamojacjá ora , chënga shnánënga mochántsatsmëna ca ” — Jesús tojanë ́ yana .

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: Bëngbe Utabná Jesús jóyebuambayama tojanpochocá chents ̈ ana , celoye cha tmojtanatsbaná , y uámana luarents ̈ e , Bëngbe Bëtsabe cats ̈ bioica yojtótbema jtsemándayama .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Y chë uatsjéndayëngna tmojánbocana y Bëngbe Bëtsabe soyëngama nÿetsquénache ents ̈ anga tmojanabuayená . Cach Bëngbe Utabná chënga yojanëjabuáchana , y yojánama ents ̈ anga chamotsetats ̈ ëmbuama chë buayenana soye ndegombre Bëngbe Bëtsabe soyënga bétsemnama , chë uatsjéndayënga bëts soyënga jamama obenana chamotsebomnama cha jtsamëse .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: Ba ents ̈ anga Jesusbe historia tmojuábema , nts ̈ amo bë ́ ngbeñe ndegombre tojopasacá .

text: Even as they delivered them unto us , which from the beginning were eyewitnesses , and ministers of the word ;
text2: Chë historia juabemamna , chënga tmojanuena nts ̈ amo Jesusbe uatsjéndayënga y inÿe ents ̈ anga chabiama imnencuentaycá . Chë ents ̈ angna tmojáninÿe y tmojanuena ndayá Jesús tojanmama y nts ̈ amo tojanayancá , y chents ̈ ana chabe ts ̈ abe noticiënga ents ̈ ángbioye tmojanabuayená .

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: As , áts ̈ naca sënjonts ̈ é cuedádoca juanotíciana lempe nts ̈ amo Jesusbiama imojtsichamcá , tojanobojats ̈ ents ̈ ana më ́ ntscoñe . Mora s ̈ ontsinÿana ts ̈ abá yojtsemna acbiama juabemana nts ̈ amo ndegombre yomncá , uámana taitá Teófilo , chë tijuanoticiá soyëngama , nts ̈ amo ndegombre bë ́ ngbeñe tojopasacá .

text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things , wherein thou hast been instructed .
text2: Ba soyënga Jesusbiama tcmojabuátëmbanga , y ats ̈ e së ́ ntsebos ̈ e aca chacotsetáts ̈ ëmbo , nts ̈ amo tcojouencá ndegombre yomnama .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Herodes Judea luaroca rey inamna ora , yojamna canÿe judiëngbe bachna , Zacarías ca uabainá . Cha yojamna Abíasbe bachnanguents ̈ a pamillo . Chabe shemna , Isabel ca yojanabaina , y chana Aarónbents ̈ ana ents ̈ á inamna ( Aarón , chë más uámana bachnangbe natsana amëndayá ) .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: Chatna ts ̈ abá amata ibnamna Bëngbe Bëtsabe bominÿiñe , y nts ̈ amo Bëngbe Bëtsá yomandacá ibojoyena ; y chca , ndocná yonjanobena jayanana chata ndoñe ts ̈ abá ibonjánama ca .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Básenga tondaye ibonjánabamna , Isabel s ̈ es ̈ ona jtsebomnama ndobena causa , y chatna ya bëtsanánata ibojtsemna .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: Chë bachnanga Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnents ̈ e tmojtsoservena ora , sempre imojanamana jabocacayana , nda ts ̈ abá tbojtsonÿená , Bëngbe Bëtsábioye atschuanaye luaroye cháuama incienso jajuinÿiyama . Canÿe , Zacaríasbe ents ̈ anga Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnoca , Bëngbe Bëtsábents ̈ e imojtsoservena orna , Zacaríasbioye ts ̈ abá ibojonÿena ; y chca , cha ibojotóca jana incienso jajuinÿiyana .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Zacarías , incienso yojtsejuinÿnantscuana , ba ents ̈ anga shjoca imojtsemna , Bëngbe Bëtsáftaca encuéntaye .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Nÿe ndeolpe , Bëngbe Utabnabe canÿe ángel tojanonÿná chë incienso jajuinÿiyama altarents ̈ a cats ̈ bioica .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Zacarías chábioye tbojáninÿe ora , tojanenjnaná y corente uatjana tbojanábuache .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: Chora chë ángel tbojaniyana : — Zacarías , ndoñe matauatjana . Bëngbe Bëtsá tonjouena nts ̈ amo tconjaimpadacá . Acbe shema Isabel canÿe s ̈ es ̈ ona bochántsebomna , boyabásetema , y chana Juan ca cochjuabaye .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: Chama aca corente oyejuayá cochántsemna , y bëtscá ents ̈ anga mochanjóyejuaye acbe uaquiñá tojonÿnama .

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Er cha , Bëngbe Bëtsabiama canÿe uámana ents ̈ á echántsemna . Ndocna te queochaisofs ̈ iye vínoye , ni jabuáchiye . Chë Uámana Espíritu chabe ainaniñe echantsemándaye , cha cabá ndonÿna orscana .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: Banga Israeloca ents ̈ anga , nts ̈ amo cha chaojayanama mochanjonts ̈ é joyeunayana Bëngbe Bëtsá , chëngbe Utabná .

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Cha echanjáshjango chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe Uámana Uabuayanabe natsana , y echántsebomna obenana y canÿe espíritu nts ̈ amo chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayá Elías inabomncá . Chabe natsana echanjáshjango , bëtsë ́ tsanga chëngbe básengaftaca ndoñe chamondë ́ tsentsjanama , y chë nduauenanënga cachiñe chamotsatsjuabnama nts ̈ amo chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe bominÿiñe ts ̈ abá amënga mondbetsejuabnaycá . Y chca , ents ̈ anga cha echantsapróntaye Bëngbe Utabná jabama orscama ca — chë ángel tbojaniyana .

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: As Zacarías chë ángelbioye tbojantjá : — ¿ Nts ̈ amo ats ̈ e stjobenaye jtsetats ̈ ëmbuana chë s ̈ contsatsá soye ndegombre bétsemnama ? Er ats ̈ e ya bëtsëjema së ́ ntsemna y ats ̈ be shémnaca cachcá ca .

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Chora chë ángel tbojanjuá : — Zacarías , ats ̈ e ángel Gabriel sëndmëna ; ats ̈ e Bëngbe Bëtsábioca sëndoservena . Cha s ̈ onjichmó chë ts ̈ abe noticiënga aca jauyanama y juenayama .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: Morna , chë cbontsatsá soyiñe ndoñe quecatos ̈ buaché causa , ndëbiá cochanjoquéda , y nts ̈ amo cbontsatsacá chaojopasá ora , chama tempo chaojtsemna ora , chora jóyebuambayama cochantobenaye ca .

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: Chë ángel Zacaríaseftaca yojtsóyebuambnantscuana , ents ̈ anga shjoca Zacaríasbiama imojtsobátmana , y mënts ̈ á imojtsejuabnaye : “ ¿ Ndáyeca ts ̈ a bën Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnents ̈ e ibojtsobiamná ca ? ”

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Zacarías tojtanbocna ora , ndoñe yontsobena chë ents ̈ ángaftaca jóyebuambayana . Chënga tmojántats ̈ ëmbona , chë Bëngbe Bëtsábioye atschuanayents ̈ e Zacarías mo otjenayoquëcá Bëngbe Bëtsábiocana canÿe soye tojáninÿama , er chë ́ ngbioye jats ̈ ëmbombonana yojáuyana , ndëbiá yojoquéda causa .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Chabe tempo , chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnents ̈ e jtsetrabájayama tojanpochocá ora , Zacarías cachabe yebnoye tojtaná .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: Chents ̈ ana baseftaytese , chabe shema Isabel ngomamaná yojoquéda , y chë causa , chë shema shachna ishinÿe cach tsoca yebnents ̈ e totanoquedá .

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: Cha mënts ̈ á yojtsichamo : “ Bëngbe Utabná mora ats ̈ biama tojtenojuabó , ents ̈ ángbents ̈ e ats ̈ be ngménana jtsebojuánama , básenga tondaye béntsabamna causa ca . ”

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Isabel chnë ́ nguana ishinÿe ngomamaná yojtsemna ora , Bëngbe Bëtsá , ángel Gabriel tbojanichmó Galilea luaroye , Nazaret ca uabaina puebloye ,

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: canÿe shembása María ca uabainá jauatsëtsayama . Mariyna cabá boyabása nduabuatmá inamna , pero Joséftaca jobouamayama tbojans ̈ buachená . Y Josena , rey Davídbents ̈ ana ents ̈ á inamna .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: Chë ángel Maríybioye tojána y mënts ̈ á tbojanchuá : — ¡ Mouena . Bëngbe Bëtsá ts ̈ abe bendición acbiama tonjama ! ¡ Bëngbe Utabná ácaftaca entsemna ca !

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: Chca tojanuena ora , María yojenjnaná chë soyama , y yojtsejuabnaye ndáyeca chë ángel chca tbojanchuama .

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: Chora chë ángel tbojaniyana : — María , ndoñe matauatjana , Bëngbe Bëtsá entsama ts ̈ abe bendicionënga chacotsebomnama .

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: Aca ngomamaná cochanjoquéda y canÿe s ̈ es ̈ ona boyabásetema cochántsebomna , y chana Jesús ca cochjuabaye .

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: Cha puerte echantsámana , y ents ̈ angna Bëngbe Bëtsabe Uaquiñá ca chábioye mochantsábobuatma . Y Bëngbe Bëtsá chë Utabná , chábioye canÿe rey bochanjábema , nts ̈ amo David yojamncá ,

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: y Jacóbëbents ̈ ana ents ̈ anga nÿetsca tescama echántsamëndaye , y chabe mándayana ndocna te queochaisopochóca ca — chë ángel tbojaniyana .

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: Chents ̈ ana María chë ángelbioye tbojantjá : — ¿ Nts ̈ amo chca yochjopása , cabá ndoñe boyá sëntsebomnëse ca ?

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: Y chë ángel tbojanjuá : — Chë Uámana Espíritu echanjabo nÿets ácbeñe , y Bëngbe Bëtsabe obenánaca ngomamaná cochanjoquéda . Chabe obenana mo jants ̈ etëshcá cmochanjaboútsbotse ; chíyeca chë echanjónÿna s ̈ es ̈ ona Uamaná echántsemna , y chábioye Bëngbe Bëtsabe Uaquiñá ca mochantsábobuatma .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: Mouena , Isabel , acbe primá , canÿe s ̈ es ̈ ona bochántsebomna , masque ya bëtsananá cha entsemna ; chë “ s ̈ es ̈ ona ndbomná ca ” monjanabobuatmá , mora ya chnë ́ nguana ishinÿe ngomamaná entsemna ,

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: er Bëngbe Bëtsá lempe jamama endobena ca — cha tojánayana .

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: Chora María chë ángelbioye tbojaniyana : — Bëngbe Bëtsabe oservená ats ̈ e së ́ ntsemna . Bëngbe Bëtsá áts ̈ eftaca chaoma nts ̈ amo s ̈ cojauyancá ca . Y chents ̈ ana chë ángel tojtsatanoñe .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: Chents ̈ ana , María tojanoprontá y tojanochëmo canÿe puebloye , Judeoca tjañenache luariñe .

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Chocna cha , Zacaríasbe yebnents ̈ e tojánamashëngo y Isabélbioye tbojanchuá .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: Isabel nts ̈ amo María tbojanchuama tojanuena ora , Isabelbe s ̈ es ̈ ona chabe uafsbioye tojanobonjó , y chë Uámana Espíritu Isabélbeñe tojánamashëngo chabe ainaniñe jtsemándayama .

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: Chcasna , Isabel jabuache tojánayana : — ¡ Bëngbe Bëtsá acbiama más ts ̈ abe bendicionënga entsama nÿetsca shembásengbiama , y chë cochántsebomna s ̈ es ̈ onbiámnaca cachcá !

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: Ats ̈ e merecido taitsatobuajoñe , ats ̈ be Utabnabe mamá chas ̈ uabobuáchama ;

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: er ats ̈ e sënjouena nts ̈ amo s ̈ conjachuá , y cachora ats ̈ be s ̈ es ̈ ona oyejuayá ats ̈ be uafsbioye tonjobonjó .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: ¡ Aca Bëngbe Bëtsábeñe tcojos ̈ buaché ; cojtsetáts ̈ ëmbo Bëngbe Bëtsá nts ̈ amo tcmojas ̈ buachenacá yochjamama ; chíyeca puerte oyejuayá cochántsemna ca !

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: Chora María tojánayana : “ Nÿets ainánaca Bëngbe Utabná chantsadorana ,

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: y Bëngbe Bëtsá , ats ̈ be Atsbocayabiama corente chanjóyejuaye .

text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden : for , behold , from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed .
text2: Bëngbe Bëtsá ats ̈ biama tojtenojuabó , ats ̈ e chabe oservénëjema . Er morscana muents ̈ a ents ̈ anga nÿetscanga puerte oyejuayá ca s ̈ mochantsábobuatma .

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Bëngbe Bëtsá , chë nÿets obenana bomná , chabe obenánaca bëts soyënga ats ̈ biama tonjama . ¡ Bëngbe Bëtsá puerte Uamaná ca entsabaina !

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: ¡ Morsca ents ̈ anga y más chcoyënga , chábioye yeunanëngbiama , cha sempre bochántsengmena !

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: Cha , chabe obenánaca bëts soyënga tojama , y chë nÿe cachënga bëtsë ́ tsanga enobiamnayëngbe juabna tojtsepochocá ;

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: reyë ́ ngbioye chëngbe mándayents ̈ ana tojtsatsats ̈ e ; pero chë nÿe cachënga bëtsë ́ tsanga ndenobiamnayë ́ ngbioye , uámanënga tojábiama .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Chë shë ́ ntseca imomnë ́ ngbioye , chamosama bëtscá cha tojats ̈ atá , pero chë bomnë ́ ngbioyna tondaye tonjats ̈ atá .

text: He hath holpen his servant Israel , in remembrance of his mercy ;
text2: Cha tojanë ́ jabuache chabe ents ̈ anga Israeloca , chabe oservénënga , y ndoñe tbonjánebnatjëmba jtsalastemánana ,

text: As he spake to our fathers , to Abraham , and to his seed for ever .
text2: nÿetsca tescama chë Abraham y chábents ̈ ana ents ̈ ángbioye , nts ̈ amo bëngbe bëts taitanga Bëngbe Bëtsá tojanas ̈ ebuachenacá ca ” — cha tojánayana .

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: Mariyna unga ishinÿe Isabélaftaca tojanoquedá , y chents ̈ ana cachabe yebnoye tojtaná .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Isabel jtses ̈ ócanama tojanónts ̈ abuache ora , canÿe s ̈ es ̈ ona boyabásetema tojanonÿná .

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: Isabelbe juachañe oyenënga y chabe pamíllanga tmojántats ̈ ëmbona nts ̈ amo Bëngbe Bëtsá chábioye ibojalastemama , y chama corente Isabélaftaca tmojanoyejuanga .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Chë s ̈ es ̈ ona posuftayté yojtsebomna ora , tmojánashjango y chëtémbioye chë más delicadents ̈ e base bobachtema tmojantëts ̈ e , nts ̈ amo chë judiënga imojanamancá . Chënga imojétsebos ̈ e chë s ̈ es ̈ ónbioye Zacarías ca juabáyana , cach beftcá ;

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: pero chabe mamá tojanë ́ yana : — Ndoñe . Quem s ̈ es ̈ ona echantsabaina Juan ca .

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: As chënga Isabélbioye tmojaniyana : — Acbe pamíllangbeñe ndocná chca quenatabaina ca .

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Chora chënga jats ̈ ëmbombonana Zacaríasbioye tmojantjá , nts ̈ amo chë s ̈ es ̈ ona chaotsabainama cha yojtsebos ̈ e ca .

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: Zacaríasna jats ̈ ëmbombonana canÿe tablëbé tojanëyá y chiñe tojanábema : “ Cha entsabaina Juan ca ” . Y chë causa , nÿetscanga ojnanánënga imojtsemna .

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Y cachora Zacarías jóyebuambayama yojtobenaye , y yojonts ̈ é Bëngbe Bëtsábioye jëtschuayana .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Chë juachañe oyenënga nÿetscanga tmojanëuatjaná , y Judeoca nÿetsca chë tjañenache luariñe ents ̈ anga chë soyëngama imojtsencuéntaye .

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: Nÿetscanga chë soyëngama tmojántats ̈ ëmbona ora , chë ́ ngnaca corente chama imojtsejuabnaye y mënts ̈ á imojtsichamo : “ ¿ Chë básetema , bëtsá ora nda yochtsemna ca ? ” Y ndegombre , Bëngbe Bëtsabe obenana cháftaca yojtsemna .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: Chë Uámana Espíritu tbojanmandá ora , Zacarías , chë basetembe taitá , Bëngbe Bëtsabe mándoca jtsóyebuambnayëse , mënts ̈ á tojánayana :

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: “ ¡ Chë Utabná , chë Israeloca ents ̈ angbe Bëtsá matschuanga , er cha tonjabo chabe ents ̈ anga jabújabuachama y jabátsebacama !

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Cha bochanjíchmua canÿe atsebacayá puerte obenana bomná , y cha echántsemna Bëngbe Bëtsabe oservená Davídbents ̈ ana ents ̈ á ;

text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets , which have been since the world began :
text2: nts ̈ amo Bëngbe Bëtsá bayté entsemna , chë chabe juabna oyebuambnayëngbiajana , chë chábenga imomnëngbiajana bënga s ̈ ojanas ̈ ebuachenacá , mënts ̈ á :

text: That we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all that hate us ;
text2: Cha canÿa bochjanichmuá bëngbe uayayënga y nÿetsca uaboyënjëngbiama bënga jabátsebacama ;

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: bëngbe bëtsë ́ tsangbioye jálastemama , y jenójuaboyama y jamama chabe uámana trato ,

text: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham ,
text2: nts ̈ amo Bëngbe Bëtsá , bëts taitá Abrahámbioye tbojans ̈ buachenacá .

text: That he would grant unto us , that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear ,
text2: Cha tbojans ̈ buachená bëngbe uayayëngbiama bënga jabátsebacama , chca , bënga ndauatjcá Bëngbe Bëtsá jasérviama ,

text: In holiness and righteousness before him , all the days of our life .
text2: y chabe ents ̈ angcá , nÿetsca soyënguiñe ts ̈ abá amënga , Bëngbe Bëtsabe delante nÿetsca te bëngbe vidënguiñe jëftsiyenama .

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: Y aca , ats ̈ be básetemna , Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayá ca cmochantsábobuatma , ents ̈ ángbioye Bëngbe Bëtsabe soyëngama cochtsabuayiynama , Bëngbe Utabná cabá ndáshjango ora , bacna soyënga amana chamuajbanama ; as Bëngbe Bëtsá chëngbe bacna soyënga echanjáperdonaye , y Bëngbe Utabná jabama mochantsopróntaye .

text: Through the tender mercy of our God ; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us ,
text2: Bëngbe Bëtsá bënga puerte s ̈ ualastemánayeca , canÿa bëngbe juabnënga binÿnayá bochanjíchmua , bënga chë bacna soyënga causa mo ibetiñcá y obanëngbe luarents ̈ cá vida bomnë ́ ngbioye jabátsebacama , y jabuátambama nts ̈ amo natjë ́ mbana jtsiyenana ca ” — cha tojánayana .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: Chë básetema yojonts ̈ é jobóchana y chabe espíritnaca puerte . Bayté , ents ̈ anga ndoyena luarënguenache cha yojëftsiyena , Bëngbe Bëtsá Israeloca ents ̈ ángbioye cha tojáninÿanÿentscuana . Chents ̈ ana , chamuábuatmanamna tojanonts ̈ é Israeloca ents ̈ ángbeñe jóyebuambayana .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: Chë tempo yojamna canÿe Romoca bëts mandado , Augusto ca uabainá ; y cha , chë natsanama tojanmandá nÿetsca ents ̈ anga chamuenábemama .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Chë soye tojanochnëngo Cirenio ca uabainá Sirioca mandado yojamna ora .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Chamna , nÿetscanga tojanotocá jtangana jenábemëngama , cada ona ndë ́ moca chëngbe bëts taitanga imojëftsiyena puebloye .

text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee , out of the city of Nazareth , into Judaea , unto the city of David , which is called Bethlehem ; ( because he was of the house and lineage of David : )
text2: As , Josénaca Galilea luarents ̈ ana Nazaretocana yojë ́ ftsebocna y Judeoye , Belén puebloye , tojtaná . Tempo , Josebe bëts taitá rey David , Belenoca inoyena . Y José , Davídbents ̈ ana ents ̈ á inámnayecna , choye jenábemama tojtaná .

text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife , being great with child .
text2: Maríaftaca tojána jenábemama , y muana tbojans ̈ buachená Joséftaca jobouamayama . María ngomamaná yojtsemna ,

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: y Belenoca ibojtsemnëntscuana , chë ora tbojanónts ̈ abuache jtses ̈ ócanama .

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
text2: Y chents ̈ e María ibojtsebomna chabe natsana s ̈ es ̈ ona , canÿe boyabásetema . Posadoca tondaye luare yontsemna causna , chata nÿe uacnëngbe átana tambuents ̈ e tbojanoquedá . Y Jesús tojanonÿná orna , María tbojtanëntsacjuá y canÿe bachetémiñe tbojanjajó .

text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field , keeping watch over their flock by night .
text2: Belén béconana , chë ibeta , oveshënga abuajë ́ nÿanga shëntsjoca cachëngbe oveshë ́ ngaftaca imojtsemna .

text: And , lo , the angel of the Lord came upon them , and the glory of the Lord shone round about them : and they were sore afraid .
text2: Nÿe ndeolpe , Bëngbe Bëtsábiocana canÿe ángel tojánebëbuacna , y Bëngbe Bëtsábents ̈ ana corente yojtsebuashinÿinÿana chëngbe shëconániñe . Chama chënga puerte imojocochauatjaná .

text: And the angel said unto them , Fear not : for , behold , I bring you good tidings of great joy , which shall be to all people .
text2: Chora chë ángel tojanë ́ yana : “ Ndoñe matauatjëngana . Sënjabo ts ̈ abe soyënga tonjopasama jábuayenama , nÿetscanga chamóyejuama .

text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour , which is Christ the Lord .
text2: Mora chë David tonjanonÿná pueblents ̈ e canÿe s ̈ es ̈ ona tonjonÿná . Cha ts ̈ ëngaftangbe atsebacayá echántsemna y ts ̈ ëngaftangbe ents ̈ angbiámnaca . Cha endmëna chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe Uámana Uabuayaná , Cristo ca uabainá , y Bëngbe Utabná .

text: And this shall be a sign unto you ; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes , lying in a manger .
text2: Ndegombre chca entsemnama mënts ̈ á s ̈ mochanjátats ̈ ëmbona : canÿe s ̈ es ̈ ona ntsacjuaná y uacnëngbe bachetémiñe jajoná s ̈ mochanjínÿena ca ” — cha tojanë ́ yana .

text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God , and saying ,
text2: Cachora , celocana mallajta angelënga chë natsana ángelbents ̈ e tmojánbocana y Bëngbe Bëtsábioye mënts ̈ á imojtsatschuanaye :

text: Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace , good will toward men .
text2: “ ¡ Bëngbe Bëtsá , celoca entsemná matschuanga ! Bëngbe Bëtsábioye yeunanëngbiama , Bëngbe Bëtsá corente entsoyejuá ; quem luariñe chë ́ ngbeñe puerte ts ̈ abá chaotsemna ca . ”

text: And it came to pass , as the angels were gone away from them into heaven , the shepherds said one to another , Let us now go even unto Bethlehem , and see this thing which is come to pass , which the Lord hath made known unto us .
text2: Chents ̈ ana chë angelënga celoye tmojésanshëcuana . Y chora chë oveshënga abuajë ́ nÿanga tmojanonts ̈ é jeniyanana : “ Belenoye cuajna , chë quem tojopasá soye jinÿama . Ndegombre , Bëngbe Bëtsá chë soye s ̈ ojanÿanÿé ca . ”

text: And they came with haste , and found Mary , and Joseph , and the babe lying in a manger .
text2: As betsco tmojána y tmojánanÿena María , José y chë s ̈ es ̈ onatema bachetémiñe jajoná .

text: And when they had seen it , they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child .
text2: Chë s ̈ es ̈ ona tmojáninÿe ora , chënga tmojanacuntá Jesusbe bëtsë ́ tsata y chë ínÿengbioye , nts ̈ amo chë s ̈ es ̈ onbiama chë ángel tojanëyancá .

text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds .
text2: Nÿetscanga chë tmojanuenënga tmojanenjnaná ndayá chë oveshënga abuajë ́ nÿanga imojtsacúntama .

text: But Mary kept all these things , and pondered them in her heart .
text2: Pero Mariyna nÿe cachabe ainanoca quem soyëngama más bën inétsenojuabnañe .

text: And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them .
text2: Chents ̈ ana , chë oveshënga abuajë ́ nÿanga tmojtaná Bëngbe Bëtsá atschuanaye , ndayá tmojáninÿama y tmojanuenama . Nÿets ̈ á tojanopasá lempe nts ̈ amo chë ángel tojanëyancá .

text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child , his name was called JESUS , which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
text2: Posufta te tojánashjache ora , chë basetémbioye chë más delicadents ̈ e base bobachtema tmojantëts ̈ e , Bëngbe Bëtsabe ents ̈ á bétsemnama chaotsinÿnama , nts ̈ amo judiënga imojanamancá ; y Jesús ca tmojanabaye , nts ̈ amo chë ángel tbojaniyancá , María cabá ndoñe ngomamaná yontsemna ora .

text: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished , they brought him to Jerusalem , to present him to the Lord ;
text2: Y chë tempo tojanóshjango , ndaye ora José y María yojtsamna jamana nts ̈ amo Moisesbe leyiñe iuayancá , ndayá jamama yojanmëncá , canÿe shembása Bëngbe Bëtsabe delante ts ̈ abia jtsatsmënama , canÿe s ̈ es ̈ ona tbojtsebomnents ̈ ana . Asna , Jerusalenoye tbojánata y chë básetema tmojanamba , Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnoca jinÿinÿiyama ,

text: ( As it is written in the law of the Lord , Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord ; )
text2: nts ̈ amo chë Bëngbe Utabná Moisésbioye tbojaniyé leyënguiñe iuayancá , mënts ̈ á : “ Canÿe yebnents ̈ e chë natsana s ̈ es ̈ ona boyabása tojtsemnësna , Bëngbe Bëtsábioye cha jinÿinÿiyana chábioye chabotseservénama ca . ” Chcasna , chë básetema Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnoye tmojanamba .

text: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord , A pair of turtledoves , or two young pigeons .
text2: Y tmojanamba janshana uta shlofts ̈ e , Bëngbe Bëtsá jëtschuayama , nts ̈ amo Bëngbe Utabnabe leyiñe yomandancá . Chiñe mënts ̈ á endayana : “ Chë natsana s ̈ es ̈ ona chaojonÿná ora , boyabásetema tojtsemnëse , janshana s ̈ mochjuamba uta fchetnatémata o uta s ̈ es ̈ ona palomatémata , Bëngbe Bëtsá jëtschuayama ca . ”

text: And , behold , there was a man in Jerusalem , whose name was Simeon ; and the same man was just and devout , waiting for the consolation of Israel : and the Holy Ghost was upon him .
text2: Jerusalenoca inamna canÿe bacó , Simeón ca uabainá ; cha inamna nÿetsca soyënguiñe ts ̈ abá amá , y yojaniyena nts ̈ amo Bëngbe Bëtsá yomandacá . Cha yojanobátmana chë tempo ndaye ora , Bëngbe Bëtsá bochjanichmuá canÿa Israeloca ents ̈ anga cháuatsebacama . Y chë Uámana Espíritu chabe ainaniñe yojtsemna ;

text: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost , that he should not see death , before he had seen the Lord ' s Christ .
text2: chíyeca , cabá lempe chca ndopása ora , cha yojtsetáts ̈ ëmbo cha ndoñe yochjanóbanama , chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe Uámana Uabuayaná ntjëftsinÿcá .

text: And he came by the Spirit into the temple : and when the parents brought in the child Jesus , to do for him after the custom of the law ,
text2: Chë Uámana Espíritu tbojanmandáyeca , Simeón Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnoye tojána ; y Jesusbe bëtsë ́ tsata chë básetema tmojanamba ora , nts ̈ amo Moisesbe leyiñe iuayancá chabiama jamama ora ,

text: Then took he him up in his arms , and blessed God , and said ,
text2: Simeón tbojanocutsá y Bëngbe Bëtsábioye tbojtanchuá . Cha mënts ̈ á tojánayana :

text: Lord , now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace , according to thy word :
text2: “ Bëngbe Utabná , mora s ̈ molesenciá , ats ̈ e acbe oservená natjë ́ mbana jóbanana , er ya tconjama nts ̈ amo s ̈ conjans ̈ buachenacá ;

text: For mine eyes have seen thy salvation ,
text2: ats ̈ e chë ents ̈ angbe Atsebacayá sënjinÿe .

text: Which thou hast prepared before the face of all people ;
text2: Aca cha tcojichmó nÿets luarenache ents ̈ angbiama .

text: A light to lighten the Gentiles , and the glory of thy people Israel .
text2: Cha chë ndoñe judiëngbe juabnënga binÿnayá echántsemna ; y chábeyeca , nÿets quem luarents ̈ e mochanjátats ̈ ëmbona , chë acbe ents ̈ angbiama , Israeloquëngbiama ca ” — cha tojánayana .

text: And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him .
text2: José y María ibojenjnanata nts ̈ amo Simeón Jesusbiama yojtsichámuama .

text: And Simeon blessed them , and said unto Mary his mother , Behold , this child is set for the fall and rising again of many in Israel ; and for a sign which shall be spoken against ;
text2: Chents ̈ ana , Simeón Bëngbe Bëtsábioye tbojanimpadá ts ̈ abe bendicionënga chata chabotsebomnama chaomama ; y María , chë Jesusbe mamábioye tbojaniyana : “ Quem soyënga corente cmochanjacochtsets ̈ enaná , mo ainana espadë ́ jaca cuafjenëchnëngcá . Cha Israeloca banga echanjápochocaye y banga echanjátsebacaye ; y chca , nts ̈ amo banga ainaniñe imojuabnacá echantsótats ̈ ëmbo . Israeloca banga quem básetema mochantsábotena y chabe palabrë ́ ngnaca ca ” — cha tbojaniyana .

text: And there was one Anna , a prophetess , the daughter of Phanuel , of the tribe of Aser : she was of a great age , and had lived with an husband seven years from her virginity ;
text2: Chénts ̈ naca yojtsemna canÿe shembása Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayá , Ana ca uabainá ; cha yojamna Fanuelbe bembe y Aserbe pamillents ̈ á ; ya bëtsananá cha inamna . Nÿe canÿsëfta uata cha yojë ́ ftsebouamna ;

text: And she was a widow of about fourscore and four years , which departed not from the temple , but served God with fastings and prayers night and day .
text2: y chabe boyá tojanóbanents ̈ ana , cha posufta bnë ́ tsana y canta uata viudá inamna . Ndocna te Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnents ̈ ana yonjábocana , y chents ̈ e tojanoquedá bnëté y ibeta , Bëngbe Bëtsáftaca encuéntaye y cha atschuanaye ; y chama , ba soye yojanamana tondaye ntjascá jtsemnana .

text: And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord , and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in Jerusalem .
text2: Simeón , María y Josébioye yojtsëtsëtsnaye ora , Ana chë ́ ngbioye yojobeconá , y chë Atsebacayá tojanonÿnama Bëngbe Bëtsábioye tbojtanchuá chents ̈ ana , Jerusalenoca ents ̈ ángbioye , chë canÿe atsebacayá Israeloca ents ̈ angbiama imojanobatmanë ́ ngbioye tojanë ́ yana , chana Jesús yojétsemna ca .

text: And when they had performed all things according to the law of the Lord , they returned into Galilee , to their own city Nazareth .
text2: José y María lempe nts ̈ amo chë Utabnabe leyënguiñe iuayancá tbojanma ora , Galilea luaroye tbojtanata , cachëngbe puebloye , Nazaretoye .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , filled with wisdom : and the grace of God was upon him .
text2: Y chë básetema yojtsobóchaye , y más añemo yojtsejacana y más osertánana yojtsebomna . Y Bëngbe Bëtsá yojánama cha bëtscá ts ̈ abe bendicionënga chaotsebomnama .

text: Now his parents went to Jerusalem every year at the feast of the passover .
text2: Chabe bëtsë ́ tsata ibojanamana cada uata Jerusalenoye jana Bashco fiestama , chë Bëngbe Bëtsá chë judiëngbe bëts taitángbioye Egiptocana tojánatsebacama jtenójuaboyama fiesta .

text: And when he was twelve years old , they went up to Jerusalem after the custom of the feast .
text2: Jesús bnë ́ tsana uta uata tojánashjache ora , Jerusalenoye tmojána , nts ̈ amo imojanamancá .

text: And when they had fulfilled the days , as they returned , the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem ; and Joseph and his mother knew not of it .
text2: Chë fiesta tojanopochocá chents ̈ ana , chabe bëtsë ́ tsata yebnoye ibojtsataye , y chata ntsetats ̈ ëmbcá , Jesusna Jerusalenoca yojtsoquedañe .

text: But they , supposing him to have been in the company , went a day ' s journey ; and they sought him among their kinsfolk and acquaintance .
text2: Chata ibojétsejuabnaye Jesús chë inÿe ents ̈ ángaftaca yojtsataboye ca ; chcasna , canÿe te nÿets ̈ á benachëjana tbojánata ora , tbojanonts ̈ é chabe pamíllangbeñe y ubuatmë ́ ngbeñe jtsenguanguana ,

text: And when they found him not , they turned back again to Jerusalem , seeking him .
text2: pero ndoñe ibonjobenaye jtsinÿenana . As , chata chora Jerusalenoye tbojésanshëcona choca cha jetsenguanguama .

text: And it came to pass , that after three days they found him in the temple , sitting in the midst of the doctors , both hearing them , and asking them questions .
text2: Unga tianoye chata tbojanobená Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnents ̈ e cha jetsinÿenana . Chana chë Moisesbe ley abuátambayëngbe tsëntsaca inétsotbemañe , chë ́ ngbioye inayaunana , inatjanaye .

text: And all that heard him were astonished at his understanding and answers .
text2: Nÿetsca ouenanënga imojtsenjnanaye Jesús ts ̈ a osertaná inamnama , y ts ̈ a ts ̈ abá jojuama cha yojtsobenama .

text: And when they saw him , they were amazed : and his mother said unto him , Son , why hast thou thus dealt with us ? behold , thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing .
text2: Chabe bëtsë ́ tsata chca tbojáninÿe ora , chátnaca ibojenjnaná . Chora , chabe mamá tbojaniyana : — Uaquiñá , ¿ ndáyeca chca bëndátaftaca tcojama ? Taitá y ats ̈ e corente enócochinÿenata cbondënguá ca .

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye sought me ? wist ye not that I must be about my Father ' s business ?
text2: As Jesús tojanë ́ yana : — ¿ Ndáyeca ats ̈ e s ̈ monguá ? ¿ Ndoñe s ̈ ondë ́ tats ̈ ëmbo ats ̈ e s ̈ omna ats ̈ be Taitabe yebnents ̈ e jtsemnana ca ?

text: And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them .
text2: Pero chë bëtsë ́ tsata ndoñe tonjanësertá nts ̈ amo cha tojanëyancá .

text: And he went down with them , and came to Nazareth , and was subject unto them : but his mother kept all these sayings in her heart .
text2: Chents ̈ ana Jesús chë bëtsë ́ tsataftaca Nazaretoye tojtaná y chata yojtsayaunana . Y chabe mamana nÿe cachabe ainanoca chë soyëngama más bën inétsenojuabnañe .

text: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature , and in favour with God and man .
text2: Jesús yojtsobóchaye y más juabna yojtsebomna ; y Bëngbe Bëtsá y nÿetsca ents ̈ anga corente oyejuayënga chabiama imojtsemna .

text: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar , Pontius Pilate being governor of Judaea , and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee , and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituraea and of the region of Trachonitis , and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene ,
text2: Bnë ́ tsana shachna uatama Tiberio César Romoca bëts mandado yojamna ora , Poncio Pilato yojamna Judeoca mandado , Heródesna Galileoca rey , chabe cats ̈ ata Felipe Iturea y Traconitoca rey , y Lisániasna Abilinioca rey .

text: Annas and Caiaphas being the high priests , the word of God came unto John the son of Zacharias in the wilderness .
text2: Anás y Caifás chë bachnangbe más uámana amëndayata ibojamna . Cach tempo , canÿe luare ents ̈ anga ndoyenents ̈ e Bëngbe Bëtsá tbojanatsëtsá Juánbioye ; Juan , Zacaríasbe uaquiñá .

text: And he came into all the country about Jordan , preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins ;
text2: As Juan nÿetsca luarënguëjana Jordán béjaye béconana tojánachnëngo , ents ̈ anga mënts ̈ á utsëtsnaye : “ Ts ̈ ëngaftangbe bacna soyëngama ngménaca s ̈ mochtenójuaboye , chca amana s ̈ mochtsajbaná y Bëngbe Bëtsabe benache s ̈ mochtishache . Chora cbochjúbaye , y Bëngbe Bëtsá ts ̈ ëngaftangbe bacna soyëngama cmochanjáperdonaye ca . ”

text: As it is written in the book of the words of Esaias the prophet , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Chë soye tojanopasá , cachcá nts ̈ amo chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayá Isaías chabe librë ́ s ̈ añe yojëftsabemcá . Cha mënts ̈ á tojanábema : Ents ̈ anga ndoyena luaroca canÿa enduáyebuache : “ Bëngbe Utabná echanjabo ca ; mo nda canÿe benache tojtseprontacá canÿe uámana ents ̈ á jashjanguama , cachcá , ts ̈ ëngaftángnaca , Bëngbe Utabná jabama ainanents ̈ e ts ̈ abe juabnë ́ ngaca s ̈ mochtseprontana .

text: Every valley shall be filled , and every mountain and hill shall be brought low ; and the crooked shall be made straight , and the rough ways shall be made smooth ;
text2: Nÿetsca jachañe echantojútjia , y tjañe y batsjabenga mochantenájachibiaye . Chë scundma benachënga ndirichëjënga echántsatsmëna , y chë bacá mana benachënga mochantenájachibiaye . Mo chë chca tmojtsamëngcá , canÿe benache japróntana canÿe rey cháuashjanguama , ts ̈ ëngaftángnaca bëtscá s ̈ mochtseprontana ts ̈ ëngaftangbe ainaniñe , Bëngbe Utabná jabama .

text: And all flesh shall see the salvation of God .
text2: Y nÿetsca ents ̈ anga mochanjinÿe chë Atsebacayá Bëngbe Bëtsábents ̈ ana jabana ca ” — cha tojanábema .

text: Then said he to the multitude that came forth to be baptized of him , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Chë ents ̈ anga Juan chaubáyama imojánbocana ora , Juan yojanëtsëtsnaye : “ ¡ Mëts ̈ cuaye ents ̈ anga ! ¿ Nda tcmënjáuyana chë echanjóshjango uabouana castigüents ̈ ana s ̈ mochjotsbocá ca ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance , and begin not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , That God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Bëngbe Bëtsábeñe ndegombre os ̈ buáchiyënga s ̈ mochtsemna , as chca chaotsinÿna , ts ̈ ëngaftanga chë bacna soyënga amana ndegombre s ̈ mojtsajbanama . Y ndoñe s ̈ mattsejuabnaye cach ts ̈ ëngaftangbiama jayanama : ‘ Bëngna Abrahámbents ̈ ana ents ̈ anga , Bëngbe Bëtsabe ents ̈ anga fsëndmëna ca ’ . Er ats ̈ e chanjayana , Bëngbe Bëtsá quem ndëts ̈ béngacnaca Abrahámbents ̈ ana ents ̈ anga nanjábiama .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : every tree therefore which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Tats ̈ nía ya entsaprontana chë betiyeshënga tbëtëjëngocana jtseshatë ́ tsets ̈ ama . Ndaye betiye ndoñe tonjashájona , jtseshatëts ̈ ana y iñoye jtsatmets ̈ ana ; ts ̈ ëngaftangaftácnaca cachcá , ts ̈ abe soyënga ndoñe s ̈ montsamëse , Bëngbe Bëtsá cmochanjácastigaye ca ” — cha yojanëtsëtsnaye .

text: And the people asked him , saying , What shall we do then ?
text2: — ¿ Y as , ndayá jamama s ̈ ojtsamna ca ? — chora chë ents ̈ anga tmojantjá .
