text2: Chantá ats ̈ be taitabe yebnoye y mënts ̈ á cha chanjauyana : Taita , s ̈ motseperdoná . Ats ̈ e tijama ndayá Bëngbe Bëtsá ndoñe yondbos ̈ cá , y nts ̈ amo aca ndoñe condbos ̈ cá .

text: And am no more worthy to be called thy son : make me as one of thy hired servants .
text2: Mora ya merecido taitsatobuajoñe acbe uaquiñá jtsabáinama ; nÿe canÿe acbe trabajayacá Diosmanda s ̈ matofja ca . ’

text: And he arose , and came to his father . But when he was yet a great way off , his father saw him , and had compassion , and ran , and fell on his neck , and kissed him .
text2: Chca jëftsenójuaboyëse , yojonts ̈ é cachabe yebnoye jtana . “ Cabá bënoca yojtsemna ora , chabe taitá chábioye ibojinÿe , y chabe uaquiñabiama ibojóngmia , y jajébenguama betsco yojá ; ibojajebengo , ibojtotsejcjuá y ts ̈ a yojtsóyejuayayama chë uaquiñábioye ibojtámocho .

text: And the son said unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and in thy sight , and am no more worthy to be called thy son .
text2: Chora chë uaquiñá ibojauyana : ‘ Taita , s ̈ motseperdoná . Ats ̈ e tijama ndayá Bëngbe Bëtsá ndoñe yondbos ̈ cá , y nts ̈ amo aca ndoñe condbos ̈ cá ; mora ya merecido taitsatobuajoñe acbe uaquiñá jtsabáinama ca . ’

text: But the father said to his servants , Bring forth the best robe , and put it on him ; and put a ring on his hand , and shoes on his feet :
text2: Pero chë Taitana chabe oservénënga yojámëndaye : ‘ Betsco chë más ts ̈ abe ents ̈ ayá mauaca y matspormanga , monts ̈ abuechëtjo y matsshecochëtjo .

text: And bring hither the fatted calf , and kill it ; and let us eat , and be merry :
text2: Mora chë más minÿica uacná s ̈ mochjuánatse y s ̈ mochjáshbua . ¡ Mochjase y mochjóboyejuaye ca !

text: For this my son was dead , and is alive again ; he was lost , and is found . And they began to be merry .
text2: Quem ats ̈ be uaquiñá mo obanacá endánmëna y mora bënga montsetáts ̈ ëmbo cha ainá yotsomñama . Quem ats ̈ be uaquiñá mo ots ̈ enacá endánmëna y mora tmontsinÿena ca . ’ Y chents ̈ ana imojonts ̈ é joboyejuayama .

text: Now his elder son was in the field : and as he came and drew nigh to the house , he heard musick and dancing .
text2: “ Chë yebnoca fiesta yojtsemnëntscuana , chë mayor uaquiñana jajoca inétsomñe . Yebnoye yojtsataye y ya béconana yojtsemna orna , cha yojouena imojtsabuastoye y imojtselántsaye .

text: And he called one of the servants , and asked what these things meant .
text2: As chora cha canÿe oservenábioye ibojachembo y mënts ̈ á ibojatjaye : ‘ ¿ Ndayá bëngbe yebnents ̈ e yojtsopasana ca ? ’

text: And he said unto him , Thy brother is come ; and thy father hath killed the fatted calf , because he hath received him safe and sound .
text2: “ As chë oservená ibojojuá : ‘ Acbe uabentsá tontashjango y chama acbe taitá s ̈ onjutarié chë más minÿica uacná jáshbuama , cha ts ̈ abá tojtashjanguama ca . ’

text: And he was angry , and would not go in : therefore came his father out , and intreated him .
text2: Pero chë uabóchena cats ̈ atna corente ibojtsetna y ndoñe yontsebos ̈ e tsoye jtamashënguana . As cach befta yojábocna chë cats ̈ átbioye jaimpádama chauatamashënguama .

text: And he answering said to his father , Lo , these many years do I serve thee , neither transgressed I at any time thy commandment : and yet thou never gavest me a kid , that I might make merry with my friends :
text2: Chora cha chë taitábioye ibojauyana : ‘ Taita , aca condë ́ tats ̈ ëmbo bueta uata cbetsajabuáchanama , nÿets tempo cbetseyeunanama , pero ndocna te ni mo canÿe chivotema ches ̈ caisats ̈ tá ats ̈ be amiguë ́ ngaftaca joboyejuayama .

text: But as soon as this thy son was come , which hath devoured thy living with harlots , thou hast killed for him the fatted calf .
text2: Y masna , acbe uaquiñá chë bacna vida bomna shembásengaftaca acbe crocénana pochocayá tojtashjango ora , chë más minÿica uacná chabiama tcojáshbua ca ’ — chë uaquiñá ibojauyana .

text: And he said unto him , Son , thou art ever with me , and all that I have is thine .
text2: “ Chora chë befta ibojojuá : ‘ Ats ̈ be uaquiñá , aca sempre áts ̈ eftaca condétsemna y lempe nts ̈ amo ats ̈ e tsbomncá acbiámnaca endmëna .

text: It was meet that we should make merry , and be glad : for this thy brother was dead , and is alive again ; and was lost , and is found .
text2: Pero mora ts ̈ abá entsemna joboyejuayama y joyejuayëngama ; er acbe uabentsá mo obanacá endánmëna , y mora bënga montsetáts ̈ ëmbo cha ainá yotsomñama ; mo ots ̈ enacá endánmëna , y mora tmontsinÿena ca . ’ ”

text: And he said also unto his disciples , There was a certain rich man , which had a steward ; and the same was accused unto him that he had wasted his goods .
text2: Jesús mënts ̈ ánaca chabe uatsjéndayënga tojanacuntá : “ Inamna canÿe bomna ents ̈ á , y cha ibnabomna canÿe uajabuachaná chabe soyënga chaotsinÿenama ; y chë nduiño imojuenaye chë uajabuachaná chabe soyë ́ ngaca ndoñe ts ̈ abá yontsamama .

text: And he called him , and said unto him , How is it that I hear this of thee ? give an account of thy stewardship ; for thou mayest be no longer steward .
text2: Asna , chë nduiño ibojachembo y mënts ̈ á ibojauyana : ‘ ¿ Nts ̈ amo acbiama s ̈ montsatsëtsnacá ndegombre yojtsemna ca ? Mora cuenta s ̈ matats ̈ tá nts ̈ amo ats ̈ be soyë ́ ngaca tcojamama , er morscana ya ndoñe ats ̈ be soyënga inÿená quecochátsmëna ca . ’

text: Then the steward said within himself , What shall I do ? for my lord taketh away from me the stewardship : I cannot dig ; to beg I am ashamed .
text2: Chë uajabuachaná yojonts ̈ é jenójuaboyana , y mënts ̈ á yojeniyana : ‘ ¿ Y mora nts ̈ amo chtsemana , chë nduiño ats ̈ be trabajuents ̈ ana s ̈ ojtabocna ora ? Ndoñe añemo quetsátsbomna fshantse jatrabájama , y lemos ̈ na jótjañamna sëntsëuatja .

text: I am resolved what to do , that , when I am put out of the stewardship , they may receive me into their houses .
text2: Ya së ́ ntsetats ̈ ëmbo ndayá chjama , chca , ats ̈ be trabajuents ̈ ana chas ̈ ojtábocna ora , ats ̈ e jtsabamnama ndëmuanÿenga chëngbe yebnents ̈ e chas ̈ mofjama ca . ’

text: So he called every one of his lord ' s debtors unto him , and said unto the first , How much owest thou unto my lord ?
text2: “ Chents ̈ ana , canÿánÿa chë chabe nduíñbioye ndebénënga yojáchembo . Cánÿabioye ibojatjaye : ‘ ¿ Ntsachets ̈ á ats ̈ be nduiño icondebena ca ? ’

text: And he said , An hundred measures of oil . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and sit down quickly , and write fifty .
text2: Y cha ibojojuá : ‘ Canÿe patse barrilës ̈ angá aceitiye ca . ’ As cha ibojauyana : ‘ Muents ̈ e acbe recibë ́ cha entsamna ; mora mótbema y inÿácha nÿe shachna bnë ́ tsana barrilës ̈ angama matapormá ca . ’

text: Then said he to another , And how much owest thou ? And he said , An hundred measures of wheat . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and write fourscore .
text2: Chents ̈ ana ínÿabioye ibojatjaye : ‘ Y acna , ¿ Ntsachets ̈ á icondebena ca ? ’ Y cha ibojojuá : ‘ Canÿe patse medida trigo ca . ’ As cha ibojauyana : ‘ Muents ̈ e acbe recibë ́ cha entsamna ; chiñe nÿe posufta bnëtsanama mábema ca . ’

text: And the lord commended the unjust steward , because he had done wisely : for the children of this world are in their generation wiser than the children of light .
text2: Chents ̈ ana , chë nduiño ts ̈ abá yojayana chë ndoñe ts ̈ abá ama mayordombiama , cha stúdioca yojamama . Chë nÿe quem luarama enójuabnaye ents ̈ anga , cachëngbe soyë ́ ngaca puerte studio bomnënga mondmëna ; y chë ents ̈ angbe juabnënga binÿnayábenga ndoñe nÿa yapa ca .

text: And I say unto you , Make to yourselves friends of the mammon of unrighteousness ; that , when ye fail , they may receive you into everlasting habitations .
text2: “ Ats ̈ e cbabuayená , quem luarents ̈ e , chë bacna soyënga amëngbe luarents ̈ a bomnánaca amiguënga s ̈ mochjábiama , ínÿenga jtsëjabuáchanëse . Chca , chë bomnana tojtsopochocá ora chas ̈ motsabamna ndëmuanÿenga chë nÿetsca tescama oyenoye chacmúbuajama ca .

text: He that is faithful in that which is least is faithful also in much : and he that is unjust in the least is unjust also in much .
text2: “ Nda básefta soyënguiñe lempe ts ̈ abá tojama , bëtscá soyënguíñnaca lempe ts ̈ abá echanjama ; y nda básefta soyënguiñe ndoñe ts ̈ abá tonjama , bëtscá soyënguíñnaca cach ndoñe ts ̈ abá queochatsma .

text: If therefore ye have not been faithful in the unrighteous mammon , who will commit to your trust the true riches ?
text2: Chcasna , quem luarents ̈ e , chë bacna soyënga amëngbe luarents ̈ a bomnánaca ndoñe ts ̈ abá s ̈ monjamëse , ¿ nda chë ndegombre bomnana , chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe soyënga cmochjábanÿiye ?

text: And if ye have not been faithful in that which is another man ' s , who shall give you that which is your own ?
text2: Y chë ndoñe ts ̈ ëngaftangbe sóyeca ndoñe ts ̈ abá s ̈ monjamëse , ¿ nda cmochjants ̈ abuáchiye ndayá ts ̈ ëngaftangbiama yomncá ca ?

text: No servant can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: “ Ndocná ntsobenana uta mandayata jtsaservénana ; er cánÿabioye bochantsáboyënja y chë ínÿabioyna bochántsebobonshana , o cánÿabiama ts ̈ abá echántsetrabajaye , y chë ínÿabiamna ndoñe ts ̈ abá . Ndoñe quecátobena Bëngbe Bëtsá jtsebobonshánana , nÿe quem luarents ̈ a soyënga jtsebomnama tcojtsebos ̈ ëse ca ” — Jesús tojánayana .

text: And the Pharisees also , who were covetous , heard all these things : and they derided him .
text2: Chë fariseunga , becá crocénana jtsebomnama bos ̈ ënga imnamna , lempe chca chënga tmojanuena , y Jesúsbioye imojtsáboyejuana .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are they which justify yourselves before men ; but God knoweth your hearts : for that which is highly esteemed among men is abomination in the sight of God .
text2: As Jesús tojanë ́ yana : “ Ts ̈ ëngaftanga ents ̈ angbe delante mo ts ̈ ábenga cuaftsemncá jtsenobiamnayana , pero Bëngbe Bëtsá endë ́ tats ̈ ëmbo ndayá ts ̈ ëngaftangbe ainaniñe yomnama ; er ndayá ents ̈ anga más tojtsebos ̈ cá , Bëngbe Bëtsá jtsáboyënjana ca .

text: The law and the prophets were until John : since that time the kingdom of God is preached , and every man presseth into it .
text2: “ Moisesbe ley y chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayënga ts ̈ ëngaftanga cmonjanabuayiyná , Juan chë Ubayaná quem luaroye tonjánabëntscuana . Cha tonjánabo orscana montsabuayiyná chë ts ̈ abe noticiënga Bëngbe Bëtsabe amë ́ ndayocama , y nÿetscanga ts ̈ a montsebos ̈ e choye jamashënguama ca .

text: And it is easier for heaven and earth to pass , than one tittle of the law to fail .
text2: “ Más paselo endmëna , celoca y quem luare chaopochocá , y ndoñe chë nts ̈ amo leyiñe iuayancá , chë ndayá jopásama yomnama , ni mo canÿe punto ndoñe chca chaondë ́ tsemnama ca ” — Jesús tojánayana .

text: Whosoever putteth away his wife , and marrieth another , committeth adultery : and whosoever marrieth her that is put away from her husband committeth adultery .
text2: “ Nda chabe shémbioye cachcá tbojesonÿá y ínÿaftaca tojtóbouamase , cha chë natsana shémbioye ínÿaftaca jtseíngñayana ; y nda chë úts ̈ ena shembásaftaca tojobouamá chana , canÿe uabuatmá jtsebomnana , y chca , chana canÿe bacna soye jtsamana ca ” — Jesús tojánayana .

text: There was a certain rich man , which was clothed in purple and fine linen , and fared sumptuously every day :
text2: “ Canÿe bomna ents ̈ á inamna ; cha yojanamana uámana y botamana shbuenda uafjatsenga y lino ents ̈ ayangá jtichëtjuana , y cada te bëts fiestënga yojánama .

text: And there was a certain beggar named Lazarus , which was laid at his gate , full of sores ,
text2: Canÿe ndbomnëjémnaca inamna , Lázaro ca uabainá , bacna nguayanánaca s ̈ ocá ; y cha yojanamana chë bomnabe bës ̈ ás ̈ ents ̈ e fshantsiñe jótbemana .

text: And desiring to be fed with the crumbs which fell from the rich man ' s table : moreover the dogs came and licked his sores .
text2: Quem ndbomnëjema yojtsebos ̈ e chë bomná yojtsesayents ̈ ana yojatquëcjana sanángaca jtoshachayana ; y chë ques ̈ ënga imnaboye chabe nguaye cuerpo jajáfjuama .

text: And it came to pass , that the beggar died , and was carried by the angels into Abraham ' s bosom : the rich man also died , and was buried ;
text2: Canÿe te Lázaro yojtsóbana , y Bëngbe Bëtsabe angelënga Abrahámbioye cha imojtamba , chë nÿetscanga oyejuayënga mondmëna luaroye . Chë bomnánaca yojóbana y imojuátbontsa .

text: And in hell he lift up his eyes , being in torments , and seeth Abraham afar off , and Lazarus in his bosom .
text2: “ Chë bomná infiernoca puerte ngméniñe yojtsesufrina ora , tsbanánoye yojontjes ̈ iye y bënoca Abraham ibojinÿe , y Lázaro cháftaca yojtsemna .

text: And he cried and said , Father Abraham , have mercy on me , and send Lazarus , that he may dip the tip of his finger in water , and cool my tongue ; for I am tormented in this flame .
text2: As chë bomná yojuayebuáchena : ‘ ¡ Taita Abraham , s ̈ molastemá ! Lázaro michmó chabe nts ̈ abuafja chaofchecuacuá y ats ̈ be bichtaja chauabofchecuacuaye , er quem íñeshoca ts ̈ a së ́ ntsesufrina ca . ’

text: But Abraham said , Son , remember that thou in thy lifetime receivedst thy good things , and likewise Lazarus evil things : but now he is comforted , and thou art tormented .
text2: Pero Abraham ibojauyana : ‘ Uaquiñá , menojuabó , aca fshantsoca vida conjánbomna ora , lempe nts ̈ amo icojabos ̈ cá tconjanóyëngacñe , y Lázaro chë cuenta tondaye quenjátsbomna ; pero morna , cha ts ̈ abá y oyejuayá entsemna , y aca jabuache ngménana contsebomna .

text: And beside all this , between us and you there is a great gulf fixed : so that they which would pass from hence to you cannot ; neither can they pass to us , that would come from thence .
text2: Y inÿe soye , canÿe bëts tbuañe entsemna ts ̈ ëngaftangbiocana më ́ ntscoñe ; chca , chë ts ̈ ëngaftangbioye muents ̈ ana jenachnënguama tmojtsebos ̈ ënga ndoñe chamondëtsobena , ni chocana bë ́ ngbioye cach ndoñe ca . ’

text: Then he said , I pray thee therefore , father , that thou wouldest send him to my father ' s house :
text2: “ Y chë bomná ibojauyana : ‘ Masque chca , Taita Abraham , Diosmanda Lázaro michmó ats ̈ be taitabe yebnoye ;

text: For I have five brethren ; that he may testify unto them , lest they also come into this place of torment .
text2: choca sëndábamna shachna cats ̈ átanga ; as chaúyana nts ̈ amo moca ats ̈ e stsepasana y nts ̈ amo jamëse chënga ndoñe chaondë ́ tsamna quem ngménënga luaroye jabama ca . ’

text: Abraham saith unto him , They have Moses and the prophets ; let them hear them .
text2: Chora Abraham ibojauyana : ‘ Chënga ya mondbomna ndayá Moisés y chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayënga tmojëftsanábema soyënga ; ¡ chë ́ ngbioye chamoyauná ca ! ’

text: And he said , Nay , father Abraham : but if one went unto them from the dead , they will repent .
text2: Chë bomná ibojojuá : ‘ Ndoñe , Taita Abraham ; nderado obanënguents ̈ ana canÿa chë ́ ngbioye tojase , aíñe chë ts ̈ abe benache muantishache ca . ’

text: And he said unto him , If they hear not Moses and the prophets , neither will they be persuaded , though one rose from the dead .
text2: Pero Abraham ibojauyana : ‘ Chënga ni mo Moisés , ni chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayë ́ ngbioye ndoñe tmonjóyaunase , Bëngbe Bëtsábeñe ndoñe quemochatos ̈ buáchiye , masque canÿe obaná chauatayenëse , chë ́ ngbioye jábuayenama ca ’ ” — Jesús tojancuentá .

text: Then said he unto the disciples , It is impossible but that offences will come : but woe unto him , through whom they come !
text2: Jesús chabe uatsjéndayënga tojanë ́ yana : “ Sempre echanjë ́ ftsemna juabnënga bacna soyënga jamama ; pero , ¡ ts ̈ a lastema chë ents ̈ abiama ndabe causa ínÿenga bacna soyënga tmojama !

text: It were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he cast into the sea , than that he should offend one of these little ones .
text2: Más ts ̈ abá chabiama nántsemna canÿe nantsnëbé chamotsetamos ̈ ë ́ nts ̈ bua y mar béjayoye chamotsashbuets ̈ e , y ndoñe chë canÿa Bëngbe Bëtsábeñe os ̈ buachiyá bacna soye chaomama juanatsana .

text: Take heed to yourselves : If thy brother trespass against thee , rebuke him ; and if he repent , forgive him .
text2: Cuedado s ̈ mochtsebomna . “ Acbe cats ̈ ata bacna soye tojamëse , cochjuácacana ; y yochtsajbaná ca cha tojayanëse , cochtseperdóna .

text: And if he trespass against thee seven times in a day , and seven times in a day turn again to thee , saying , I repent ; thou shalt forgive him .
text2: Masque nÿe canÿe te , canÿsëfta soye nts ̈ ámnaca tcmojaborlá , y canÿsëfta soye ‘ chca ndoñe más quecbochatsbórla ca ’ tcmojauyanëse , aca cmontsemna cha jtseperdónana ca ” — Jesús tojánayana .

text: And the apostles said unto the Lord , Increase our faith .
text2: Chë uatsjéndayënga Bëngbe Utabnábioye tmojaniyana : — Os ̈ buáchiyana s ̈ mababuaté ca .

text: And the Lord said , If ye had faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye might say unto this sycamine tree , Be thou plucked up by the root , and be thou planted in the sea ; and it should obey you .
text2: Y chë Utabná tojanë ́ jua : — Ts ̈ ëngaftanga os ̈ buáchiyana , bats ̈ atema masque nÿe mo mostaza jenaycá s ̈ mojtsebomnëse , quem sicomoro betiyoye s ̈ matjauyana : “ quemuents ̈ ana mojashtse y mar béjayoca mojé ca ” , y quem betiye chca nanjama ca .

text: But which of you , having a servant plowing or feeding cattle , will say unto him by and by , when he is come from the field , Go and sit down to meat ?
text2: “ Nderado canÿa ts ̈ ëngaftanguents ̈ á canÿe bochichnayá tbojtsebomna , cha jajocana tojtashjango jajañe arayocana o uacnënga anÿenocana , ¿ chábioye bochjauyana : ‘ Matabo y mabose ca ’ ?

text: And will not rather say unto him , Make ready wherewith I may sup , and gird thyself , and serve me , till I have eaten and drunken ; and afterward thou shalt eat and drink ?
text2: Ndoñe , chamna mënts ̈ á bochanjauyana : ‘ Jetiñe juasama cochjuábua , y moprontá ats ̈ e jasérviama ats ̈ e candëse y candofs ̈ entscuana ; y chents ̈ ana aca cochjase y cochjofs ̈ iye ca . ’

text: Doth he thank that servant because he did the things that were commanded him ? I trow not .
text2: Y chë bochichnayábioye ndoñe quebochtë ́ tschuaye ndayá tbojuatariecá cha tojamama .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you , say , We are unprofitable servants : we have done that which was our duty to do .
text2: Ts ̈ ëngaftángnaca cachcá , lempe nts ̈ amo Bëngbe Bëtsá tcmojutariecá chas ̈ mojama ora , cmontsamna jayanana : ‘ Nduámana oservénënga fsëndmëna ; er nÿe nts ̈ amo jamama s ̈ uamncá tifjama ca ’ ” — Jesús tojánayana .

text: And it came to pass , as he went to Jerusalem , that he passed through the midst of Samaria and Galilee .
text2: Jerusalenoye benache , Jesús tojánachnëngo Samaria y Galilea luarëjana .

text: And as he entered into a certain village , there met him ten men that were lepers , which stood afar off :
text2: Y canÿe pueblotémoye tojánashjango ora , bnë ́ tsana boyabásenga bacna nguayanánaca s ̈ oquënga chábioye tmojána ; chábents ̈ ana bënoca chënga tmojanoquedá ,

text: And they lifted up their voices , and said , Jesus , Master , have mercy on us .
text2: y mënts ̈ á imojtsáyebuache : — ¡ Jesús , Buatëmbayá , s ̈ motsalastemá ca !

text: And when he saw them , he said unto them , Go shew yourselves unto the priests . And it came to pass , that , as they went , they were cleansed .
text2: Jesús chënga tojánanÿe ora , tojanë ́ yana : — Jerusalenoca bachnángbioye motsajna , y chënga s ̈ mochjínÿanÿiye ts ̈ ëngaftanga mora ndës ̈ oquënga s ̈ mojtsemnama ca . Y tojanopasá , chë bnë ́ tsanënga cabá imojétsayëntscuana , ya shnánënga imojtoquédaye .

text: And one of them , when he saw that he was healed , turned back , and with a loud voice glorified God ,
text2: Canÿa chënguents ̈ á , shnaná yojtsemnama tojáninÿe ora , yojesshë ́ cona Bëngbe Bëtsábioye jabuache atschuanaye ;

text: And fell down on his face at his feet , giving him thanks : and he was a Samaritan .
text2: y Jesusbe delante yojoshëntsaments ̈ iye , jubiaca fshantsóntscoñe yojotsejbéna , y chábioye ibojtsatschuanaye ; y chë boyabásana Samarioca ents ̈ á inamna .

text: And Jesus answering said , Were there not ten cleansed ? but where are the nine ?
text2: Chora Jesús tbojaniyana : — Bnë ́ tsanënga mondmëna chë shnánënga tmontoquedanga . ¿ Ndayents ̈ e chë inÿe esconë ́ ftanga imojtsemna ?

text: There are not found that returned to give glory to God , save this stranger .
text2: ¿ Nÿe quem boyabása , inÿe luarocana ashjangoná , tojesshë ́ cona Bëngbe Bëtsá jëtschuayama ? ¿ Ndáyeca chë ínÿenga ndoñe ca ?

text: And he said unto him , Arise , go thy way : thy faith hath made thee whole .
text2: Y chë ents ̈ ábioye tbojaniyana : — Matëtsbaná y motsatoñe ; Bëngbe Bëtsábeñe aca icos ̈ buachéyeca shnaná contsatsmëna ca .

text: And when he was demanded of the Pharisees , when the kingdom of God should come , he answered them and said , The kingdom of God cometh not with observation :
text2: Canÿe , chë fariseunga Jesús tmojantjá , mocna ora chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe amë ́ ndayana yochjanóshjanguama ; y cha tojanë ́ jua : “ Bëngbe Bëtsabe amë ́ ndayana chaojóshjango ora , ts ̈ ëngaftanga ndoñe ques ̈ mochatobenaye chca jinÿana .

text: Neither shall they say , Lo here ! or , lo there ! for , behold , the kingdom of God is within you .
text2: Chora ndoñe quemochátichamo ‘ Muents ̈ e entsemna ’ o ‘ Choca entsemna ca ’ ; er Bëngbe Bëtsabe amë ́ ndayana ya ts ̈ ëngaftangbeñe entsemna ca ” — cha tojánayana .

text: And he said unto the disciples , The days will come , when ye shall desire to see one of the days of the Son of man , and ye shall not see it .
text2: Jesús chabe uatsjéndayënga tojanë ́ yana : “ Canÿe tempo echanjóshjango , y chora ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ mochántsebos ̈ e canÿe te jtsebomnana , nts ̈ amo chë Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá ts ̈ ëngaftangbeñe enjëftsemna orcá ; pero chora ndoñe chca queochatóshjango .

text: And they shall say to you , See here ; or , see there : go not after them , nor follow them .
text2: Chora báseftanga mochántsichamo : ‘ Muents ̈ e entsemna ’ o ‘ Choca entsemna ca ’ ; pero choye ndoñe s ̈ matjá , ni s ̈ matjúseto .

text: For as the lightning , that lighteneth out of the one part under heaven , shineth unto the other part under heaven ; so shall also the Son of man be in his day .
text2: Er chë tojatcuinÿe ora , nts ̈ amo celoca catoica juachoica tojabuashinÿinÿenacá , chca echántsemna chë Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá quem luaroye chaojésabo te .

text: But first must he suffer many things , and be rejected of this generation .
text2: Pero natsana cha bontsemna puerte jasúfriana , y morsca ents ̈ angbiama uabotená jtsemnana .

text: And as it was in the days of Noe , so shall it be also in the days of the Son of man .
text2: “ Nts ̈ amo Noé yojaniyena ora tojanopasacá , cachcá echanjopása chë Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá quem luaroye chaojésabo ora .

text: They did eat , they drank , they married wives , they were given in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark , and the flood came , and destroyed them all .
text2: Chë tempo , ents ̈ anga imnasaye , imnofs ̈ ës ̈ naye , imnóbouamnaye ; natjë ́ mbana imojtsiyeñe , y chca , natjë ́ mbana imojtsomñe , Noé chë barquë ́ shoye tojánamashënguëntscuana ; pero chora uabouana uaftena tojánashjango y chë ents ̈ anga tojtsanapochocá .

text: Likewise also as it was in the days of Lot ; they did eat , they drank , they bought , they sold , they planted , they builded ;
text2: Cachcá nts ̈ amo Lot yojaniyena ora tojanopasacá : ents ̈ anga imnasaye , imnofs ̈ ës ̈ naye , imnóbouamnaye , imojtsena , sananga imnajena y imnajebuana ;

text: But the same day that Lot went out of Sodom it rained fire and brimstone from heaven , and destroyed them all .
text2: pero Lot Sodoma bëts pueblents ̈ ana tojë ́ ftsanbocna ora , Bëngbe Bëtsá tojanma celocana íñeshe y azufre chauaftema , y chents ̈ a ents ̈ anga tojtsanapochocá .

text: Even thus shall it be in the day when the Son of man is revealed .
text2: Cachcá echántsemna chë Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá chaojtonÿná ora .

text: In that day , he which shall be upon the housetop , and his stuff in the house , let him not come down to take it away : and he that is in the field , let him likewise not return back .
text2: “ Chë tena , nda cachabe yebnents ̈ a tsbanánoca chaojtsemna , y chabe soyënga cach tsoca tojtsebomnëse , chocana ndoñe chaondë ́ tastjango chë soyënga jesabobocnama ; y nda jajoca chaojtsemna , yebnoye ndoñe chaondë ́ ta .

text: Remember Lot ' s wife .
text2: Menójuabonga nts ̈ amo Lotbe shémaftaca tojanopasama .

text: Whosoever shall seek to save his life shall lose it ; and whosoever shall lose his life shall preserve it .
text2: Nda tojtsents ̈ ena quem luarents ̈ e bëtscá jtsebomnama y ats ̈ biama jasúfriama ndoñe tontseprontana , chë nÿetsca tescama yomna ts ̈ abe vida echanjobuets ̈ e . Pero nda quem luarents ̈ a soyënga cachcá tojonÿá ats ̈ e juastama , masque chaóbana , chë nÿetsca tescama yomna ts ̈ abe vida echántsebomna .

text: I tell you , in that night there shall be two men in one bed ; the one shall be taken , and the other shall be left .
text2: “ Ats ̈ e cbë ́ yana , chë ibeta , chë Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá chaojtonÿná ora , útata canÿe jutsnë ́ shañe bochántsemna ; canÿa mochanjesbets ̈ e y chë ínÿana ndoñe .

text: Two women shall be grinding together ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Uta shembásata cánÿiñe bochántsejanÿcoye ; canÿa mochanjesbets ̈ e y chë ínÿana ndoñe .

text: Two men shall be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Uta boyabásata jajoca bochántsetrabajaye ; canÿa mochanjesbets ̈ e y chë ínÿana ndoñe ca ” — cha tojanë ́ yana .

text: And they answered and said unto him , Where , Lord ? And he said unto them , Wheresoever the body is , thither will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Chora chë uatsjéndayënga Jesús tmojantjá : — Utabná , ¿ ndë ́ moca chca yochjopása ca ? Y cha tojanjuá : — Chë obanabe cuerpo tojtsemnents ̈ e chë gallinacënga jojotana ca .

text: And he spake a parable unto them to this end , that men ought always to pray , and not to faint ;
text2: Jesús mënts ̈ á tojanacuntá , ents ̈ anga jabuátambama , Bëngbe Bëtsáftaca nÿets tempo jtsencuéntayana yomnama , ainaniñe añemo jtsebomnama ndocna te ntjajbanacá .

text: Saying , There was in a city a judge , which feared not God , neither regarded man :
text2: Mënts ̈ á tojánayana : “ Canÿe pueblents ̈ e canÿe mandado inamna ; chana ni Bëngbe Bëtsábioye ndoñe bonjánebiauatja , ni ents ̈ anga yonjánayaunana .

text: And there was a widow in that city ; and she came unto him , saying , Avenge me of mine adversary .
text2: Chë pueblents ̈ e canÿe viudánaca inamna ; chana canÿe demanda yojánbomna . As chë mandádbioye yojobeconá y mënts ̈ á ibojauyana : ‘ Diosmanda ats ̈ be uayayá motsecastigá ndayá s ̈ ojaborlama ca . ’

text: And he would not for a while : but afterward he said within himself , Though I fear not God , nor regard man ;
text2: Bayté chë mandado ndoñe yonjábos ̈ ena chë viudábioye joyeunayama ; pero chents ̈ ana cha yojenójuaboye : ‘ Masque Bëngbe Bëtsá ndoñe quetsátebiauatja , ni ents ̈ anga ndoñe quetsátayaunana ,

text: Yet because this widow troubleth me , I will avenge her , lest by her continual coming she weary me .
text2: pero quem viudá cada ora endabó causa , aíñe chanjóyeunaye , chabe uayayá chanjacastíga ; ndóñesna cada te nandaboye y cabana ya s ̈ ochanjanamë ́ nts ̈ a ca . ’ ”

text: And the Lord said , Hear what the unjust judge saith .
text2: Chents ̈ ana Bëngbe Utabná tojánayana : “ S ̈ monjouena nts ̈ amo chë ndoñe ts ̈ abá ama mandado yojayancá .

text: And shall not God avenge his own elect , which cry day and night unto him , though he bear long with them ?
text2: Y chca , ¿ Bëngbe Bëtsá chabe bocacánënga ndoñe yochanjátsebacaye ? Chënga mora ínÿengbe causa montsesufrina y cada te Bëngbe Bëtsá mondbétseimpadana chaújabuachama . ¿ Más chamuatobatmá ca yochjáuyana ?

text: I tell you that he will avenge them speedily . Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh , shall he find faith on the earth ?
text2: Ats ̈ e cbë ́ yana , Bëngbe Bëtsá betsco ts ̈ ëngaftanga cmochanjátsebacaye , ts ̈ ëngaftanga chë ínÿengbe causa mora s ̈ mojtsesufrínënga . Pero chë Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá chaojésabo ora , ¿ cabá Bëngbe Bëtsábeñe os ̈ buáchiyënga quem luarents ̈ e ents ̈ anga yochjánÿena ca ? ” — Jesús tojánayana .

text: And he spake this parable unto certain which trusted in themselves that they were righteous , and despised others :
text2: Báseftanga imojtsanjuabná chënga ts ̈ abe ents ̈ anga imnamna ca , pero chë ínÿengbioye imojtsëbuayënja ; chíyeca Jesús mënts ̈ á tojanacuntá jabuátambama :

text: Two men went up into the temple to pray ; the one a Pharisee , and the other a publican .
text2: “ Uta boyabásata Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnoye tbojána Bëngbe Bëtsáftaca jencuéntama : canÿa yojamna fariseo , y chë ínÿana , canÿe Romocama ents ̈ ángbioye impuesto atjanayá .

text: The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself , God , I thank thee , that I am not as other men are , extortioners , unjust , adulterers , or even as this publican .
text2: Chocna chë fariseo , tsanana Bëngbe Bëtsábioye mënts ̈ á ibojtsecuéntaye : ‘ Bëngbe Bëtsá , cbontsatschuaná ats ̈ e chë inÿengcá ndoñe quetsatsmënama : atbëbanënga , puerte bacna soye amënga y shémbioye ínÿaftaca íngñayënga ; y ni quem Romocama impuesto atjanayacá ndoñe quetsatsmënama .

text: I fast twice in the week , I give tithes of all that I possess .
text2: Ats ̈ e sënduamana , ácaftaca jencuéntamna , canÿe semaniñe uta soye tondaye ntjascá jtsemnana ; y lempe stjonÿenents ̈ ana , bnë ́ tsanents ̈ ana canÿe soye acbiama sëndëquëcjná ca . ’

text: And the publican , standing afar off , would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven , but smote upon his breast , saying , God be merciful to me a sinner .
text2: Pero chë Romocama impuesto atjanayana , bënoca yojtsemna , ni celoye ntjontjes ̈ iycá , yojtsenócochjants ̈ etaye y mënts ̈ á yojtsichamo : ‘ ¡ Ats ̈ be Bëtsá , s ̈ motselastemá , ats ̈ ajema bacna soye amá tsmëna causa ca ! ’ ”

text: I tell you , this man went down to his house justified rather than the other : for every one that exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Chents ̈ ana Jesús tojánayana : “ Ats ̈ e cbë ́ yana , quem Romocama impuesto atjanayá chabe yebnoye tojtaná chabe bacna soyëngama perdonaná , pero chë fariseo ndoñe . Er nda cachá bëtsá tojtsenobiamná , nduamaná mochántsebema ; y nda cachá nduamaná tojtsenobiamná , aíñe bëtsá mochanjábema . ”

text: And they brought unto him also infants , that he would touch them : but when his disciples saw it , they rebuked them .
text2: Ents ̈ anga imojanamana Jesúsbioye basetémënga junatsana chauabájajuama , y Bëngbe Bëtsábioye chëngbiama chaboimpadama ; pero chë uatsjéndayënga chca tmojáninÿe ora , tmojanonts ̈ é chë basetémënga unachayënga jtsëcácanana .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Suffer little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Pero Jesusna chë basetémënga tojánachembo , y mënts ̈ á tojánayana : “ Cachcá mónÿaye chë basetémënga áts ̈ bioye chamuabo , y ndoñe matë ́ uyanana ; er Bëngbe Bëtsabe amë ́ ndayana endmëna chë mo quem basetemëngcá imomnëngbiama .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child shall in no wise enter therein .
text2: Ndegombre cbë ́ yana , nda Bëngbe Bëtsabe soyënga ndoñe tonjóyëngacñe mo canÿe basetemcá jtsos ̈ buáchiyëse , cha ndoñe queochatobenaye Bëngbe Bëtsabe amë ́ ndayoye jamashënguama ca . ”

text: And a certain ruler asked him , saying , Good Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Canÿe mandayá Jesúsbioye tbojantjá : — Ts ̈ abe Buatëmbayá , ¿ ndayá s ̈ ojtsemna jamana chë nÿetsca tescama yomna ts ̈ abe vida jtsebomnama ca ?

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? none is good , save one , that is , God .
text2: Y Jesús tbojanjuá : — ¿ Ndáyeca s ̈ cjauyana “ ts ̈ abia ca ” ? Ts ̈ abia nÿe canÿa endmëna : Bëngbe Bëtsá .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Honour thy father and thy mother .
text2: Aca condë ́ tats ̈ ëmbo nts ̈ amo Bëngbe Bëtsá tojanmandacá : “ Acbe shema ínÿaftaca ndoñe cattseíngñaye , inÿa ndoñe catjóba , ndoñe catjatbëba , ndoñe catjuaboínÿena y acbe bëtsë ́ tsata ndoñe stëts ̈ oye catjáquedaye ca . ”

text: And he said , All these have I kept from my youth up .
text2: Chora chë boyabása tbojanjuá : — Ats ̈ e lempe chca básetema orscana sëndocumplina ca .

text: Now when Jesus heard these things , he said unto him , Yet lackest thou one thing : sell all that thou hast , and distribute unto the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , follow me .
text2: Jesús chca tojanuena ora , tbojaniyana : — Cabá canÿe soye cmontsebuáshbena jamana : lempe nts ̈ amo icobomncá cochjetsatobuiye , y chë crocénana , ndbomnëjémënga cochtsats ̈ ataye ; chca , celoca canÿe bëts bomnana cochántsebomna . Chents ̈ ana , cochjabo y s ̈ cochjuasto ca .

text: And when he heard this , he was very sorrowful : for he was very rich .
text2: Chë ents ̈ á chca tojanuena ora , puerte ngménaca yojtsemna , er cha corente bomná inamna .

text: And when Jesus saw that he was very sorrowful , he said , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Chca ngmená tbojáninÿe ora , Jesús tojánayana : — ¡ Yapa totcá bomnëngbiama entsemna Bëngbe Bëtsabe amë ́ ndayoye jamashënguama !

text: For it is easier for a camel to go through a needle ' s eye , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Ndegombre , más paselo endmëna canÿe camello chë coshufjents ̈ a atëfjnëjana chauachnëngo , y ndoñe canÿe bomná Bëngbe Bëtsabe amë ́ ndayoye jamashënguana ca .

text: And they that heard it said , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Chora , chë chca imojouenënga tmojánayana : — ¿ As nda yochjobenaye atsbocaná jtsemnana ca ?

text: And he said , The things which are impossible with men are possible with God .
text2: Y Jesús tojanë ́ jua : — Ndayá ents ̈ anga ndoñe mondobena jamana , Bëngbe Bëtsá aíñe endobena jamana ca .

text: Then Peter said , Lo , we have left all , and followed thee .
text2: Chora Pedro , Jesúsbioye tbojaniyana : — Bëngbe Utabná , aca contsonÿá , bënga lempe chë fsë ́ ndbomna soyënga fsënjéseboshjona , y ácaftaca fsëntsajna ca .

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or parents , or brethren , or wife , or children , for the kingdom of God ' s sake ,
text2: Jesús chora tojanë ́ yana : — Ndegombre cbë ́ yana , ndánaca Bëngbe Bëtsábioye jasérviama , chabe amë ́ ndayama jtsabuayiynayëse , cachcá tojë ́ ftseboshjona chabe yebna , shema , cats ̈ átanga , bëtsë ́ tsanga o básenga ,

text: Who shall not receive manifold more in this present time , and in the world to come life everlasting .
text2: cha mora quem luarents ̈ e chë soyëngama más echanjóyëngacñe , y chë inÿe luarocna , chë nÿetsca tescama yomna ts ̈ abe vida ca .

text: Then he took unto him the twelve , and said unto them , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem , and all things that are written by the prophets concerning the Son of man shall be accomplished .
text2: Jesús chabe bnë ́ tsana uta uatsjéndayënga barie tojánachembo , y mënts ̈ á tojanë ́ yana : “ S ̈ montsetáts ̈ ëmbo mora Jerusalenoye bënga montsajnama , y choca lempe echanjochnëngo nts ̈ amo chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayënga , chë Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemabiama tmojanabemcá ;

text: For he shall be delivered unto the Gentiles , and shall be mocked , and spitefully entreated , and spitted on :
text2: er choca cha chë ndoñe judiëngbe cucuats ̈ iñe mochanjáboshjona , y mochantsáboyejuana , mochanjóyenguango , mochántsebuashëtotjo ;

text: And they shall scourge him , and put him to death : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: y chamojátjanjents ̈ ana , mochanjóba , pero unga tianoye cha echántayena ca . ”

text: And they understood none of these things : and this saying was hid from them , neither knew they the things which were spoken .
text2: Chë uatsjéndayënga tondaye tonjanësertá , ni montsetáts ̈ ëmbo ndayá bétsemnana nts ̈ amo Jesús yojtsëtsëtsnacá , er chëngbiama yojamna josértama ndopodena soyënga .

text: And it came to pass , that as he was come nigh unto Jericho , a certain blind man sat by the way side begging :
text2: Tojanopasá , Jesús Jericó puebloye yojtsebéconaye ora , canÿe jtaná benache juachañe inatbemana , lemos ̈ na otjanañe .

text: And hearing the multitude pass by , he asked what it meant .
text2: Ents ̈ anga chëjana imojtsachnëjuanama tojanuena ora , yojanotícia ndayá yojtsopasana ca ,

text: And they told him , that Jesus of Nazareth passeth by .
text2: y chë ents ̈ anga tmojaniyana , — Jesús Nazaretocá entsebeconá ca .

text: And he cried , saying , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: As cha yojonts ̈ é uayebuáchana : — ¡ Jesús , Davídbents ̈ ana Ents ̈ á , s ̈ motselastemá ca !

text: And they which went before rebuked him , that he should hold his peace : but he cried so much the more , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Chë natsana imojtsajnënga chë jtaná imojtsácacana , iytëca chaóbemama ; pero cha más yojtsáyebuache : — ¡ Davídbents ̈ ana Ents ̈ á , s ̈ motselastemá ca !

text: And Jesus stood , and commanded him to be brought unto him : and when he was come near , he asked him ,
text2: As Jesús tojantsá y tojanmandá cha chamobets ̈ ama . Cha ya bécoñe yojtsemna ora , Jesús tbojantjá :

text: Saying , What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee ? And he said , Lord , that I may receive my sight .
text2: — ¿ Ndayá cojtsebos ̈ e ats ̈ e acbiama chjamama ca ? Y chë jtaná tbojanjuá : — Ats ̈ be Utabná , ats ̈ e së ́ ntsebos ̈ e chas ̈ uatabínÿnama ca .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Receive thy sight : thy faith hath saved thee .
text2: Chora Jesús tbojaniyana : — Matinÿe , Bëngbe Bëtsábeñe betsos ̈ buachéyeca shnaná contsatsmëna ca .

text: And immediately he received his sight , and followed him , glorifying God : and all the people , when they saw it , gave praise unto God .
text2: Y cachora cha ts ̈ abá ibojtabinÿna , y Jesúsbioye ibojtsë ́ stona , Bëngbe Bëtsá atschuanaye . Y nÿetsca ents ̈ anga , chca tmojáninÿe ora , Bëngbe Bëtsá imojtsatschuanaye .

text: And Jesus entered and passed through Jericho .
text2: Jesús Jericó puebloca tojánashjango ora , chë pueblëjana cha yojtsachnëjuana .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Zacchaeus , which was the chief among the publicans , and he was rich .
text2: Chora , canÿe bomna ents ̈ á , chë Romocama ents ̈ anga impuesto atjanayëngbe amëndayá , Zaqueo ca uabainá , yojtsebos ̈ e Jesús jinÿama . Pero ndoñe yontsobena jinÿama , bëtscá ents ̈ anga causa y cha becua inamna causa .

text: And he ran before , and climbed up into a sycomore tree to see him : for he was to pass that way .
text2: Chcasna , cha betsco natsanoye tojaftsanótjajo y canÿe sicomoro betiyeshoye tojánas ̈ ëngo , chca , Jesús chëjana tojtsachnëjuana ora , jinÿama jobenayama .

text: And when Jesus came to the place , he looked up , and saw him , and said unto him , Zacchaeus , make haste , and come down ; for to day I must abide at thy house .
text2: Jesús chë betiyeshoye tojánashjango ora , tsbanánoye tojanontjes ̈ é y Zaquéobioye tbojáninÿe . As Jesús tbojaniyana : “ Betsco chocana matastjango , Zaqueo , er mënté chanjá acbe yebnoye jatema ca . ”

text: And he made haste , and came down , and received him joyfully .
text2: Chora Zaqueo betsco tojtanastjango y chents ̈ ana puerte oyejuayá Jesúsbioye tbojanofja .

text: And when they saw it , they all murmured , saying , That he was gone to be guest with a man that is a sinner .
text2: Ents ̈ anga chca tmojáninÿe ora , tmojanonts ̈ é Jesusbe contra mënts ̈ á ichámuana : “ Jesús tonjá canÿe bacna soyënga amabe yebnents ̈ e jatema ca . ”

text: And Zacchaeus stood , and said unto the Lord ; Behold , Lord , the half of my goods I give to the poor ; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation , I restore him fourfold .
text2: Chora Zaqueo tojantsá , Bëngbe Utabná Jesúsbents ̈ e , y mënts ̈ á tbojaniyana : — Mouena , ats ̈ be Utabná , ats ̈ be bomna soyënguents ̈ ana tsë ́ ntsañe ndbomnëjémënga chanjáts ̈ ataye y nda más crocénana tijëftseyëngacá , chë ntsachets ̈ á tijë ́ ftsefcama canta soye más chantoyiye ca .

text: And Jesus said unto him , This day is salvation come to this house , forsomuch as he also is a son of Abraham .
text2: As Jesús tbojaniyana : — Mënté , aca acbe bacna soyënguents ̈ ana atsbocaná contsemna , er Zaqueo , ácnaca Abrahámbents ̈ ana ents ̈ á condmëna .

text: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost .
text2: Er chë Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá tojabo chë pochocánënga jtsemnama imojtsajnënga jabétsanguanguama y jabátsebacama ca .

text: And as they heard these things , he added and spake a parable , because he was nigh to Jerusalem , and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear .
text2: Ents ̈ anga chë soyënga imojtsuenana , y Jesús inÿe soye tojanacuntá jabuátambama , er cha ya Jerusalén béconana yojtsemna , y ents ̈ anga imojtsejuabnaye chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe amë ́ ndayana ya yochjanóshjango ca .

text: He said therefore , A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom , and to return .
text2: Jesús tojanë ́ yana : “ Canÿe luarents ̈ a uámana ents ̈ á inÿe bën luaroye yojá , cachabe luarents ̈ a rey chamobemama y chents ̈ ana cachábioye jtama .

text: And he called his ten servants , and delivered them ten pounds , and said unto them , Occupy till I come .
text2: Cabá nda ora , chabe bnë ́ tsana oservénënga yojáchembo y bëtscá crocénana cada cánÿabioye yojë ́ ftsayents ̈ buachiye , y mënts ̈ á yojëftsë ́ yana : ‘ Quem crocenánaca trato s ̈ mochjábema ats ̈ e candëtabëntscuana ca . ’

text: But his citizens hated him , and sent a message after him , saying , We will not have this man to reign over us .
text2: Pero cachabe luarents ̈ a ents ̈ anga cha imojuáya , as chëngna básefta ents ̈ anga imojichamuá chë inÿe bën luaroca mënts ̈ á chamuayanama : ‘ bënga ndoñe queftsátsbos ̈ e cha bëngbe rey chaotsemnama ca ’ .

text: And it came to pass , that when he was returned , having received the kingdom , then he commanded these servants to be called unto him , to whom he had given the money , that he might know how much every man had gained by trading .
text2: “ Pero pronto chë luarents ̈ a rey cha imojábema . Y chë luaroye yojtá orna yojamánda chë crocénana yojëftsayents ̈ buáchenga chamobéconama , jtsetats ̈ ëmbuama ntsachets ̈ á cada ona chë crocenánaca yojongánama .

text: Then came the first , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained ten pounds .
text2: Chë natsaná yojáshjango y yojayana : ‘ Taita , acbe crocénana bnë ́ tsana soye más tonjoboté ca . ’

text: And he said unto him , Well , thou good servant : because thou hast been faithful in a very little , have thou authority over ten cities .
text2: Y chë rey ibojojuá : ‘ Ts ̈ a ts ̈ abá , ts ̈ abe oservená . Aca quem base soyiñe nts ̈ amo tcbojamandacá ts ̈ abá tcojámayeca , bnë ́ tsana pueblents ̈ a mandado chacotsemnama cbojayé ca . ’

text: And the second came , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained five pounds .
text2: Chents ̈ ana inÿa yojáshjango y yojayana : ‘ Taita , acbe crocénana shachna soye más tonjoboté ca . ’

text: And he said likewise to him , Be thou also over five cities .
text2: Y chë rey ibojauyana : ‘ Acnaca shachna pueblents ̈ a mandado cochántsemna ca . ’

text: And another came , saying , Lord , behold , here is thy pound , which I have kept laid up in a napkin :
text2: “ Chorna inÿa yojobeconá y mënts ̈ á yojayana : ‘ Taita , muents ̈ e acbe crocénana entsatsmëna ; canÿe pañuelë ́ juañe bonguana sëntsejajo .

text: For I feared thee , because thou art an austere man : thou takest up that thou layedst not down , and reapest that thou didst not sow .
text2: Ats ̈ e acbiama uatjana s ̈ onjuábuache , er aca canÿe ts ̈ átjaye ents ̈ á condmëna ; aca chë ndoñe condbuajonents ̈ ana jocñana y chë ndoñe tconjajé luarents ̈ ana jaja saná jobuátbanana ca . ’

text: And he saith unto him , Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee , thou wicked servant . Thou knewest that I was an austere man , taking up that I laid not down , and reaping that I did not sow :
text2: As chë rey ibojauyana : ‘ Bacna oservená , cach acbe palabrë ́ ngaca chanjínÿanÿiye aca ndoñe ts ̈ abá tconjamama . Ats ̈ e chë ndoñe sëndbuajonents ̈ ana jocñana y chë ndoñe sënjajé luarents ̈ ana jobuátbanana tsuamanama icojátats ̈ ëmbëse ,

text: Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank , that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury ?
text2: ¿ ndáyeca ndoñe tconjá chë crocénana bancoca jetsobuájuama , y ats ̈ e camoye matijtabo ora , mas ̈ ctoyé chë crocénana y chë chents ̈ ana tojoboté crocénanënaca ca ? ’

text: And he said unto them that stood by , Take from him the pound , and give it to him that hath ten pounds .
text2: Y chë chents ̈ e imojtsemna ents ̈ anga yojáuyana : ‘ Chë crocénana motseboca y chë bnë ́ tsana soye más tojabotébioye chana motsats ̈ etá ca . ’

text: ( And they said unto him , Lord , he hath ten pounds . )
text2: As chënga imojojuá : ‘ ¡ Pero cha ya bnë ́ tsana soye más entsebomna ca ! ’

text: For I say unto you , That unto every one which hath shall be given ; and from him that hath not , even that he hath shall be taken away from him .
text2: Y chë rey yojójua : ‘ Ats ̈ e cbë ́ yana , nda tojtsebomnábioye , más mochanjáts ̈ etaye ; pero nda tondaye tondbomnábioye , chë tojtsejuabná bats ̈ atema yobomna sóynaca mochántseboca ca .

text: But those mine enemies , which would not that I should reign over them , bring hither , and slay them before me .
text2: Y chë ats ̈ e uayayënga , chë chëngbe rey ats ̈ e chaitsemnama ndoñe monjánbos ̈ ëngna , moye mënatse y ats ̈ be delante s ̈ mochtsëbaye ca ’ ” — cha chora yojayana .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he went before , ascending up to Jerusalem .
text2: Chca tojë ́ ftsanayana chents ̈ ana , Jerusalenoye yojétsaye ora , Jesús tojánashjango canÿe tjashoye , Olivos ca uabáiniñe , Betania y Betfagé pueblënga béconana . Chora , uta chabe uatsjéndayata tojanichamó ,

text: Saying , Go ye into the village over against you ; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied , whereon yet never man sat : loose him , and bring him hither .
text2: mënts ̈ á jáuyanëse : “ Tsëndatbe natsana entsemna base pueblotémoye motsata . Chas ̈ ojáshjango ora , canÿe burrotema utsbuaná s ̈ ochanjínÿena . Chábeñe cabá ndocná tonjenojayé . S ̈ ochjuajafjoná y s ̈ ochjuánatse .

text: And if any man ask you , Why do ye loose him ? thus shall ye say unto him , Because the Lord hath need of him .
text2: Y nderado nda ndáyeca s ̈ ojtsajafjná ca chacmojátjasna , s ̈ ochjauyana : ‘ Bëngbe Utabná bontsájaboto ca . ’ ”

text: And they that were sent went their way , and found even as he had said unto them .
text2: Chë uatsjéndayata tbojána y lempe nts ̈ amo Jesús tojanëyancá tbojáninÿena .

text: And as they were loosing the colt , the owners thereof said unto them , Why loose ye the colt ?
text2: Y chë burrotema imojtsajafjná orna , chë burrotema nduiñënga tmojanë ́ yana : — ¿ Ndáyeca chë burrotema s ̈ ojtsajafjná ca ?

text: And they said , The Lord hath need of him .
text2: Chora chata tbojánayana : — Bëngbe Utabná bontsajabótoyeca ca .

text: And they brought him to Jesus : and they cast their garments upon the colt , and they set Jesus thereon .
text2: Chents ̈ ana Jesúsbioye chë burrotema tmojanánatse , y chë burrotémbeñe chatbe ents ̈ ayá tbojanájatse , y chábeñe Jesús tmojanenjayé .

text: And as he went , they spread their clothes in the way .
text2: Y cha yojtsachnëjuana ora , ents ̈ anga chëngbe ents ̈ ayá benachëjana imojtsëtë ́ tsatsana .

text: And when he was come nigh , even now at the descent of the mount of Olives , the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen ;
text2: Olivos tjashe tsmanoye yojtsebeconá ora , chë bëtscá ents ̈ anga , Jesúsbeñe os ̈ buáchiyënga , tmojanonts ̈ é uayebuáchana y Bëngbe Bëtsá oyejuayënga jëtschuayana , Bëngbe Bëtsabe obenánaca bëts soyënga Jesús tojanmama .

text: Saying , Blessed be the King that cometh in the name of the Lord : peace in heaven , and glory in the highest .
text2: Chënga mënts ̈ á imojtsichamo : “ ¡ Corente bendición bomná chaotsemna , chë Bëngbe Utabnabe obenánaca tojabo Rey ca ! ¡ Celoca ts ̈ abá entsemna ! ¡ Bëngbe Bëtsá matschuanga ca ! ”

text: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him , Master , rebuke thy disciples .
text2: Chë ents ̈ anguents ̈ e básefta fariseunga imojtsemnënga , Jesús tmojaniyana : — Buatëmbayá , acbe ústonënga mëcácana chca ndoñe chamondëtsáyebuachama ca .

text: And he answered and said unto them , I tell you that , if these should hold their peace , the stones would immediately cry out .
text2: Pero Jesús mënts ̈ á tojanë ́ jua : — Ndegombre cbë ́ yana , mënga iytëca tmojobiamëse , chë ndëts ̈ benga muanjuayebuáchena ca .

text: And when he was come near , he beheld the city , and wept over it ,
text2: Jesús Jerusalén béconana tojánashjango , y chë bëts pueblo tojáninÿe ora , chents ̈ a ents ̈ angbiama tojánenobos ̈ achna .

text: Saying , If thou hadst known , even thou , at least in this thy day , the things which belong unto thy peace ! but now they are hid from thine eyes .
text2: Y mënts ̈ á tojánayana : “ ¡ Malaye s ̈ mëntsetáts ̈ ëmbo , nÿe mo mënténaca , ndayá yojtseita ts ̈ ëngaftangbeñe lempe ts ̈ abá chaotsomñama ! Pero mora chë soye ts ̈ ëngaftangbe bominÿama entsëitë ́ mena .

text: For the days shall come upon thee , that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee , and compass thee round , and keep thee in on every side ,
text2: Er Jerusalenoca bacna tenga echanjóshjango ; chora uayayënga chents ̈ a shëconánëjana canÿe tapiës ̈ e mochantsepórma , mochantsejétja y nÿetsca juachoicana mochanjonts ̈ é ts ̈ ëngaftanga jtsatsejana ,

text: And shall lay thee even with the ground , and thy children within thee ; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another ; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation .
text2: y lempe mochantsepochóca . Muents ̈ a oyenënga mochantsëbaye , y ni mo canÿe ndëts ̈ bé inÿebé juatsboca quemochaiseboshjona , chë Bëngbe Bëtsá ts ̈ ëngaftanga játsebacama tojabo ora , ndoñe ches ̈ matoyeuná causa ca ” — Jesús tojánayana .

text: And he went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold therein , and them that bought ;
text2: Chents ̈ ana , Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnoye Jesús tojánamashëngo y tojanonts ̈ é chë chents ̈ e imojtsenënga chents ̈ ana jtëbuacnana ,

text: Saying unto them , It is written , My house is the house of prayer : but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: y tojanë ́ yana : “ Bëngbe Bëtsá chabe uabemana palabrënguiñe tojayana : ‘ Ats ̈ be bëts yebna echántsemna áts ̈ eftaca encuéntaye yebna ca ’ , pero ts ̈ ëngaftangna , atbëbanëngbe oyeniñe chë yebna s ̈ mojtsebema ca . ”

text: And he taught daily in the temple . But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him ,
text2: Y cada te , Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnents ̈ e Jesús ents ̈ anga yojtsabuátambaye ; y bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga , ley abuátambayënga y chë pueblents ̈ a mandayë ́ ngnaca imojtsenguaye nts ̈ amo jamëse cha jóbana .

text: And could not find what they might do : for all the people were very attentive to hear him .
text2: Pero ndoñe tmonjáninÿena nts ̈ amo , er nÿetsca ents ̈ anga corente imojtseyeunana nts ̈ amo cha yojtsoyebuambnacá .

text: And it came to pass , that on one of those days , as he taught the people in the temple , and preached the gospel , the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders ,
text2: Canÿe te , Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnents ̈ e Jesús yojtsabuátambaye , y chë ts ̈ abe noticiëngama yojtsabuayiyná ora , tmojánashjajna bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga , ley abuátambayënga , judië ́ ngbeñe bëtsëjemëngcá mandayë ́ ngaftaca cánÿiñe ;

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: y Jesús tmojaniyana : — S ̈ më ́ yana ; ¿ ndaye deréchoca chë contsama soyënga aca cojtsama ca ? o ¿ chca jtsamama nda obenana tcmënjats ̈ etá ca ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: Chora Jesús tojanë ́ jua : — Ats ̈ naca canÿe soye së ́ ntsebomna ts ̈ ëngaftanga jatjayama . S ̈ mochjojuanga .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: ¿ Nda Juan chë Ubayaná tbojanichmó ents ̈ anga jubáyama , Bëngbe Bëtsá o ents ̈ anga ca ?

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Chora chënga tmojanonts ̈ é enatsëtsnayana : “ ‘ Bëngbe Bëtsá ca ’ chamojojuase , cha s ̈ ochanjáuyana : ‘ As ¿ ndáyeca chábeñe ndoñe s ̈ monjanos ̈ buaché ca ? ’

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: Y ndoñe quemuátobena jayanana ‘ ents ̈ anga ca ’ ; ents ̈ anga ndëts ̈ béngaca buattsë ́ baye , er nÿetscanga becá mondëjuabná Juan ndegombre Bëngbe Bëtsabe juabna oyebuambnayá yojamnama . ”

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: Chcasna , chënga tmojanjuá ndoñe monjántats ̈ ëmbo nda Juan tbojanichmó ents ̈ anga jubáyama ca .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Y Jesús tojanë ́ yana : — Asna ats ̈ e cach ndoñe quecbochatë ́ yana ndaye deréchoca chca stsama ca .

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: Chents ̈ ana Jesús tojanonts ̈ é ents ̈ anga jáuyanana , y quem cuéntoca tojanabuatambá : “ Canÿe ents ̈ á uvas betiyënga yojáje y chë fshantse inÿe trabájayënga yojúyents ̈ ame , y baytescama bën luaroye yojtsoñe .

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Chë uvasës ̈ angá juashacama tempo yojobuache orna , chë jajañe nduiño canÿe oservená ibojíchmua chë trabájayënga jáuyanama ntsachets ̈ á cha ibojtsotocánama . Pero chëngna cha imojtsejants ̈ etaye , y tondaye ntoyiycá imojtichmuá .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: Chents ̈ ana inÿa ibojíchmua ; pero chë trabájayënga cha imojtsejants ̈ etaye , imojtsóyenguango , y tondaye ntoyiycá imojtichmuá .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: Chë nduiño inÿa ibojatichmuá ; pero chánaca chënga imojtsejants ̈ etaye , imojtselísia , y chents ̈ ana imojtábocna .

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: “ Chora chë nduiño yojeniyana : ‘ ¿ Y mora nts ̈ amo chjama ca ? Cach ats ̈ be bonshana uaquiñá chanjíchmua ; nderádose cha aíñe mochanjóyeunaye ca . ’

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: Pero chë trabájayënga , chë uaquiñá imojinÿe orna imojeniyana : ‘ Mua chë fshantse nduiñbe uaquiñá entsemna . Lempe chabe soyënga mua echanjóyëngacñe ; motsóbanga y nÿetsca chabe otocana soyënga bëngbiama echanjoquéda ca . ’

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Chcasna , chë uvas jajañents ̈ ana cha imojtsábocna y imojtsóba . ” Chora Jesús tojanatjá : — Y asna , ¿ nts ̈ amo s ̈ mojtsejuabná , ndayá chë jajañe nduiño chë trabajayë ́ ngaftaca yochjama ca ?

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Cha co echanjá y chë trabájayënga echanjetsëbaye , y chë uvas betiyënga jajañe inÿe trabájayënga echanjárrendaye ca . Chë ents ̈ anga chca tmojanuena ora , tmojánayana : — ¡ Bë ́ ngaftaca ndocna te chca chaondopasá ca !

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: Pero Jesús tojanënÿanÿé y tojánayana : — As ¿ ndayama Bëngbe Bëtsabe uabemana palabrënguiñe iuayana ? : Chë yebna jebuanënga tmojtsanaboté ndëts ̈ bé , mora chë más bëts uashacuanës ̈ ents ̈ e entsejájona ca .

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Ndánaca chë ndëts ̈ beñe chaojotsats ̈ á , chëbé bochántsatcacaye ; y chë ndëts ̈ bé ndábeñnaca chaojótsats ̈ e , polvëshe bochántsebema ca — Jesús tojánayana .

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: Chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga y ley abuátambayënga tmojanenótats ̈ ëmbona Jesús chca tojanacuntá jinÿanÿiyama , chënga mo chë puerte bacna trabajayëngcá imojamnama ; asna tmojánbos ̈ ena cachora jishachana , pero ents ̈ angbiama imojtsauatja .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: Chents ̈ ana chënga báseftanga tmojanichamó , mo ndegombre ts ̈ abe ents ̈ anga cuaftsemncá chamobiamëse , Jesús jisháchichiyama , nderado ndayá cha tojayaniñe ; y chca chënga jobenayama cha jishachana y chëngbe mandádbioye juanatsama .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: As chënga tmojantjá : — Buatëmbayá , bënga fsë ́ ntsetats ̈ ëmbo nts ̈ amo aca cojtsoyebuambná y cojtsabuatambacá ndegombre ts ̈ abá yomnama , nts ̈ amo ndegombre Bëngbe Bëtsá yobos ̈ cá , y acbiama tondaye quenatámana nda más uamaná o nduamaná tomnana . Aca contsabuatambá ndegombre ts ̈ abe vida jtsebomnama , nts ̈ amo Bëngbe Bëtsá yomandacá .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: Chcasna , s ̈ më ́ yana , ¿ ts ̈ abá tayojtsemna bënga , César , chë Romoca bëts mandadbiama , impuesto jtsatsquë ́ cjnayana o ndoñe ca ?

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Jesús yojtsetáts ̈ ëmbo , nts ̈ amo cha tojayaniñe jisháchichiyama chënga imojtsebos ̈ ama ; as tojanë ́ yana :

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: — Chë s ̈ matsquëcjná crocénana s ̈ minÿinÿenga ca ; ¿ ndabe jubiá chë crocenániñe yojtsemna , y nts ̈ amo muents ̈ e entsabemancá nda chca iuabaina ca ? Y chënga tmojanjuá : — Césarbe jubiá ; cha chca enduabaina ca .

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Y Jesús tojanë ́ yana : — César s ̈ mochtoyiye cha ibotocana soye ; y Bëngbe Bëtsana cha ibotocana soye ca .

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Y chca , chë ichmónënga ndoñe imonjobenaye jisháchichiyana , ndayá cha ents ̈ angbe delante tojayaniñe . Masna , nts ̈ amo tojanë ́ juama , ojnanánënga iytëca imojobiama .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: Chents ̈ ana , báseftanga saduceo ca uabaina ents ̈ anga tmojána Jesús jinÿama . Chënga imojanjuabná obanënga ndocna te ntayenana ca . Jesús mënts ̈ á tmojantjá :

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: — Buatëmbayá , Moisés bëngbe leyënguiñe tojë ́ ftsanabema , nderado canÿe boyá tojtsóbana y básenga ndoñe tonjëftsabáshejuanësna , canmëna chë uabentsá chë shémaftaca jtobouamayana , chca , chë chabe uabochená obanabiama básenga jtsabamnama ca .

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Chcase , canÿe bë ́ ngbents ̈ e canÿsëfta cats ̈ átanga monjamna . Chë natsaná tonjanobouamá y tontsanóbana , básenga ntjëftsabashejuancá ;

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: chents ̈ ana chë inÿa chë shémaftaca tonjanobouamá , y cachcá tonjanopasá .

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: Chë inÿe uabentsá chora cháftaca tonjanobouamá , pero tontsanóbana básenga ntjëftsabashejuancá ; y cachcá , chë inÿe uabentsë ́ ngnaca cháftaca tmonjanobouamá , pero nÿetscanga tmonjanóbana básenga ntjëftsabashejuancá .

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: Cabana , chë shembásanaca tontsanóbana .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: Y chcasna , chë obanënga chamojtayena ora , ¿ ndabe chë canÿsëfta cats ̈ atanguents ̈ abe shema chë shembása yochtsemna , nÿetscanga cháftaca tmojanobouamase ca ? — chënga tmojantjá .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: Chora Jesús tojanë ́ jua : — Quem luarents ̈ e boyabásenga y shembásenga mondbétsobouamnaye ;

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: pero chë echanjóshjango luaroye jama y obanënguents ̈ ana jtayenama merecido jtsebuájonama chamojobenangna , masque boyabásenga o shembásenga , ya ndoñe quemochatóbouamnaye ,

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
text2: ni queochátopodena chënga chamóbanama , y chca , chënga mochántsemna mo angelëngcá , y Bëngbe Bëtsabe básenga mochántsemna , obanënguents ̈ ana mochtayénayeca .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: Y Moisésnaca , chë yojtsángbototjuana betiyetémama tojanábements ̈ e , bënga s ̈ ontsinÿanÿná chë obanënga imnátayenama ; chents ̈ e Bëngbe Bëtsá tojánayana cha yomna Abraham , Isaac y Jacobëbe Bëtsá ca .

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: Bëngbe Bëtsá chca tojánayana ora , entsichamo cha ndoñe yondmëna obanëngbe Bëtsá , sinó aina ents ̈ angbe Bëtsá ca , er masque chënga tmojanóbana , chënga cabá Bëngbe Bëtsáftaca mondoyena ca — Jesús tojánayana .

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: Chora básefta ley abuátambayënga Jesús tmojaniyana : — Buatëmbayá , ts ̈ abá tcjayana ca .

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Y ya ndoñe más montsenñémua inÿe soyëngama jatstjanayana .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: Jesús tojanatjá : “ ¿ Ndáyeca ts ̈ ëngaftanga s ̈ mnétsichamo chë Uámana Uabuayaná , chë Cristo , Rey Davídbents ̈ ana iuabó ca ?

text: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Er cach David , chabe librë ́ s ̈ añe Salmos ca uabainë ́ s ̈ añe , tojánayana : Bëngbe Bëtsá , ats ̈ be Utabná Crístbioye tbojaniyana : ‘ Ats ̈ be cats ̈ bioica mótbema ,

text: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: ats ̈ be obenánaca , acbe uayayënga acbe cucuats ̈ iñe chamoquedama chjamëntscuana ca . ’

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: ¿ Nts ̈ ámose , Cristo , Davídbents ̈ ana nántsemna , cach David ‘ Utabná ca ’ chábioye tbojtsabobuátmëse ca ? ” — cha tojanatjá .

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Nÿetsca ents ̈ anga imojtsuenana , y Jesús chabe uatsjéndayënga tojanë ́ yana :

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: “ Cuedado s ̈ mochtsebomna , y ndoñe s ̈ mattsama chë ley abuatambayëngcá ; chënga jtsogusetánana bënëna ents ̈ ayangaca jtsajnana , y jtsebos ̈ ana tsáshenañe ents ̈ anga becá respétoca chamotsacheuanayama . Chënga chë judiëngbe enefjuana yebnënguenache chë más uámana luarënguiñe jtsetbiámanana , y fiestënguiñe nÿa quëfseroca .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Pero chë viudángbioye chë tmobomna soyënga jtsabacayana ; y ents ̈ angbe delante ts ̈ abá chacmotsë ́ nÿama y chënga imojtsaíngñama ndoñe chaondëtsótats ̈ ëmbuamna , Bëngbe Bëtsáftaca ts ̈ a jtsencuéntayana . Chë causa , Bëngbe Bëtsá ínÿengbiama más chënga echanjácastigaye ca ” — Jesús tojánayana .

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnents ̈ e , Jesús yojtsë ́ nÿaye chë bomnënga crocénana jtsequëcjnayana chë crocénana quëcjnayëtémiñe ;

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: y canÿe viudá ndbomnëjémnaca tbojáninÿe , uta crocénana chëtémiñe yojaftsesegóra .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: Chora Jesús tojánayana : “ Ndegombre cbë ́ yana , quem viudá ndbomnëjema , Bëngbe Bëtsabiama nÿetscangbiama más becá tonjëftsesegorá ;

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: er nÿetscanga tmonjëftsesegorá chë yojtsóyents ̈ jaments ̈ ana , pero chana , masque ts ̈ a ndbomnëjema , cha vida jtsebomnama lempe ntsachets ̈ á yobomncá tonjëftsesegorá ca . ”

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: Báseftanga imojtsichamo chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnama , ts ̈ a yojtsebotamanana puerte uámana ndëts ̈ béngaca y chë ents ̈ anga imojanamana juambana Bëngbe Bëtsábioye uáts ̈ ëmbona soyë ́ ngaca ca . As Jesús tojánayana :

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: — Canÿe tempo echanjóshjango , y lempe nts ̈ amo mora muents ̈ e s ̈ montsonÿacá tondaye queochatoquéda , ni mo canÿe ndëts ̈ bé inÿebé juatsboye . Lempe mochantsepochóca ca .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: Chora chënga tmojantjá : — Buatëmbayá , ¿ ntseco chca yochjopása ? ¿ Y ndayá Bëngbe Bëtsá yochjama , chca jopásama yojtsobecuama ents ̈ anga chamotsetats ̈ ëmbuama ca ?

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: Y Jesús tojánayana : — Cuedado s ̈ mochtsebomna ndocná chacmondáingñema . Er banga mochanjabo y mochantsabíchamo chënga ats ̈ e imomna ca . Mochántsichamo : “ Ats ̈ e chë Cristo sëndmëna ” , y “ Mora chë tempo entsemna ca ” . Pero ndoñe s ̈ matjóyaunaye .

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: Y ts ̈ ëngaftanga , ents ̈ anga imojtsentsjanama y ents ̈ anga mandadëngbe contra imojtsemnama chas ̈ mojtsuenana ora , ndoñe s ̈ mattsauatja , er entseyta natsana chë soyënga chaochnëngo ; pero masque chca , chë quem luare jopochócama tempo cabá ndoñe queochátsmëna ca .

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: Y mënts ̈ ánaca Jesús tojanë ́ yana : “ Canÿe luarents ̈ a ents ̈ anga , inÿe luaroca ents ̈ ángaftaca mochántsentsjanaye ; y canÿe amëndayábents ̈ a ents ̈ anga , inÿe amëndayábioca ents ̈ angaftácnaca .

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Ba luarënguiñe jabuache echanjuangmë ́ mana , bëts shëntsana , y ents ̈ anga pochócaye s ̈ ocanënga echanjóshjango ; y celoca echántsemna puerte uabouana soyënga y bëts soyënga , ents ̈ anga jinÿanÿiyama quem luare ya yochtsopochócama .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: “ Pero cabá ndoñe chca chaondochnëngo ora , ts ̈ ëngaftanga cmochanjíshëche y chas ̈ mosufrima mochántsama ; bënga judiëngbe enefjuana yebnëngoye cmochanjunatse játsets ̈ enama y cárceloynaca cmochanjáutame , y reyënga y mandadëngbióynaca cmochanjunatse , ats ̈ be ústonënga bétsemna causa .

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Chca s ̈ mochanjapása , nts ̈ amo ats ̈ biama s ̈ motats ̈ ëmbcá chënga chas ̈ më ́ yanama .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: Natsana ndoñe s ̈ matjátsjuabnaye jenë ́ uyanama nts ̈ amo chora jóyebuambayana ,

text: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom , which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist .
text2: er ats ̈ e chanjama puerte ts ̈ abá y osertanánaca ts ̈ ëngaftanga chas ̈ móyebuambama ; y chca , ts ̈ ëngaftangbe uayayënga ndoñe quemochatobenaye jayanana ndoñe ts ̈ abá s ̈ montsichamo ca , y ndocá jojuama quemochatobenaye .

text: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents , and brethren , and kinsfolks , and friends ; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death .
text2: Pero uayayëngbe cucuats ̈ iñe cmochanjábashejuana cach ts ̈ ëngaftangbe bëtsë ́ tsanga , cats ̈ átanga , pamíllanga y amiguënga ; y ts ̈ ëngaftanguents ̈ ana báseftanga cmochantsëbaye .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: Y nÿetsca ents ̈ anga cmochantsë ́ buayënja , ats ̈ be ústonënga bétsemna causa .

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: Pero ts ̈ ëngaftangbe bests ̈ as ̈ ents ̈ ana ni mo canÿe stjënëja quecmochátabajajo .

text: In your patience possess ye your souls .
text2: Ts ̈ ëngaftanga nÿets tempo áts ̈ beñe os ̈ buáchiyënga chas ̈ mojtsemnëse , chë nÿetsca tescama yomna ts ̈ abe vida s ̈ mochántsebomna ca .

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: “ Jerusalén nÿets shë ́ conana soldadënga chas ̈ mojanÿe ora , s ̈ mochtsetáts ̈ ëmbo Jerusalén jopochócama tojobuáchama .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: Chorna , chë Judeoca oyenënga batsjabengoye chamotsacheta ; Jerusalenents ̈ e chamojtsemnënga , chents ̈ ana chamuaisebocana ; y chë jajenache chamojtsemnëngna , Jerusalenoye ndoñe chamondésamashjna .

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: Er chora echántsemna chë ents ̈ angbe jabuache castigo ; lempe nts ̈ amo Bëngbe Bëtsabe uabemana palabrënguiñe endayancá chora echanjochnëngo .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: ¡ Ts ̈ a lastema chë tempo shembásenga ngomámanëngbiama o ochóchaye básenga chamojtsabamnëngbiama ! Er chora corente ngménana quem luarents ̈ e echántsemna , y quem luarents ̈ a ents ̈ angbiama chë uabouana castigo .

text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: Inÿenga espadë ́ jaca mochanjóbana , y ínÿengbioye nÿetsca luarënguëjana utámenënga mochanjunatse ; y chë ndoñe judiëngna , Jerusalenoca ents ̈ ángbioye mochántsatsejaye y mochantsëbaye , chca chaotsemnama Bëngbe Bëtsá tojalesenciantscuana ca ” — Jesús tojánayana .

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: Mënts ̈ ánaca Jesús tojánayana : “ Chora bëts soyënga echantsinÿna shinÿiñe , juashconiñe y estrellënguiñe ; y quem luarents ̈ a ents ̈ anga ts ̈ a mochántsauatja , ndayá jamama ntsetats ̈ ëmbcá , chë mar béjaye y olëshënga corente echantsefshauenana causa .

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Ents ̈ anga echantsabuatëcja ts ̈ a auatja causa y ndayá quem luariñe yochjopásama enócochinÿena causa ; er chë quem luarents ̈ a tsbanánoca espíritënga obenana bomnënga echanjángmëmana .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Y chora ents ̈ anga mochanjinÿe , chë Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemá jants ̈ etëshiñe echántsaboye , puerte obenánaca y corente buashinÿinÿaniñe .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Chë soyënga jochnënguama chaojobojats ̈ é ora , añemo s ̈ mochjents ̈ etaye y bests ̈ as ̈ e játsbanase s ̈ mochjarrepára , er chora echántsemna chë ts ̈ ëngaftangbe atsebacayana ca ” — Jesús tojánayana .

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: Mënts ̈ ánaca Jesús tojanë ́ yana jabuátambama : “ S ̈ mochjinÿe canÿe higo betiye o ndaye inÿe betíynaca .

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: Tojtsaisë ́ jotsanama s ̈ mojinÿe ora , jtsetats ̈ ëmbuana chë ts ̈ abe tempo ya yojtsaisobecuama .

text: So likewise ye , when ye see these things come to pass , know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand .
text2: Cachcá , chë soyënga yojtsëchnëjuanama chas ̈ mojinÿe ora , s ̈ mochtsetáts ̈ ëmbo chë Bëngbe Bëtsabe amë ́ ndayana ya yojtsobecuama .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass away , till all be fulfilled .
text2: “ Ndegombre cbë ́ yana , lempe chca echanjochnëngo , morsca ents ̈ anga cabá ndóbana ora .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Celoca y quem luare echanjopochóca , pero ats ̈ be palabra ndocna te queochaisopochóca .

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .
text2: “ Cuedado s ̈ mochtsebomna y ndoñe s ̈ matjaleséncia ts ̈ ëngaftangbe ainana bacna juabnë ́ ngaca chaotsemnama , jenomándama ntsobencá mocá enobuena causa , tmoye causa y nÿe quem luarents ̈ a soyëngama enócochinÿena causa ; y ts ̈ ëngaftanga prontánënga s ̈ mochtsemna , nÿe ndeolpe chë te chaojobuache ora ; y ts ̈ ëngaftanga ndëprontánënga ndoñe chas ̈ mondë ́ tsemna , mo ts ̈ ëngaftangbiama canÿe uachmaniñe cuaftsemncá . Er nÿetsca quem luarents ̈ a ents ̈ angbiama chca echántsemna .

text: Watch ye therefore , and pray always , that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass , and to stand before the Son of man .
text2: Cuedado s ̈ mochtsebomna y yejuana s ̈ mochtsantjes ̈ na ; nÿe ntseco órnaca Bëngbe Bëtsáftaca s ̈ mochtsencuéntaye , chca , chë echanjopása soyëngama jótsbocama chas ̈ mobenama , y chë Bëngbe Bëtsá Ents ̈ á tbojanbemabe delante jashjanguama ca ” — Jesús tojanë ́ yana .

text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple ; and at night he went out , and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives .
text2: Jesús , bnëté Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnents ̈ e yojánabuatambaye , y ibetna , Olivos uabaina tjashoye yojánaye joquédama .

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .
text2: Y nÿetsca ents ̈ anga cabá cachëse Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnoye imojánajna Jesús joyeunayama .

text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh , which is called the Passover .
text2: Ya yojétsobeco Bashco fiesta , chë levadúraca ndëpormana tandës ̈ e saye fiesta , chë Bëngbe Bëtsá Egiptocana judiëngbe bëts taitanga tojánatsebacama jtenójuaboyama .

text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him ; for they feared the people .
text2: Chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga y ley abuátambayënga imojtsenguaye nts ̈ amo jamëse Jesús jóbana , pero ents ̈ angbiama imojtsauatja .

text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot , being of the number of the twelve .
text2: Chora Satanás , Judas chë Iscariote ca uabobuatmabe ainaniñe bacna juabnënga tojanjajó . Chánaca yojamna chë bnë ́ tsana uta uatsjendayënguents ̈ á ;

text: And he went his way , and communed with the chief priests and captains , how he might betray him unto them .
text2: y tojána , chë bachnangbe amë ́ ndayënga y Bëngbe Bëtsabe bëts yebnoca soldadëngbe amëndayë ́ ngaftaca jencuéntama , nts ̈ amo Jesús chëngbe cucuats ̈ iñe jayents ̈ báshejuanama .

text: And they were glad , and covenanted to give him money .
text2: As chënga imojóyejuaye , y Judas tmojans ̈ buachená crocénana chama jtats ̈ etayana .

text: And he promised , and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude .
text2: Y Júdasna aíñe ca tojánayana ; y cach orscana cha yojtsenguaye nts ̈ amo jamana y ndëmua ora Jesús chë ́ ngbioye jayents ̈ báshejuanama , ndocna ents ̈ anga ora .

text: Then came the day of unleavened bread , when the passover must be killed .
text2: Chë Bashco fiesta ora tojanóshjango , chë levadúraca ndëpormana tandës ̈ e sayté ; chë te yojamna , Bëngbe Bëtsá jëtschuayamna canÿe oveshá jóbana chora jasama .

text: And he sent Peter and John , saying , Go and prepare us the passover , that we may eat .
text2: As Jesús , Pedro y Juánbioye tojanë ́ yana : — Motsata y saná s ̈ ochjaprónta Bashco fiestama bënga mochjasama ca .

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: Chora chata tbojantjá : — ¿ Ndë ́ moca cojtsebos ̈ e chë saná fchjapróntama ca ?

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: Y Jesús tojanë ́ jua : — Jerusalenents ̈ e chas ̈ ojámashëngo ora , canÿe bacó cmochanjóbiats ̈ e , matbajiñe búyeshe echantsabuyambaye . Cha s ̈ ochjuasto , y s ̈ ochtsonÿaye ndëmuanÿe yebnents ̈ e cha yochjámashënguama ;

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
